lta mi la lus rnams sngangasanas su// de dag lha lus thob par 'gyur// gang dag chos la skyabs mchi ba// de dag ngan 'gror ma mchi ste// ma yi lus rnams spangs nas
de dag lha lus thob par 'gyur// gang dag dge 'dun skyabs mchi ba// de dag ngan 'gror ma mchis// ma yi lus rnams spangs nasasu// de dag lha lus thob par 'gyur// gang
dag nyin mtshan rtag par yad// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang// gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchi ba// ma de dag gi rnyed pa che// gang dag nyin mtshan rtag par yang// chos ni
rjes su dran pa dang// gang dag chos la skyabs mchis pa// ma de dag na red pa che// gang dag nyin mtshan rtag par yang// dga' dun rjes su dran pa dang// gang dag dge 'dun
skyabs mchis pa// ma rje dgun smad pa che// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lca'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rjes su 'thun par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka
de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs dang ba/ 'di dag ngan 'gror ma 'gro ste/ mal lus rnams spangs nas su// de dag lha lus thob par 'gyur// gang
dag chos la skyabs dong ba// de dag ngan 'gror ma 'gro ste// ma yi lus rnams sngangs nas su// de dag lha lus thob par 'gyur// gang dag dge 'dun skyabs dod ba// de dag na
'gror ma 'groste// ma yi lus rnams sbas nas su// de dag lha lus thob par 'gyur// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya ban bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par dga' nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la lag pa thal mo sbyar nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de nyid du ma snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzen ma tra dang/ zhu chen gyi le tsha ba ba'i ya shes sdes bsgyur cing zhusate gtan la phab pa/@#// rgya gar
zla skad du/ tsawA pa byA a ba dA nA ma/ bod skad du/ zla 'od kyi rtogs pa brjod pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/ gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa dge slong shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
blo pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'[ ]/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/
gang dge slong shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis gtse ba da mya ngan las 'das pa 'dam bzo da nas/ sas rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gdege 'dun bzhugs pa'i thog mar yongs su
mya ngan las 'das pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge snyed dag gang dag slong shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis 'dod chags dang bral ba zhesrung
dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa
rnams las rnam par grol ban/ gtso bo mya ngan las 'das pa 'di bzodan/ sangs rgyas la segs pa dge slong ga dge 'dun bzhugs pa'i thog mar mya ngan las 'das pa ngo mtshar ca zhig che/
gang 'das pa'i dus na/ dge slong shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa// skye ba dang/ rga ba dang na ba dad/
'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ sne sngags 'don pa dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa dang bcas pan yang nga la gcig pu sems mngon par dad pas gtso bo shi bar mthong ba ma bzod nas
dus byed de/ 'dod pa'i khams thams cad las yang dag par 'das nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ byang phyogs na
rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzad s zhes bya ba 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa// ma dang skye bo'i tshogs mang pos gang ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ kun nas gru bsha par gyur
ti/ shin tu rnam par 'byes pa// rta babs dad/ skar khung dang/ skar khung dra ba nan mthon po dang/ rab tu ldan pa dang/ tshong tshod dang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis kun tu gad ba
rgyal po dang blon po dang/ khyim bdag dang/ tshong dpon dang/ yul 'khor gyi ma rnams kyis yongs su gang ba mi rnams gzhung lugs la gnas pa// pa wang dang/ gling bu/
@#// dad/ rda dang/ sgra bzas dang/ ja bo chadang/ rdo rje dang/ rdza rangs dang/ dung gi sgra rnams kyi sgra nges par sgrogs pa'o// dge slong dag rgyal po'i pho brang de na/
ta go ru'i dri ded/ a ka ru'i dra dang/ tsan dan gyi dro dang/ phyi ma'i dro dang/ gur kumagyi dri dang/ me tog gi dri zhim ba rnams te/ dus thams cad du 'ad lta bu'i dra su rdzogs pa// nad
gas bskyod nas lam dang/ srang bar dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo rnams su ldang zhing rgyu ba dang/ glang po dang/ rta dod/ dpud bu chung gi tshogs dang yang dag par ldan pa dang/ bzhon
pa dang/ thag pa dang/ srang dang/ lam po che zhi bar mdzes par byas pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgreng ba dang/ rtababs dang/ skar khu dang/ skar khung dra ba can dad/
zla ba phyed pas brtags bas/ lha'i gnas bzhin du nyi bar mdzes par gyur pa dang/ klu'i dbang po dang/ ri'i rgyal bo las mngon par mthon pa'i mtshodang/ rje bu dang/ lteng ka dang/
chu mgi dang/ 'bab chus nye bar mdzes pa dang ldan pa dang/ ut+pa la dang/ pad+madang/ ku mu ta dang/ puN+Da ri kas kun tu khebs pa/ shing sA la dang/ ta la dad/ tam la dang/
dod ka dang/ a shoka dang/ ti la ka dang/ bur na ka dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ ba ku la dang/ a te mug ta ka dang/ ba ta la' mi tog gis kun tu khebs pa dang ldan pa dang//
nags tshal gyi phyogs na/ ka la bad dad/ ni tso dang/ sha ri ka dang/ khu byug dang/ rma bya dad/ shang shang te'u sgra sogs par gyur pa dang/ shing sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes
bas nyams dga' bar byas pa dang/ skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba mdun na yod de/ bslong dag rdo bzangs de ltar shan tu nyams dga' bar gyur to// dge slong dag rgyal po'i pho brang
rdob zangs dan rgyal po zla 'od ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ blta na stag pa/ mdzes pa// skye ba dran pa// lha'i mig dang ldan pa/ glang gcig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba chos dang
ldan pa// chos kyi rgyal po 'dzam bu gling du chos kyi dbad phyug la dbang byed par gyur to// dge slong dag rgyal bo zla 'od rang la 'od yod nga// 'gro na'ang mun pa med par gyur to/ nor bu ji
ba cha' 'od dam/ mar me'i 'od dam/ sgron ma mdun du ma khyer gyi/ dge slong dag gzhan du na rgyal po zla 'od rang nyid kyi lus las 'od 'byung bar gyur te/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las

'od 'byung ba bzhin du 'dar lus las 'od byung ste/ rgyu 'das na rgyal po zla 'od zla 'od ces mang du gyur to// yang de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs la sogs pa
zla 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling ga ma rnams la dpya dang/ shog m dang/ grubatsasamed de/ zhing gi 'byor ba dang ldan pa/ skye bo rnams zhi ba dang/ khyim bya'i sgra dang ldan/
pa/ greng dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal gyi spyi bo'i tshogs dang/ rgyal pa dang/ rgyal rigs dang ldan par gyur to// dge slong dag yad de 'i tshe de'i dus 'dzam bu'i gling gi ma rnams kyi tshe'i

tshad lo bzhi khri bzhi stong gan pa gyur to// dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od na byang chub sems dpar gyur te/ thams cad ster ba/ thams cad yongs su gtong ba ste/ des rgyal po'i pho brang rdo ba zangs
nas grong khyer gyi shar phyogs su gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan bsgreng// gser gyi rnga bo che yang dag par brdungs nas/ sbyin pa gtong/ bsod nams na byed do// de bzhin du grong
khyer gyi lho dang/ nub dang/ byad du yang sbyin pa ni gtong/ bsod nams ni byed do// sum mdo'i dbus su yang sbyin pa gtong/ bsod nams na byed do// 'di lta ste/ zas 'dod
pa rnams la na zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la na skom/ bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ mar me dang/ dra ring/ byug pa dang/ mal dang/ stan dang/ rgyab rten/
dang/ skye ba rnams kyi gnas dang/ shang rta dang/ spud pa dang/ rgyan dang/ gser snod dngul gyi phyi mas yongs su gang ba rnams dang/ dngul gyi stod gser gyi phyi mas yongs su ga nga ba
rnams dang/ gser gyi rwa btags pa'i ba lang rnams dad/ 'khar ba'i gzhi snod rnams dang/ gzhon nu ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par byas pa rnams kyang sbyin pa ni gtong/ bsod
namasan byed do// gos kha dog sna tshogs pa yul sna tshogs pa las byung ba rnam ba sna tshogs pa la 'ad lta// dar la dang/ rgya dur dad/ rin po che'i gos dang/ du ku la dang/ mag
pan dang/ bag la pa dang/ la ba dang/ rin po che dad/ gser dang/ gos gser gyi rgyan can dang 2 kashas ka'adar dang gos dar la sogs pa rnams kyang sbyin par na gtong/
bsod nams na byed do// dge slong dag rgyal bo zla 'od kyis sbyin pa ji snyed kyis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i ma thams cad phyug pa dang/ nor che ba dang/ longs spyod che bar gyur pa de snyed rab/
gtong ngo// dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od kyis gang grung po dad/ rta dang/ shing rta dad/ gdugs la sogs pa'i spyan ba ji snyed kyis 'dzam bu'i gling pa 'dan ma gcig kyang rkang gis
'gro ba med pa desnyad rab tu gtong ste/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i ma tham sa cad kyang glang po'i rgyab dang/ rta bzhi dang ldan pa'i shang rta steng nas gser dang dngul gyi gdugs 'dzin pa dang ldan
pa dang 2 skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang/ yul 'khor nas yul 'khor dang/ grong khyer nas grong khyer du rjes su 'gro bar gyur to// dge spyod dag de nas yang rgyal po zla 'o
a @#// 'di ltar sems par gyur te/ ngas sprin pa 'ad tsam zhig byan pa tsam gyis ci zhig bya ste/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ chas bzhag rnams nga nyid 'dra ba 'dzam bu gling/

sku pa'i m rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar rab tu byanan/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i ma thams cad rgyal po'i rtse 'jos rtse zhing rol bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis 'dzam bu gling pa'i ma nyams cad/
la cod pan dang/ dar dang/ gos dang/ rgyan dang 2 chu bzhag rnams byan ban 'di lta ste/ mgul gdub dang/ gdu bu dang/ dpung rgyan dang 2 dngoshal dang/ samo de dang/ mu
tig gi chun 'phyang dang/ rgyal po la 'os pa rnams sbyin pa rab tu sbyin no// dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od kyis rgyal po la 'os pa/ 2 gos dang/ rgyun dang/ cod pan dad/ dar rnams rab tu
phyin pa gang gis ji ltar 'dzam bu gling pa'i ma thams cad rtsod pan thogasashang/ dar dpyangs 'ching bar gyur te/ rgyal po zla 'od rnam pa ci 'dra bar gyur ba/ 'dzam bu'i gling ga ma thams cad

kyang de dang bor gyur te// de ltar rab tu byin no// dge slong dag rgyal bo zla 'od kyis rgyal bo'i pho brang rdo bzangs su dril bsgrags te/ 'dzam bu gling ga ma khyad thams cad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
rgyal po'irtsi 'jos rtse zhang rolatsagaces bsgragasaso// dge slong dag de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis dral bsgrags pa// 'dzam bu gling gi mi thams cad kyis thos pa dang/ thams cad rgyal
pa'i rtsa 'jo'i rtsib la zhugs te/ pa wang dad/ gling bu dang/ 'khar rnga dud/ sgra babs de da/ ba wang rgyud gsum pa dang/ rda rangs dad/ jo rje dad/ dung stong phrag dang/ sa
snyan brgya snyed kyisgra'i rol mo brdung zhing/ dpung rgyan dang/ do shal dang/ sa med dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig gi rgyan rnams dang/ rnam thogs pa dang/ rgyan gyis brgyan la/ bud
med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/ rgyal srid kyadapal la rjes su spyod par gyur to// yang de'i tshade 'jus na rgyal po'i pho brang rdobazasan/ ma rnams rgyal pa'i rtse 'jos rol te/
pa wang dad/ glang bu dang/ 'khar rnga dang/ sgra bzangs dang/ pa wa da rgyud gsum ba dang/ rdza rnga dang/ rda rangs dad/ dung gi sgras grong khyer drug khri brgyad stong du sgra bsgrags
pa dang/ gang yang rgyal bo zla 'od kyi sbyin gtong gi gnas bzhir gser gyi rnga bo che rnams brdudas pa dang/ 'di lta bu'i yid du 'ong ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to// 'di lta ste/ sum cu rtsa
gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang/ lha'i grong khyer den glu dang/ gar dang/ rol mo'i sgra sgrogs so// dge slong dag de bzhin du de 'a tshe de'i dusan/ 'dzam bu gling ba' mi thams cad rgyu dang/
gar dang/ rol mo'i sgras gcig tu bde ba la 'jog cing shin tu dga' bor gyur to// da da'i tshe rgyal bo'i pho brang rdo bzangasan/ bye ba dung phyur bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi ma rnams gnasaso//
bzhi/ shAkya yang dag spyod dag rgyal po zla 'od chos kyis gzugs bzang ba/blta na sdug pa/mdzes pa ste/ gzhan yang 'di skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i yid dga' bar gyur to// gzhan yang 'di skyes
sku pa dang/ bud med rnams kyis mthong ban/ ngoms par ma 'gyur ba'i dga' ba thob bo// dus gang gi tshargyal po zla 'od grod khyer nas byad ste/ sman gtong gi gnas su sed ba na/ sog
chags bye ba brgya stod dang ga tu mthong ba med pa rnams lta zhing 'di skad kyang sla ste/ kye ma rgyal po zla 'od 'di ni lha zhig 'ongs nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dare rgyal po byed pa yan/ rgyal
( pa zla 'od kyi gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ dbyabs de lta bu n 'dzamabu'i gling pa'i ma rnams la yod pa ma yin no/de gang dang gang du bltas pa de dang de dag tu bud med stong phrag gas
bltas te/ bud med gang 'dra khyor rnyed pa 'daskal ba can yin no// gzhan zhig gis sa pa/ sems dag rnams kyis rnyed kyis/ gzhan dag gas ma yan te/ rgyal po zla 'od 'di
na lha dang 'dra bar blta'o// dge spyod dag rgyal po zla 'od kyi blon po stong phrag phyed dang bcu gsum yod de/ de rnams kyi nang na blun po gnyis ni byin pa thams cad las khyad par du 'phags
pa yin te// blon po zla ba bzang po dang/ sa 'dzin zhes bya ba gnyis mkhas par grags pa blo dang ldan pa// las thams cad la dbang byed pa// rgyal po'i gces spras byed pa//
@# rgyal ba yongs su skyeng// rgyal po'i las kyi mtha' thams cad la sems las chung dur byed pa dang/ blon po'i mchog zla ba bzang po ni 'dzam bu gling pa'i ma khyed rnams ji srid 'tsho
kha'i bar du dge ba bcu'i la25 kyi lam 'di yang dag par blangs la gnas par gyis shig/ ces 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i ma thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dang yang du sbyor bar
byed de/ dge slong dag blon po'i mchog zla ba bzang po'agadams ngag rjesasu ston pa 'di lta bu byed par gyur to// dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po zla 'o don byon
po'i mchog zla ba bzang po la sdug par gyur pa dang/ dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar gyur te/ gzhan yang de'i kha dog dad/ dbyibs la 'das bltas pa na ngoms pa med de/ skad cig kyad
de ma speng bar gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tsho/ blon po'i mchog zla ba bzang po'i rmi lam du/ du ba'i mdog can gyi sha za rnams kyis rgyal po zla 'od kyi cod pan 'phrog par rmis/
sad nas de 'jigs skrag pas rengs par gyur cing/ spu zing zhes byed de/ nges par rgyal po zla 'od kyi dbu slong ba zhig 'ong bar ma 'gyur ram/ lhan thams cad stsol ba/ thanA
cad yongs su gtong ba yin te/ 'ad u0f7ala ni dman pa dang/ mgon med pa dang/ 'phongs ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dad/ slong ba rnams la ma stsol ba dang/ yongs su ma gtod
ba na gzhan ci yang ma mnga' bas na/ rgyal bo zla 'od la rmi lam 'di mi'i/ gzhan du na rin po che'i mgo rnams byas la/ mdzod dang bad bar bcug la bzhag ste/
rgya gal te 'ga' zhig lca'adabu slong ba 'ongs par gyur na/ de la rin pa che'i mgo 'di rnams kyis srid par bya'o snyam nas/ rin po che'i rgyu las byas pa'i mgo byas te/ mdzod dang bang
rnams su bzhag par gyur te// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe blon po'i mchog sa 'dzin gyi rmi lam du rgyal po zla 'od kyi rin po che rnams kyi mgo rnam pa brgyar lhags pa rmas pa dang/ yang
'jigs shing skag la kun tu skyonas rgyal po zla 'od rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am srog gi bar chad du ma 'gyur grang snyam nas// yang bram ze ltas mkhan mkhas pa rnams bas/
sa/ bdag gis 'di lta bu'i rmi lam rmis pa rmi lam de'i 'bras bu ji lta bu yin pa lung ston cig/ ltas mkhan rnams kyis slas pa// rmi lam mthong ba 'ad ji lta ba lasan/
rid po ma thogs par lha'i dbu skyod ba 'ga' zhig 'ong bar gyur te/ 'di 'dra bar ston pa yin no// de skad thos pa dang/ yang byon pa'i mchogs 'dzin lag pa 'gram nga la gtad de//
shan tu sems pa la zhugs pas gnas par gyur te/ rgyal po zu 'od byams pa'i bdag nyid can snyade rje dad ldan pa sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/ ma rtag pa nyid/
kyi stebs nye bar gnas pa ni ha cang myur ches// de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tsho/ blon po stong phrag phyed dang bcu gsum po rnams kyis rmi lam 'di ltar mthong ste/ 1 rgyal po zla 'od kyi sbyin
gtod ga gzhusakhang bzhi ru gnod sbyin lag na thod pa thogs pa rnams kyis gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan rnams bskyel ba dang gser gyi rnga bo chasang bcag par rmis pa/
dang/ yang 'jigs shing skag lasams nas/ rgyal po zla 'od s chen po skyed ba/ byams pa/nyi bdag nyid can sAdirje dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/ mi
rtag pa nyid kyi stobs kyis phyin par ma 'gyur ram/ bdag cag rnams lha dang lhan cig pas gnas tha dad par 'gyur ba dad/ so so ba dang/ dbya ba dang bral bar ma 'gyur rom/
'dzam bu gling pa rnams skyabs dang dpung gnyen med par ma 'gyur ram/ de rgyal po zla 'od kyis kyang thos pa dang/ yang grong khyer drug khri brgyad stod du dra'i bsgrags te/ 'dzam bu gling
pa'i ma khyed rnams ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du rgyal po'i rtse 'jos rtse 'di rol cig/ khyed rnams sgyu ma lta bu'i rmi lam la sems pas ci zhig bya/ rgyal po zla 'od kyis dril bsgrags pa thos pa
dang/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi thamasacad sa'i snyan chen po dang/ pa wang dang/ gling bu dang/ 'khar rnga dang/ sgra bzangs dang/ pa wang rgyud gsum pa dang/ rdza rnga dang/ jo
[bya// radis dang/ dung stod brag snyad kyi rol mo brdung zhung rtsa bar brtsams pa dang/ gser gyi dpung rgyan dang/ do shal dang/ se mo do nor bu'i rna rgyan thogasashad/
rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ rgyal bo'i dengal la rjes su spyod par gyur to// yang de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling na klu dang/ gar dad/

rol mo'asgra dang/ grong khyer drug khri brgyad steng du glod bu nges par 'bud pa dang/ gang yang spyan gtod ga gnas chen po bzhir gser gyi rda bo chab rdungs pa la snyan cing yid du 'od ba'i sgra byung
blo bar gyur te/ des 'dzam bu gling thams cad sgra sgrags bar gyur te/ dper na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi nang na glu dad/ gar dad 1 rol mo sgra bsgrags pa
u0fc4/ gzhan na yang de'atshade'adus na ra spros kyi da ltadan/ bram ze drag pa'i mog ces bya ba mag 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa zhig gnas pa dang/ bram ze drag po'i mig gas rgyal po'i pho brang rje
khazad san/ rgyal po zla 'od ces bya ba thams cad ster bar thos so// thos nas kyang bdag nyid kyis bsams pa// bdag sed la mgo bslang na gal te thams cad gtong bar gyur
ba yanan na bdag la yang mgo ster bar 'gyur ro// gzhan du na gang sdug pa dang/ 'phangs ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ mngon par dga' bar bya ba yan lag gse mchog mgo/
bongs su gtod ba 'di ni dka' ba dad/ 'di ni gnas med pa dang/ 'di ni go skabs med desnyam nas ri spres kyi ngad ldang las babs sa// de nas sbes kyi ngad ldang na gnas pa'i lha/
ma zhig du bar rtsoms te/ kyi hud rgyal po zla 'od byams pa'i bdag nyid can sAng rje dang ldan pa// sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin da/ mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas
ban sdug bsngal lo// yang de 'tshade'ajus na 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du bas mun nag tu gyur te/ 'khrugs shing kun tu 'khrugs bar gyur pa dang/ skar mda' lung ba dang/ phyogs
sug pa dang/ bar snang la lha rnams mya ngan byed par gyur to// yang de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bo'i pho brang rdo bzangs dang ha cang mi ring ba zhigan sna tshogs bshes gnyen zhes bya ba'i drang
srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa// byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can sems can thams cad mnyes gshin ba zhig 'khor lnga brgyas bskor nas gnas te/ de nas drang srong
des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad 'khrugs shang/ kun tu 'khrugs par mthong ba dad 'khor rnams la stsas pa/ gang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad da ltar du bos mun nag tu
gyur te/ 'khrugs shang/ kun tu 'khrugs par gyur pa dad nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyang lham mi ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin/ lhan no ma yin pa bu khyed rnams kyis shes sam/
nges bar skyes bu chen po 'ga' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar/ mi 'am ya tshogs dang nags kyi lha rnams du// nam mkhar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang na
smod par byed// zla ba gza tshad nyim dag kyang 'od zer mang par gyur// deng na rol mo brdungs kyang sgra ni gragam gyur// me tog 'bras bur ldan pa'i shang tshogs 'ad dag kyang// rlung
gas ma bskyod bzhin dus/la ltad bar gyur// rdza ltar 'jigs ba'i sgra 'di kun tu thus pas na// grong khyer du nusdug bsngal m bzad 'byung bar gsal// rgyu des grong khyer gnas ba'i
sbyab ma lus ba// sems la sdug bsngal kun tu gtugs nas 'jog pa dang// tshongs 'debasashing lag pa snyad du rdabos pa/ra byed// ska rnams rab tu grol zhing tshagi ni rnam par 'gag/
zla ba'i gdong can bud med rnams rab tu ngu// grong khyer gnas pa kun kyang snying brtsis du bar byed// sprin 'di rnams kyang char ma 'bab par sgra sgrogs la// chu yi gnas rnams 'bar
bskams pa nyid du gyur// ri dang nags rnams kyang namo bzad ma yas bsregs// ma rnams so so'i khyim na shin tu 'khrugs pas du// chu la rlung gis bskyod pa'i gru ban sa rnams
g.yos pa dang/ shin tu rtsub pa'i rdul dang 'dra ba'i rlung ldang 'gyur/ bkra ma shis pa'i mtshan man/ da ltar 'dan rnam mad ste/ de na bdagacog shas pa ya// phyogs su 'gro
pa shin tu rigs// gzhan yang bu rnams rgyal po zla 'od kyi sbyin gtong gi gnas gzhir gser gyi rnga bo che brdungs na yang yid du 'ong ba'i lha 'byung bar ma gyur pas nages par rgyal ba'i pho brad
rje bzangs der da bar 'tshe ba chen de 'byed bar 'gyur ro// de nas bram ze drag po'i mig gis rgyal po' pho brang rdo bzangs su phyin to// de nas grong khyer na gnas pa'i lhames bram ze drag po'i
mag rgyang ring pa nyadi nas mthong ba dang/ rgyal po zla 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po zla 'od la 'ad skad ces smras so// gang 'di lha mkhyen par mdzod cig/ de radi lha'i dbu
slong ba 'tsho ba rnam par rtsom pa// de nas rgyal po glags lta ba zhig 'od bar gyur te/ de lha'i dbu slong bar 'gyur gyas/ de lhas sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag nyid
yongs su bsrung bar mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal bo zla 'od kyi mgo slong bar shes pas 1 yade rab tu dga' zhing ngo mtshar gyis mag gdungs pa dang/ lcam la s+sas pa// lha mo ma 'jigs
par sang zhog/ gal te 'od bar gyur na/ ngas 'di'i yun ring mnas mngon par 'dod ba'i yid la re ba longs su rdzogs par bya'o// de nas lha mo des rgyal po zla 'od rtsol ba tshul de lta bu
shes pas/ sdug bsngal zhing yade ma bde bar de nyid du ma snang bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po zla 'od 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis dbyig dang/ gser dang/ zas
[p]// 'dod pa rnams la zas spyan pan ngo mtshar su zhig che/ gang yang bdag gas slong ba rnams la rang nyid kyi lus kyang yongs su gtong bar bya'o// de nas bram ze drag po//
mag grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgonas zhugs pa dang/ grong khyer gyi lha mos bzlog ste/ bram ze sdig can ma zhugs par sur song zhage/ skyes bu gti mug can khyed da ltar rgyal po zla
'od byams pa'i bdag nyid can snying rje dang ldan pa// yon tan dpag tu med pa phun sum tshogs pa// 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su skyod bar byed pa/ nyes pa med pa/ gnod pa ma byed
pa/ mgo drag po'i sems kyis ji ltar gcod par byed/ bram ze sdig can ma zhugs par sad zhag/ rnam pa 'di dag rgyal po zla 'od kyis thos se// thos nas kyang nga' slong/
mo pa lha mos grong khyer gyi sgon bkag go snyam nas/ yang blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po la sbas pa/ gang 'di zla ba chen pos shes par gyisAshog/ nga'i slongs ma bu lha mas/
grong khyer gyi sgo na bkag go/ seng la nga'i thad du ranges par khyer la shog cige/ lha de ltar 'tshal la nas byon pa'i mchog blon po chen po zla 'od kyi tshig mnyan nas/ grong khyer gyi
lha mod bzlog ste/ gang 'di lham shes par gyis shog/ lha bram ze 'di 'gugs kyis bram ze 'di thong shog/ de nas grong khyer na gnas pa'i lta mes/ zla ba chen de la 'daskad
sa smas go/ gang bang zla ba chen pos shes bar gyis shig/ bram ze 'di ni gtum pa'i sems dang/ snyade rjemed ba'i sems dang/ mi bzad pa'i sims kyis rgyal po zla 'od M
brlag nga' phyir rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs su 'ong na/ khyed la rang bzhin ngan pa 'das ru zhig bya/ rgyal po zla 'od kyi thad du song nas mgo slong bar 'gyur ro// de nas byon pa'i mchog
zla ba chen pas// lha me la smras pa// lha mo gang gis bram ze 'das lha'i dbu 'dzin par ma 'gyur ba'i thabs shig bsams da pal yod do// de nas blon po'a mchog zla ba chen pos bram
khri drag po'i mag khrid de/ de grong khyer du zhugs nas rin po che'i mdzod pa la slas pa// khyod kyis rin pa ma las byas pa'i mgo rnams khyer la shog cig dang/ bram ze 'di la ngas spyan par
bya'o mdzod pas kyang rgyal po'i dkor rin po che'i mgo rnams kyi phung po chen pa byas pa dang/ blon po' mchog zla ba chen pos bram ze drag po'i mig la rin po che las byas pa'i mgo rnams
cu bar bstabs te/ bram ze chen po rin po che'i mgo mang po lod zhig dang/ dbyag dang gser rnams kyis kyang dzatsam dgos pa khyod la sbyin gyis khyeratsag/ 'das na khyod kyi bu dang/
tsha bo'i bar gyi 'tsho bar 'gyur gyi/ lha'i dbu klad pa dang/ rus pa dang/ dar snabs dang/ zhag gas yongs su gad bsazhig bya/ de skadabusas pa dang/ bram ze drag po'i
byabya mag gas/ zla ba chen po la 'di skad ces sa so// gang 'ad blo ba chen pos shes par gyis shig/ nga la ni rin po che'i mgo rnams dgos pa med de//
gser dang dbyig kyang dgos ba med kyi/ gzhan du na sa chen po skyong thams cad gtong ba 'di 'i mgo slong ba'i phyir 'di'i thod du 'ongs so// de skad cesas ba dad/ blon po'a mchog
zla ba chen bo dang/ sa 'dzin gnyis lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de/ da na dus kyis phyin to snyam nas/ shin tu sems pa la zhugs pas gnas par gyur to// de nas rgyal po zla 'od
kyi'i rnam ba de dag nye bar thos nas/ blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po dad/ sa 'dzin gnyis pho nyas bos nas/ 'di skad ces smasas// bram ze de nga'i gan du khyer las sheg dug/
zu ngas 'di la yun ra de po nas mngon par 'dod pa'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang/ blon po mchog zla ba chen pa dang/ sa 'dzin gnyis po de yul
rgyas pa de ltakhu'i mchi ma 'a gdod gas sAng rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don dang smras pa// lho byams pa 'ibadag nyid can snying rje dang ldan pa// sems can thams cad la mnyis
gshan pa// yon tan dpag tu med ba/ phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ ye shes la mkhas pa// lha'i mig dang ldan pa 'di ma rtag pa nyid kyi stobs nye bar gnas par gyur to/
bdag cag rnams deng dang lhan cig pa las tha dad par gyur po dang/ so sor 'gyur ba dang/ bral ba dang// bye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te phyogs
gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po zla 'od thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ shin tu khyad par can gtong zhing yongs su gtong bar 'dod nas/ ring po nas bram ze de la smras pa// bram
za tshur shog/ khyod gang slong ba de khyer cig/ de nas bram ze drag po'i mig rgyal po zla 'od gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po zla 'od la rgyal ba dang/ tshe spel ba brjod nas/ rgyal
po zla 'od la 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dang 'a dngos po thams cad gtong la dga' bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' dag khyod dri med chos la gnas// ngam pa kun
mkhyen mngon par bzhed pa'i thugs kyas na// thugs rje bdag nyid thugs ldan bdag la dbu stsol cig/ de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyis bram ze las de lta bu'i tshig brjod pa thos pa dang/
yadi rab tu dga' ba dang/ dga' bas mig gdangs te bram ze drag po'i mig la smas po/ ngo ltar yab kyi bu gcig gang yan yang// de lta na yang nga yi mgo 'dod khyer// khyod kyis/
bsams pa 'bras bur bcas gyur cig/ mgo bo byan pas byang chub thob par shog/ nga'i mgo klad pa khrag dang zhag 'dalas// khyod kyi 'dod pa'i bya ba ci yang ma byed kyang//
khyer te khyod la nga la mgo gang dgos gyur pa'i// yid la re ba 'bras bcas khyod na dga' bar shog/ bram ze chen po khyod kyis nga'i yan lag gi mchog mgo 'di bar
zla chad med par legs par khyer cig ces smras nas/ rang nyid kyis cod pan phud do// dge slong dag rgyal po zla 'od kyis mgo la yod pa'i cod pan bud ma thag tu 'dzam bu gling pa'i cha
thams cad kyi mgo la yod pa'i cod pan rnams kyang lhung bar gyur to// rgyal po'i pho bradardo babangs kyi phyogs bzhir skar mda' rnams ltung bar gyur te/ grong khyer gyi lha mes rgyal po zla
'od 'di'i mgo bram ze sdog can gyis gcad par 'gyur ro zhes sgra bsgrags so// de nas blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po dang/ sa 'dzin gnyis rgyal po zla 'od tshul 'di lta burang nyid kyi lus/
yongs su gtong bar shes nar// de khul smus pa lta bu'i mchi ma'i gdong can gyis rgyal po'i rkang par la gtugs te/ gang lta yang mthong ba 'dana'ajig rtenan skyes bu skal ba can
no zhes snyan shang/ de gnyis de la sems mngon par dad pas lta zhing/ yul bus bram ze drag po'i mig la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa dang/ lha'amag rtag pa'i nyid la blta bar
ma nus so snyam du bsams nas/ skad cig ma de nyid la dus byas te 2 'dod pa'i khams thams cad las yang dag par 'das nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rtan du skyes so//
dzi nas rgyal po zla 'od kyi 'bad pa'i tshul 'ad lta bu shes nas sa la gnas pa'i gnod sngon rnams dad bar snang la rgyu ba'i gnod sbyin rnams cho ngas 'debs par brtsams te/ kyi hud
da na rgyal po zla 'od kyi lus yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal lo// de nas rgyal po'i pho brang sger srog chags brgya sted du ma 'dus par gyur to// de nas bram ze drag po'i
mag gas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa de mthong nas rgyal pa zla 'od la 'daskad ces sasaso// gal te lhas gnang bar mdzad na/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i mdun du lha'i dbu len
rdzom thog go/ gal te khyod dbu yongs gtong bar mdzad na/ khyed dang bdag dben pa zhig tu gshigs 'tshal lo// de skad ces smras pa dang/ rgyal po zla 'od kyis/ thum ze
drag po'i mog las pa// bram ze chen po de bzhin du bya yas/ khyod kyi kun tu rtog par 'bur tsa/ rang ga yid la re ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur nug dge spyod
dag rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs kyi nang na/ nor bu dang/ rin po che'i snyade po zhes bya ba'i ri skyed mos tshal shing sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes pa// nyams dga' ba ni tse dang//
sha ra'i ka dang/ khu byug dang/ rma bya dang/ shang shang te'u dang/ ka la bad rnams yid du 'ong ba'aAny+tsegos pas/ nags tshal gyi tshogs nyams dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal
dbus kyastegs bu de'i dbus su tsam pa ka' shing zhig skyes pa yod do// de nas rgyal po zla 'od rgyal po'anyin las langs te/ ral grirnan po shugs nas/

k+Sha nor bu dang/ rin po che'i snying pa'i skyed mos tshal ga la ba der sod ngo// de nas rgyal po zla 'od 'bad pa'i tshul 'di lta bu la zhugs pa mthong ba dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs grong khyer na
srog chags brgya stod du mas cho ngas 'debs shing rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du'abrang ba dang/ rgyal po zla 'od kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa de tsho nges 'debs pa mthong ngo//
mthong ba dang pa rdo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir ts+tshasapa// khyed rnams dge ba'i chos rnams la yang bag yod par gyis shiganyis mdor bsdus nas chos bstan te/ bram ze drag po'i mig
khrod nas nor bu dang/ rin po che'asAng po'iskyed mes tshal du zhugs// rgyal po zla 'od nor bu dang/ rin po che'asnying po'askyed mes tshol du zhugs ma thag tu rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzadu
kyi dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan rnams nor bu dang/ rin po che'i skyed mos tshal ga la ba der 'dug par gyur to// de nas rgyal po zla 'od kyanor bu dang/ rin po che'i snyad pa'i
snyed mes tshal gyi sgo bcad nas/ bram ze lasmas pa/ bram ze chen panga' yan lag gi mchog 'di khyer cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ bram ze drag po'i mig gis 'di skad
0 nyis smasas/ lha'i dbu bdag gis gtsed par rje mthog go/ de skadanyis sbas pa dang/ rgyal po zla 'od ral gri rnon po thogs nas skyed mes tshal der gdan du thams cad pa'i tsam pa/
ka'i shing yod pa der song ngo// de nas skyed mos tshal de'i lha mes rgyal po zla 'od tshul 'ad lta bur rang nyid yongs su gtong ba la zhugs par shes nas/ tshe des 'debs par brtsom zhing
'juskad ces kyang skyasaso// bram ze sAg can khyod de ltar rgyal po zla 'od nyes pa med pa gnod pa med pa// yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa 'di'i mgo jaltar gacod par byed/
denas rgyal po zla 'od kyis skyed mos tshal gyi lha mes de'i phyir bzlog ste/ lha mo nga'i mge song ba la bar chad ma byed nug// de ba'i phyir zhin/ lha mo sngon byung ba na nga'i yan lag ga mchog
myong ba la lha mo zhig gis bar chad byas pas/ lha mo'i bsod nams ma yin pa mang pospus la/ ngas kyang bla na med pa'i phashes yun ring po zhig gas theb par 'gyur ro// lca ma ngas
nor bu rin po che'i snying po' skyid mes tshal 'di nyid mgo stangaskyed yongs su gtong ba byas nas/ nga la sus kyang bar chad ma byas// de bas na lca me khyod kyis nga'i yan lag ga mchog
slong ba la bar chad ma byed cig/ lha mo gang du sa stag me la bdag nyid yongs su gtong ste/ lus yongs su gtong ba gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bskal pa bzhi
tha// bcur zhugs pa/ phyir 'dums par byas pa'i sa phyogasani 'di yin no// de nas lha mo do rgyal po zla 'od kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po de mthong nas/ rgyal po de la sems
mgu ba chen pa skyes te/ cang mas+sa bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po zla 'od yang dag pa'i smon lam byed pa la zhugs te/ gang skyed mos tshal gyi tshigs na gnas pa'i lhadang/ klu dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dad ma 'amacu'i khyed rnams gson cig/ bdag skyed mes tshal 'di'i rab tu gtong ba'i yang zhe tu gtong ba rang gamago yongs su gtong ba'i gtong ba
N+NaM byed de/ bdag gi mgo yongs su gtong ba de yang rgyal po'i phyir ma yan/ mtho mos kyaphyir ma yin/ bdud kyi phyir ma yin/ tshangs pa'i phyir ma yan/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i
yul gyi phyir ma yazhi gyi/ gzhan ngun 'di ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sa/ sems can ma dul ba 'dul gdang (ma rgyal
ba bsgral ba dang/ ma grel ba dgrol ba dang/ dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yengs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// bdenapa dang bden
pa'i tshig 'dis ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas por gyur cig/ yongs sumya ngan las 'das nas kyang yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gdung byung bar gyur cig/ nor bu dang/ rin po che'i
[skyed mos tshal 'di'i dbus su yang mchod rten chen po mchod rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa byung bar gyur nas/ sems can gang na lus ngal ba mchod rten chen po la phyag 'tshal du/
'ong bar gyur cig/ de rnams kyimachod rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa sku gdung 'jog pa de mthod bas ngal ba med par gyur cig/ngal ba med par gyur nas/ nga'i mchod rten
la skye bo'i tshogs 'disanas mchod pa byed na mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhol bar yad gyur cig ces smras nas/ tsan pa ka' shadi la gtsug phud bcangs nas bram ze la bos te snas nga// bras
ze chen po tshur shog/ bgegs ma byed par nga'i mgo bregs la khyer cig/ de nas rgyal po zla 'od rang nyid kyi lus kyi mthu dang stobs yang dgapor sbyin nas bram zed lasnyad rje chen po lhan
cig tu 'grob dad/ 'byung ba'i byams pa'i sems bskyed nas mgo bcad de/ bram ze drag po'i mig la byon no// dus byas pa dang/ tshangs pa'i 'ag rten las shin tu 'das nas/
phul du byung ba'i dag rgyas kyi nang du skyes so// dge slong dag de nas mgo yongs su btang ma thag tu yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/
ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos te/ nam mkha'i dkyil na mdon par gnas ba' lha rnams kyang a la la zhes sgra bsgrags so// khar snang ga lha rnams kyang lha'i
ut+pa la dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu ta dang/ put+tAr ka rnams 'thor zhing/ a ka ru'i phyi ma rnams dang/ tsan dan gyi phyi ma rnams dang/ lha rnams kyi me tog man
da ra ba dang/ man da ra ba chen po rnams 'thor ba dang/ gos rnams kyi char yang 'bebs so// lha rnams kyi rol mo' pad yang dag par brdung ngo// de nas bram ze drag po'i mig mgo
khyer te/ nor bu dang/ rin po che'i snying pa'i skyed mos tshal nas byung ba dang/ srog chags brgya stong du mas kyi hud lta bsad de sdug bsngal la zhes sgra phyung// de na kha cig ni sa la 'ge
ldog ge/ khacug na lag pa brkyangs te tshe ngas 'debs so// bud med rnams kyang skra bshag nas ngu'o// srog chags brgya stod du a yad 'dus to de na gcig tu gnas te/ de nyid du
gnas nas/ bsam gtan rnams bskyed de/ de nyid du dus byas nas/ rgyal po zla 'od dang skal ba mnyam par dge rgyas kyi lha rnams su skyes s// khacug na bsam gtan bskyed/
nas gnas te/ de nyid du dus byas te/ 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skyes so// gzhan rnams nadus byas nas rgyal po zla 'od kyi lus du thams cad dang ldan nga'i rosreg pa'i shang byas
te sregasas// rus pa de rnams kyang gser gyi bum par bcugaste/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor sku gdung gi mchod rten rab tu bzhugaste/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ brtan
btsugs te/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ sres kyi phyi ma dang/ rol mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/ rgyal po zla 'od la gcig tu sems mngon par dad pas/ de bzhin du skye/
bas bsam gtan bskyed de/ bsam gtan bskyed pa des tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes se// la la ni rgyal po zla 'od ma mthong bas mya ngan gyi zol gyis mnan te dus byas nas 'dod pa
na spyod pa'i lha drud du skyes so// gang der dus byas pa de dag kyang mtho ris dang/ thar pa la gzhol bar gyur to// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dusan/ byang phyogs na rgyal po'i pho brang rdo
bzad s su gyur pa de gzhan yin par ma blta ste/ rdo 'jog 'ad nyid de'i tshor 'dus na rgyal po'i pho brang rdo bzangs su gyur to// dge sung dag ji snyam du sems/ gang rgyal po zla 'od
ces bya ba de ni de yin te/ de'i tshade'adusan byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs te/ de nyid kyis nor bu dang/ rin po che'asnyade po'askyed mos tshal du bram ze drag po'i mig la mgo
yongs su btud do// dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems/ gang bram ze drag po'i mig ces bya ba de ni lhas byin yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze drag po' mag ces bya bar gyur to//
dge slong dag de ji snyam du sems/ gang de'i tshoda'adusan/ blon po'i mchog zla ba chen po dang/ sa 'dzin de gnyis na dge slong shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'galagyi bu 'di gnyis yin
'di gnyis kyis nga yang mya ngan las 'das pa ma bzod nas/ nga nyid 'chab ma mthong bar thog ma nyid du dus byas so// da ltar yang da mya ngan las 'das
nga ma bzod de/ gang ma ngan las 'das pa ma mthong bar de thog ma nyid du mya ngan las 'das pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de rago ya
rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// rgyal po zla 'od kyi rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shwa b+ha dra
dang/ zhu chen rgya lo tsa ba dge slong shes rab legs pas bsgyur/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos te gtan la phab pa//
nga#// rgya gar skad du/ su ma ga d+ha a ba dA na ma/ bod skad du/ ma ga d+ha bzang mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sa mas dang 'a thams cad la phag
'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyan gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas de'i tsha ma na yod na/ mgon med
zas sbyin gyi bu mo ma ga rdo bzang me zhes bya ba dad pa dang ldan pa// rang bzhin bzang ba/ bsam pa dge ba/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa zhig gnas so// ji tsaman
bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i grong khyer na tshong dpon gzhan zhig gnas la/ des bu khyu mchog byan zhes bya'o// de yang gnamu stegs pa bsten pas/ gcer bu pa rnams la mngon
rar dad pa zhig gnas pa dang/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul chen po rnam par bstan pa de'i tshe/ mu stegs pa rnams mtha' 'khob tu kun tu gnas te/ la la na grong khyer/
bzang byed ces bya bar na'o// la la na mud kyiri ka zhes bya ba'i yul na'o// la la na bu ram shange 'phel zhes bya ba'agrong khyeran gnas so// de'i tshe de'adres na/ khyu mchog byin
de'i bar du khyim bdag ma byas ba dang/ de la gcer bu pa rnams kyisas pa// mgon med zas sbyin gyi bum ma ga d+ha bzang mo zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa//
mdzes pa// skye bo dam pa rnams dang 'dra ba zhig yod do// ji srid des shes pa dang/ bdag nyid gcer bu pa'i cha byad du byas te/ mnyan yod du seng ngo// jatsam na khyim bdag
mgon med zas sbyan gyi khyim du slong ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang/ des bu mo de mthong do// mthong ba'i mod khon la bu ma di la kun tu chags par gyur la// de der bslangs pa'i phyi zhwa'o/
nang du blangs so// de nas bu medas log par spyod pa de mthong ba dang/ 'di ni shes med par srongs me lan to zhes brgal to// de nas khyu mchog byin de ngo tsha bar gyur pa dang/ bu ram/
[r/ ]@#// shang 'phel gyi grong khyer du song ste/ pha las nas/ des bu mo de bslangasas/ mgon med zas sbyan gyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan
'as kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan du gang ga tsho ma ga d+ha bzang mo 'di su ramashang 'phel du sodon rab tu byung ba rnams kyi bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// yang ji
sridi cig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi nye du rnams la yang go bar byas nas byin pa dang/ bu ram shing 'phel du khyer ro// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tsho khyim de na gcer bu pa
rnams zan za ba dang/ de la drug mos smras pa/ de rad bdag cag gi khyim n mchod gnas rnams bshos gsol gyis tshur shog/ mchod gnas rnams la ltos shig ma ga d+ha
bzang mos de thos pa dang/ dgo' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ radas pa dang/ yidi bde ba skyes te bsams pa// nges par btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'am/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po lasog
pa nyan thos chen po rnams byon par gyur to snyam nas/ de yid rab tu dga' ba dang/ 'jigs pa med par song ba dang/ gcer bu nags kyi ma he 'dra ba/ sku rnams btogs pa/ phug
ron gyi phrug gu 'dra ba'i gces pa rnams mthong ngo// mthong ba dang de'i mod la ma ga d+ha bzang mo ngo tsha ste/ de gdod gzhan du bltas pa dang/ de la smyug ma des smras pa// bumo khyod/
ci'i phyir yi mug par gyur/ des s pa// gang 'di lta bu mchod gnas yin na mchod gnas ma yin pa go ji lta bu zhig yod par 'gyur/ de la des snyas pa// bu mo khyod la 'ad/
bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa 'ga' zhig yod dam bu mas smas pa// bdag ga pha'i gtsug lag khang rgyal byed kyi tshal nas nigs rgyas zhes bya ba'i ston pa bzhugs te/
don rgyu ba dang ma rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi mchod gnas yin no// khyod kyiston pa de tse 'dra ba zhig/ smras pa// bdag gi ston pa tsam pa'i tshogs ltar ser// btso ma gser ltar shan tu
dri ma med// tshul khrims rnam dgashes dang shin tu dag/ 'jig rten gsum n mnyam med 'gro las 'phags// de thos ma thag tu sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nasasnyas pa//
bu mo nged cag rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das de sang bstan par nusasam/ ma ga d+ha bzang mos sas pa// bshos gtsang rnams sbyor cig dang/ sang bcom ldan 'das spyan drang
bar bya'o// jitsam na de rnams kyis sbas pa/ bgro gtsang rnams sbyar gyas/ khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das spyan drongs shig/ de nas ma ga d+ha bzang mas khang pa'i yang thegag
steng du mngon par 'dzegs nas/ phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i phyogs der thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran te/ me tog
rnams 'thor zhing spros kyang gtul nas/ gser gyi bum pa'i chus bcom ldan 'das sngan drang pa'i phyir/ gser gyi bum pa 'chu yang sbengs sa// snying rje ba'i tshig
'di skad cesasnyas te/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// bdag naradegs dang 'dra bar gyur cing mtha' 'khob na mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum dang bral bar gyur pa la
rjes su bzung bar mdzad cade/ dge slong ga dge 'dun dang bcas par 'dir gshegs par mdzad du gsal/ yang 'ju skad cis kyang smas te/ tshul khrims rnam dag shes rab shin tudag//
dad ldan snyade po nyan thos che rnams kyis// mgon med gyur pa bdag la rjes bzung ba'i// don mdzad thugs rjes gshegs pa ra mdzad du gsel/ jatsaman mi rtog dang/ sregs dang/
gser gyi bum pa'i chu'ang nam mkha' las 'phags par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang de'i tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor rnam pa bzhi la chos ston to// gser
a gyi bum pa'i chud dang bcom ldan 'das kyi na sAr be cha rla'osdod bu bzhin du rnam par gnas so// me tog de bam ldan 'das steng gnam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa bzhin du gnas so//
dra dang sdes kyang sngon brtsegs pa bzhin du gnas par gyur to// de nas de mthong ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'dres la gsol pa// rtsom ldan 'das spyan 'dren pa 'di
[o/ ]ga las mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo dpag tshad brgya drug cu rtsa gsum na bu ram shang 'phel gyi grong khyer yod pa nas 'ongs so// kun dga' bo grong khyer
de na mu stegs pa rnams kyis bzung ba yin pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas 'gro bar bya'o zhes dge slong rnams la tshul shang brims shag/ jitsan na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
bas rganapa'i gnas mtha' nas bzung nas tshul shang brams te/ de skad ces sus te/ sad bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar byaste/ grong khyer de na mustegs pa rnams kyis
yongs su bzung bas/ khyed cag rnams las gang rdzu 'phrul thob pa des tshul shong long zhig/ ji sridi cagan rgan pa'i mtha'anas tshul shadi len par brtsams so// de yang de na pUran
kun da u pa da na zhes bya ba'i gnas brtan yod de/ der yang rdzu 'phrul ma thob par lag pa brkyang ste/ tshul shade len par brtsams pa dang/ de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa dang/
gnas brtan mgon med zas sbyan gyi khyim du 'jug pa ma yin rgyu/ gzhan du na dpag tshad brgya drug cu rtsa gsum na bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'a gnas yid dri der 'gro dgos so// de 'di
snyam du sems te/ ngas ni thog ma med pa'i dusan goms pa'i nyon medas na spangs nas/ mu stegs pa rnams dang thun med du gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta zhag dka' ba zhig yod nas bskyed
par mi bya snyam nas/ des kyang dus de nyid du rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa dang/ ji srid du tshul shang gnyis pa ma brags pa de srid du/ des gung po che'asna 'dra ba'i lag pa
kyi brkyang ste tshulang blangs so// ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug sten sa pa// gang gis rdzu 'phrul gang thob pa des bu ram shang 'phel zhes bya ba'i
grong khyer du 'gro bar bya'o// de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la nam nangs te/ dge slong rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas yang dag par chasas// de nas rgyal po rin po bzhi yang mnyan
yod gang na ba der mngon par lta bar sems/se// jatsaman bar skabs der kun shesako'u di cu zhes bya ba rta' shing rta la zhon te/ grog 'gyur ba'i snang ba ston cing dal bus char rab tu 'babu/
te de lta bu'i rad ga rdzu 'phrul rnam dparaston cinge 'ong ngo// de nas ma ga d+ha bzang mo'i bdag pos de mthong ba dang dris pa// ma ga d+ha bzang ma 'di khyad kyisten pa de yin nam/ des smras pa/
'di ni kun shes ko'u da rgya zhes bya ba yin te/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dang po bskor ba na 'dis thog mar bdag med pa mngon sum du byas pa de thog mar 'ongs/
'di yin no// bar skabs der gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos brag ga rin pa chen po shing sna tshogs pa rnam pa brgyas khyab pa/ bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab pa/ me tog sna tshogs/
yang dag par khegs pa// g.ya' chu sAtshogs kyis bar mdzes par byas pa mngon par sprul te/ steng gi nam mkha' las 'ong ngo// de nas khyim bdag des de mthong nas smras pa//
ma gad+ha bzang mo 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam/ des de la sa pa/ 'dani 'od srungs chen po zhes bya ba yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyangs pa'i yin tan la gnas par smra ba rnams
kyi mchog tu gsungs pa yin te/ 'dis gcig gis ma tshang ba'i glang dor stong bar nyad/ ser skya bzang moskye bos dge ba rnams dang mtshungs pa dang/ dbyig dang gser mang po mchil
ma'i thal ba bzhin spangs nas/ mngon par byung ste rab tu byung ba de na 'od ba 'di yin no// bar skabs der tsho dang ldan pa shA ra'i busaseng ge 'i shing rta mngon par sprul te/ steng gnam
mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ong ngo// de nas khyim bdag des de mthong ba dang dris pa// ma ga d+ha bzang mo gang seng ge 'ashing rtas 'ong ba 'di khyod kyisnyen pa de yin nam/ des de la smas pa//
'dan dge slonganA ro'i bu zhes bya ba yin te bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin te/ 'ad ma'i mngal du zhugs tsam gyis/ 'dzam bu gling
thams cad kyi rtsod par smra ba rnams las rgyal bar gyur to// 'di ni ston pa gnyis pa/ mchog gnyis pa// chos kyi ded dpon/ chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba de naseng ge 'ashadi
rtas 'ongs pa 'ad yin no// de'i rjes thog nyid la tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ glang po ches srungs 'dra ba'i glang po che'i rgyal por mngon par sprul te/
sangag nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ongs so// de nas khyim bdag des de mthong nas/ ma ga d+ha bzang mo la dris pa// gang glang po ches srungs 'dra ba'i grung pos 'od ba 'di khyod kyison/
pa de yin nam/ des de la smras pa// 'di ni dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po zhes bya ba yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa ste/ 'di'i rdzu 'phrul
sgyu gyas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang rkang pa'i mthe bas kun tu bskul ba dang/ 'dis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nyi dga' bo gnyis btul ba de/ glang po'i shing rtas
'ong ba 'di yin no// bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pasashing rta' 'phang lo tsam gyi pad+ma thams cad gser las byas pa// bai DUr+ya'i sdong bu can/ dngul gyi ge sar dang ldan par
mngon par sprul te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las 'ong ngo// de nas khyim bdag des de mthong ba dang dris pa// ma ga d+ha bzang mo 'ad khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam/ des de la smras pa///
'di ni dege sango ma 'gags pa zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de/ 'dan bsod nams kyi stobs kyis yongs su bzung bas snod chol pas
gang ba lnga brgya sgron gnas pa dang/ nung zad bsams pa tsam gyis chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ mal stan dang/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang/ yo byad rnams 'byung ba la spyod pa/
de pad+ma'adishang rtas 'ongs pa 'di yin no// bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa gang pos nam mkha' lding gteshing rta mngon par sprul te/ rdzu 'phrul gyisasteng gnam mkha' las 'ong ngo// de nas
khyim bdag des dris pa ma ga d+ha bzang mo nam mkha' ldadi gshang rtas 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ des de lo smas pa// 'din dege spyod gang po zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis
chos ston pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de nam mkha' lding gi shing rtas 'ong ba red yonan// bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa rta thul spyod lam rab tu zhi bas 'ong ngo// de nas khyim bdags
de la dris pa/ ma ga d+ha bzang mo gad lhung bzed lagan thogs te sprod lam rab tu zhi bas 'ong ba de khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam/ des do la sa pa/ 'di ni dege slong rta thul zhes bya ba yin
te/ 'di'i spyod lam rab tu zhi bas/ glang po che smyon pa btul ba dang/ 'di'i srod lam rab tu zhib mthong bas/ 'phags pa shA ra'i bus bden pa mthong bar gyur te/ de don
par byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo// rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob de spyod lam rab tu zhi bas 'ad ba 'di yin no// bar skabs der tshe
dad ldan pa nyabar 'khor gyis gser gyi ta la'i nags mngon par sprul te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sted ga nam mkha' las 'ong ngo// de nas khyim bdag des/ de la
rgyu jus pa// ma ga d+ha bzang mo gang gser gyi ta la'anyegs la rten cing 'ong ba 'ad khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam/ des de la nus pa// 'di ni dge slong nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba bcom ldan
'das kyis 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin te/ 'ad lashAkya lnga brgya tsam rab tu byung ba rnams kyi do shal dang/ gdu bu dang/ dpung rgyan dud/ gser
ny+nyo gyi gdugs la segs pa'i rgyan rnams dang/ gos rnams kyi phung po chen po mdun du bzhag pa dang/ 'asade mthong ba dang/ skyo ba chen poskyas te/ de dag thams cad ma rtag
par shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo// rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa de gser gyi ta la'anags lu brten nas 'od ba
'di yin no// de nas bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa ka ta ya na'i bu chen des bskru'i khyad pa brtsigs pa mngon par sprulate/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las 'ong ngo// de nas khyim
bdag gis dris pa/ ma ga d+ha bzang me bzlumya'i khang pa brtsigs pa na 'dug ste/ 'ong ba khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam/ sad las ba/ 'ad ni degasrong ka tu yana'i bu chen po zhes bya ba
00 bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde pa dang/ bye brag tu slab rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bi m+ma'i khang pa brtsigs pa'i nang du 'dug nas 'ong ba 'di yin no// bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa
gsus po chos khyu mchog gshing rta mngon par sprul nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gnam mkha' las 'ong ngo// de nas khyim bdag des/ de la dris ba/ mag d+ha bzang mo khyu mchog gshing rta/
la zhon te 'ong ba 'di khyod kya sten pa yin nam/ des de la smas ba/ 'dani dege slong gsus po che zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'as kyis rig pa thob pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin te/ khyu mchog
gangeshang rtas 'ong ba 'di yin no// bar skabs der tshodang ldan pasrung dbang ga bu ngang pa'i shing rta/snying gnam mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ong ngo// de nas khyim bdag des dris pa// mag d+ha
bzang mgang dad pa'i pishing rtas 'ong ba 'ad byed kyi ston pa yananam/ des de la sbas pa// 'di ni dge slong srung dbang ga bu zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis snying rje la gnas pa rnams kyi mchog
tu bstan pa de 'di yin te/ 'dan chu bo gang+ga brgal bar 'dod pa na bzang mo 'dug tsug cesastsas pa dang/ tshig de'i rjes thog nyid la ra bo brtsigs pa bzhin du gnas te/ rnam pa thams cad
du ma 'bab par byed pa de ngang pa'i shing rtas 'ong ba 'di yin no// bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa rna ba bye ba nyi shu ri nags kyi tshogs la 'chag cing 'dug pa de 'chag bzhin du 'ong ngo// des/
@#// khyim bdag des dris pa/ ma ga d+ha bzang mo gang shang nagasashing brgya dag gis khyab pa'i nags 'dal 'chag tsange 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam/ des de lasmas
zla pa3 'di'i dge slong rna ba can zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin te/ 'di skyes pa tsam gyis rnab bye bawishu ra ba dang bcas par skyes pa
dang/ gang ga rkang mthil gyi 'og nas sor bzhi tsam gyi spu yang dag par skyes pa dang/ gang 'di dang po'i zan la kar sha pa Na ltabargya zad par byas pa dang/ gang bcom ldan 'das sung ba dang/
mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bshes gtsang nye bar blangs pa dang/ gang gi dris 'od ma'i tshal thams cad dras kun tu gang ba dang/ rgyal po gzugs can snyade pes bsnyams nas/ mchog
tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ gang gi rkang pa gnyis bzhag pa tsam gyisas 'di rab tu g.yos pa dang/ gang zhig rab tu byung nas 'chag sar 'chag pa na/ de'i rkang pa gnyis las khrag byung
ba zag pa zhwa rnams 'thung ba de 'chag cade 'ong ba 'di yin no// bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha lugs mngon par sngal te 'ong ba dang/ de nas khyos
bdag des sa ra// ma ga d+ha bzang ma gang 'ad 'khor los sbyar ba'i cha byad kyis 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam/ u0f38das de la sus pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras bcom
ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin te/ 'dase yab kyis sbyangs pa'i dpalaston par byed rung/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha lugs kyi rin po che sna bdun/
dang ldan pa bu steng ga yongs su bskor te/ gza' dang/ rgyu skar dang/ skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'i zla ba lta bu dang/ rgyal po'i lam bzung nas 'gro ba'i ya'i bdag po lta bu dang/
chu bo stong phragag chu 'bab pas kun tu 'gengs pa'i rgya mtsho lta bu dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ nad dang/ mya ngan sel ba'i dgu skyong ba chen po lta bu dang/ ri dgas kyi nangan seng ge lta
bu dang/ bya rnams kyi nang na nam mkha' lding lta bu dang/ thams cad sel ba'anyam dang/ gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal bo dang/ chos bzung na mig stong dang ldan pa//
chos skyong ba lta bur 'ong ba yin no// de bshan du la lan 'bar bar byed pa dang/ lalan char 'bebs pa dang/ de bzhin du cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa ston cing 'od ba yin no// la las las
'phags pa dang/ la la nam mkha' gzhu la gnas// la lasan nastsal byed de// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mthu las// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma rnams yang dag par song ba
dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gang gis 'dzam bu gling thamasaMcad gser btso ma'i mdog 'dra ba'i 'od kyis gang ba de lta bu'i 'od bkye zhing/ mnyan yod nas brtsams te//
bu ram shing 'phel gyi bar 'dir 'od kyidakyil 'khor chen po bkye bas/ gang du yang mgags ma mthong ba med pas thams cad kyis mthong bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'as/
kyang ma mkha' la gshegs ba dang/ lag na rdo rjenasnyam logs nas 'brang ngo// gnas gtsang ba rnams n steng nasas// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams ni 'og nas so// g.yon legs
nas ni brgya byin no/ g.yas nas ni tshangs pa'o// de bzhin du gtsug lta pa dang/ shan tu dga'adang/ mag sbyin la sogs pa'i dri za rnams pa tshang dang/ glang bu dang/ rda dang/ rdza rnga
lasogs pa rol mo' bye brag sAn pa rnams brdung shang me tog dang/ gdug pa dang/ dra dang/ 'phreng ba rnams kyang 'thor zhing 'byor pa chen pos gshegs te bar skabs der bcom
ldan 'das kyis srog chags stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun bden pa la thog mar rab tu bkod pa mdzad nas/ de'i 'og tu bu ram sha 'phel gyi grong khyer du gshegs te/ grong khyer de na'ang sgo
bco brgyad yod pa dang/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas bcobargyad sprul par mdzad nas/ sgo re re zhingasnang bar gyur pa nas/ bcom ldan 'os ma ga d+ha bzang mo'i khyim du gshegs/
sa/ rnade nas spyi bo'i tshogs chen po de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma mthong ste/ de nas khros nas de'i khyim bshig par brtsams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong
khyer de thams cad shel gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te/ gang khyim thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs par mthong bar mdzad do// ji sridi bu 'am shing 'phel du ma ga d+ha bzang mo
la sogs pa'i srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang dri dang/ 'phreng ba dad/ sros rnams kyis mchod par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang
mag d+ha bzang mo la sogs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs chen po de rnams la gang zhig thosan/ ma ga d+ha bzang mo la sogs pa'i srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams kyis bden pa mngon du mthong ba thob
par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan par mdzad cung/ 'kher ri thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang/ chos la 'bab pa dang/ dge 'dun la bab par gyur to// yang dge slong rnams
the tsom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// bcom ldan 'das ji srid ma ga d+ha bzang ma mchis nas/ srog chags brgya stong du
ma mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhol bar gyur pa dang/ 'jas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis pa ni ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'dres kyis bka' stsal pa// da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/
'das pa'i dusan 'das sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dusan/ skye dgu'i tsha la nye khro thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
'od srungs zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang ma

rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ yang dus de'i tshe grong khyer wA ra Nas na/ rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i bu sogaser gyi 'phreng ba dang ldan
pa zhig btsas te/ de'amode yang gser 'phreng zhes bya bar btags so// ji srid cig na bu mo de cher skyes par gyur pa dang/ na zla gzhon nu ma lta brgya thams cad kyang/ gzhon nu mas
bskor cing thabs cig tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la bsnyen bkur byed de/ de la dod pa yang dag par thob pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das 'od srungs la ji sAd 'tsho'i bar du chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzims chu dang/ snyan gyi rkyen sman dang/ yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed do// yang
las dus de'i tshe/ rgyal po kri kris mtshan gcig la rmi lam bcu rmis te/ des smras pa/ glang po che'i rgyal pesgor khung nas byung ba na mjug ma phra mo thigs pa dang/ skom pa'i phyi nas
khron pa snyeg pa dang/ phyi bre gang dang mu tig bre gang tshong byed pa dang/ tsan dan dang shing rin mnyam par byed pa dang/ kun dga' ra ba me tog dang/ 'bras bu phunasum tshogs pa ma
byin par len pa rnams kyis phrogs pa dang/ glang po phrug gus sbos kyi glang po 'jags par byed pa dang/ spre'u mi gtsang bas gos pas gzhan la skud pa dang/ sre'u rgyal por dbang bskur/
bar mthong ba dang/ ras gcig ma bco brgyad kyis drangs kyang ma ral ba dang/ skye bo' tshogs chen po gcig tu 'dus nas/ 'thob pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ g.yul 'gyed pa dang/ mtshod
'du bar 'gyur bas 'jigs pa mthong ngo// de nas rgyal po de sad pa dang/ 'jigs shing skrag pa dang/ skyo bas nga' srog ga 'tsho ba'abar chad du 'gyur ba 'am/ rgyal sridi las
nyams par ma 'gyur ramasnyam ste/ des bram ze miltas kyi mtshan ma ston shes pa rnams bs nas de rnams la rmi lam de rnams smras s// de rnams kyang gser 'phreng can la
zhesnang ba yin pas/ de rnams kyisasmas pa/ lha khyod la thams cad kyi nang na thugs su byon pa de'asnyang dang/ me la sbyin sreg gi mchod sbyin mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal po de ya
mug pas bsams pa// thamasukyi nang na nga la sdug pan nga' gsar 'phreng can yin no// gser 'phreng can gyis thos pa dad/ de yang mkhas pa yin pas/ rgyal po de'agan du song
ste/ phyin nas smras pa// lhanyi ma shar na sgron mar mar me'i 'od dgos pa ci mchis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'di drang srongs ba'i ri
©]// dgas rgyu ba na bzhugs te/ der gshags la zhusashig dang/ bcom ldan 'das des khyed la lung ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du khyed kyis zung zhig/ de nas
rgyu rgyal po kri krasagrong khyer wA ra Naser/ ra deng bcom ldan 'dasade'i drung du 'gro'i zhis dril chen po bsgrugs nas 2 de 'khor brgya stong du mdang/ gser 'phreng can de dang thabs cig tu
bcom ldan 'das gang ba der seng ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'dasagasan sngar 'dug go/ de
tsagan rgyal po kA kro stan las las te// bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dir bdag
dgung gcig la bdag gis rmi lam bcu khums pa/ glang po che skar khung nas byung ba na de'i mjug ma thogs pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rmi lam de'i 'bras bu
'dir bdag la lung bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ma 'jigs shog/ khyod kyi yul 'khor ma nyams par 'gyur la// srog ga bar chad
du yang ma 'gyur gyis rgyal po chen po gzhan du na ma 'ongs pa'i tshe skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ste/ de'i phyi ma'i//
dus/ nyan thos rnams lus ma bsdams pa// sems ma bsdams pa// shes rab ma bsdams pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de rnams gnyen gyi tshogs spangs nas rab tu 'byung
bar 'gyur te/ de rnams gtsug lag khang rnams su khyim gyi 'du shes 'dzeg pa las chags par 'gyur te/ glang po chaskar khung nas byung ba na/ de'i mjug ma thog pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no
rgyal po khyod kyis gom pa'i phyi nas khron par snyegs par rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de na 2 de rnams gtsug lag khang ga nang na lhan cig gnas pa rnams la chos ston par 'gyur yang/
de rnams manyan bar 'dod par ma byed tsang/ yid la ma 'jog ste/ de'as ltas na 'ad yin no// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis phye bre gang dang/ mu tig bre gang myong byed pa rmi lam du mthong bar byed
pa gang yin pa de ni/ de nyid kyi nyan thos rnams te/ gang bza' ba tsam gyi don du dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che rnams yang dag par ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur
te/ de'asnga ltasan 'di yin no// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis tsan dan dngashang mnyam por chong byed pa ra lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni/ de nyid kyi nyan thos rnams mu stegs kyi tshig
gang yin pa rnams bzung nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang sems par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'asnga ltas na de yan no// rgyal po chen po khyad kyis kun dga' ra ba phun sum tshogs
[j/ ag]da da nga ma byin par len pa rnams kyis phrogs pa rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de na/ de nyid kyi nyan thos lus ma bsdams pa/ sems ma bsdams pa/ tshul khrimU//
ma bsdams pa shes rab ma bsdams pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de rnams dge 'dun rnams kyi me tog mchog dang/ 'bras bu'i mchog rnams 'tsho ba'i phyir dge 'dun las
bcad nas khyim pa rnams laster bar 'gyur te/ de'asnga ltas na de yanano// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis glang po phrug gus spros kyi grung po 'jigs par byed pa rmi lam du mthong ba gang yani
pa de ni de nyid kyi nyan thos rnams tshul khrims 'a rgyal pa/ sdig pa'i chos can de rnams gang dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos can rnams zil gyis gnon par byed par
'gyur te/ de'i snga ltas de yin no// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis spre'am gtsang bas gos pas gzhan la skud par rmi lam du mthong ba gang yan pa 'di ni de nyid kyanyan thos rnams tshul
khrims 'chal pa/ sdig pa'i chos can rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ re rnams kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur te/ de'i snga ltas de yin no// rgyal po
chen po khyod kyis spre'u rgyal por dbang bskur bar mthong ba gang yin pa de na/ dusaji' tsho rmongs pa rnams rgyal por dbang bskor bar 'gyur te/ de'i sa las de yin no// rgyal po chen po
khyod kyis ras gcig ma bco brgyad kyas drangs kyang ma ral bar rmi lam mthong ba gang yin pa de na/ de nyid kyi bstan pa sde bco brgyad du gyes par gyur kyang/ rnam par grol ba'i ras ni la
bar ma nus te/ de'i snga ltas de yin no/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis skyeba'i tshogs chen po gcig tu 'dus nas 'thab pa dad/ rtsod pa dang/ g.yul 'gyed pa dang/ mtshang 'bru
bar rmi lam mthong ba gang yan pa de na/ de nyid kyi bstan pa rtsod pas nub par 'gyur te/ de'i snga ltas de yin no// rgyal po chen po de ltar ma bzad pa rnams ma 'ongs pa 'jus na 'byupar
'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la yang rgyal po kri kri dang/ gser 'phreng can gyis thar pa'i chi
dang 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa yin no// dge slong dag 'di rje snyam dusems/ de'i tshe nagaser 'phreng can gang yin pa de ni ma ga d+ha bzang mo 'ad nyid yin te// de'i tshe yang 'dis
sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas te/ da ltar yang 'du 'ongs nas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas so// yang dge slong rnams the tsomaskyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa// btsun pa
gser 'phreng can gyas las ci zhig bgyis nas gser gyi 'phreng ba btags par skyes// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag 'dod kyis las byas pa yod de/
ny+tsa// sngon byung ba na zhang pa gzhan zhig ga chung mar gyur te/ rang sangs rgyas kyis mchod rten la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis 'breng ba byas nas btags te/ las
de'i rnam par sman pas gser gyi 'phreng ba btags par skyes so// de bas na dgeslong dag las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa na gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dka/
pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gag tu dkar ba yin te/ 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par snyan pan 'dren ma'o// dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma
rnams sngangs la/ lasagacig tu dkar ba rnams la mdon par brtson par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed rnams kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
la pa dang/ dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus pa la mngon par bstod do// ma ga d+ha bzang mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi
mkhan po d+harma shwa b+ha dra dang zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims yon tan gyis bsgyur// sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos te gtan la phab pa//
ltatsa// rgya gar skad du/ bud+d+ha d+harma ko ShA kA ra/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzod kyi chos kyi yi ge// skabam po dang po// mang gcig
ni chos so cog las gdams pa gsal ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi mdzod bshad pa'i yo gi'ale'u dang po ste/ chos so cog gi bden pa'i mtshan ma'i le'u 'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus
gagin/ sangs rgyas rgyal po'akhob kyi ri khu mtha' ri la/ dge slong chen po rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs te/ kun kyang phal gyis shes rig pa dang/ mu ge med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shastag ste/ dpag tu med grangs med do// de'i tshe shA ra'i bu ting nge 'dzin nas byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi thad du song nas/ phrag pa g.yas pa phyung ste/ mgo dang gad
gas phyag 'tshal nas/ sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par gshegs pas bshad pa/ chos so cog kun skye ba'ang med/ 'gag pa'i ng med/ mtshan ma'ang
med/ bya ba'ang med na/ ma rnams yid ches shing shes par bgyis pa yod pa dkon no// sangs rgyas kyis/ shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal ba// khyod kyis bsad ci zhig mthong na//
yang dag par gshegs pas bshad pas chos sa cig kun la skye ba med/ 'gog pa med/ mtshan ma med/ bya ba medan/ ma kun yid ches shangs par byas pa dkon no zhes bstod/
ri'i bus/ sangs rgyas la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bden pa mchis na/ kho bosems 'dasnyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis mde dang mtshan ma med pa'i chos lan mnge
[p]// dang mtshan chus bshad/ ngag dang tshig med pa'i chos na ngeg dang tshig gas bshad pa de'i don bsams na yod pa dkon pa'i sems skyasaso// sangs rgyas kyis/ A mi'i
zla khu la bka' stsal pa// de yin no// de yan no// don yod dkon te rab tu yod pa dkon bsan/ sangs rgyas kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya'o// shA ri'i bu dngar
na/ ri mo mkhas pas nam mkha' la bros te/ kha dog dang gzugs rnam pa ci yang snang bar byas na/ khyed kyi yodi la ji snyam du sems/ ra mo mkhan de yod pa dkonanamam dkon/ bcom
ldan 'das dkon lags so// shA ri'i bu yang dag par gshegs pas thob pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos so rig la skye ba med/ 'gag pa med/ mtshan ma med/
bya ba'ang med nga ra bshad na ma kun yid ches shing shes par byas pa na ches dkon no// ci'i phyir zhe na/ ming dang mtshan ma med pa'i chos la bsam pa'i ng med/ thob pa'i ng med/ sprad
tshe/ pa'i ng med/ bsam gyis ma khyabacade sems gnas kyis shing rten pa'i ng ma yin/ 'dran tor du brjod pa'i ng med/ 'dran tor du brjod cing rten gnas su rung ba'od ma yin/ ma kun
yid chesashade shes par bya ches kyis yod pa dkon no// shA ri'i bur rab ra'i rgyal po mtho zhing rje 'am ma cha/ bcom ldan 'das mtho shange che'o// shA ri'i bu gnam ngos bzhi'i nang na khyab
0 par rdo chen po'i char bab ste/ kun ri rab ra'i rgyal po tsam na ma la la zhag gis lag pas rdo de dag bzed rung bsdus te/ snyatsho'i 'bras bu tsam yang lhung zhang zad pa med de/ khyed kyi yodi
la ji snyam sems/yod pa dkon nam ma dkon/ bcom ldan 'das dkon lags s// shA ri'i bu yang dag par gshegs pas bshad pa chos so cog kun la skye ba'ang med/ 'gag
pa'i ng med/ mtshan ma'ang med/ bya ba'ang mer na/ ma kun yid chesashang shes par byas pa chos kyis dkon no// shA ri'i bu dper na ma la la zhig gas sems can thams cad lag
pa g.yon par bzhag la// lag pa g.yas pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ ri rab dang/ chubo dang/ rtsi[︽]shang bteg ste/ sems can de rnams thams cad
sems 'thun par dga' skyed cing/ yade la tha dad pa med par bya nus la/ de khyod kyi yade la ji snyam sems/ yod pa dkonanam ma dkon/ bcom ldan 'das dkon lags so//
shA ri'i bu yang dag par gshags pas bshad pas/ chos secig kun la skye ba'ang med/ 'gag ba'ang med/ mtshan ma'ang med/ bya ba'ang med na/ ma kun yade ches shes par
bya ba ches kyis yod pa dkon no// shar 'ibu yang dag par gshegs pas bshad pa chos kun la ngo bo nyid med de/ stong ba ci yang med pas 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches shang
shes par dka' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu chos de la 'du shes med de/ 'du shes so cog dang bral lo// bsam ba med de bsam pa'o tshagi dad bral lo//
bung ba med de/ dor ba'ang med/ 'dran thor yang med/ mya ngan tshaba'ang med/ tshu logs kyi 'gram yang med/ pha rol gyi 'gram yang med/ skabs kyang med/ gti mug kyang med/
rig pa'i ng med de/ tshad med ba'i ye shes kyis na/ gdod shes par rung// bsams pa/sa shes par nus pa ma yin no// sprad pa'i ng med/ 'dushes kyang med/ mya nganatsa
ba'ang med/ de bsam pa med na bsam pa kun las 'das// sems med na sems kun las 'das/ phyogs pa'i ng med/ log pa'i ng med/ 'des pa'i ng med/ bgel
ba'ang med/ bden pa'i ng med/ ma bden pa'i chos kyang med/ gti mug kyang med/ gti mugag chos kyang med/ gti mug gi dra ba'ang med/ ming yang med/ tshig med/
tshe bshad pa med/ ma bshad pa med/ zod pa'i ng med/ ma zad nga 'ad med/ myud pa'i ng med/ lam yang med/ lam gyi 'bras bu'ang med/ bral ba med na bral ba rnams
las 'jus te/ bsam pa'i ng med/ go 'dun 'dres pa'i ng med/ blang ba'ang mid/ dor ba'ang med/ thob pa med/ thob par yang mi rung/ bden pa rnams kyang bsal/
[z/ ]'dod chags dang/ zhe stang dang/ gti mug kyang bsal te/ bden pa'i ng med/ brdzun pa'i ng med/ rtag pa'i ng med/ rtog pa med pa'i ng ma yin/ snang ba'ang ma yin/ mgang
ba'ang ma yin 2 mun pa'i ng ma yin/ snang ba'ang ma yin/ sems la ma 'dug/ ngo bo nyid med de/ ngo bo nyid thogam nas stong pas bdud phebs thul bar nus/ mya ngan dang/
'khrug po phebs thul/ phung po laskye mched bcu gnyis phebs/ khams bco brgyad phebs thul/ phung po lnga yod ces 'chad pa thul/ skye mched bcu gnyis yod ces 'chad pa//
phebasashul la/ khams bco brgyad yod kyis 'chad pa phebs thul sems can yod ces 'chad pa dang/ gang zag yod ces 'chad pa phebs thul/ tshe yod ces 'chad pa dang/ srog
yod ces 'chad pa dang/ yod pa yod ces 'chad pa dang/ yod pa med ces 'chad pa phabs thul lo// leg pa'i spyod pa thams cad kun phabs thul to/ shAri'i bu nga'i 'phrul chos
'dzas 'dod chags thams cad dang/ chos yod nyes 'chad pa dang/ chos so cog gi yang dag pa'i bden pa'i mtshan ma la yad ma chos ma dad pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la zug pa kun phebs
thul bar nusaso// ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu sems can la la zhig bdag tu lta 'chad/ gang zag tu 'chad/ sems can yod par 'chad pa dang/ ma da par 'chad pa dang/ rtag pa
snyam du 'chad/ yod pa snyam du 'chad/ med pa snyam du 'chad tsang chos rnams 'chad pa dang/ bstan ma'i ming du tshor ba'ang med/ brtags pa'ong med ces ba/
ba'ang med/ sems la'ang mi 'dug/ thob pasathob pa'i ng med/ tshu logs kyang med/ pha rol kyang med/ rnam par rtog pa'i ng med g.yo ba'ang med/ rang bzhin yang med de/
thog ma nas rang stong pas bsam du'ang mi rung/ dbyung du'ang ma rung ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par ma nus pa de lta bu'i mang mtshan ma med pa'i chos mang dang mtshan mas bshad
zla 2 D+ha de lta bu'i chos so cog kun skye ba'ang med/ 'gog pa'i ng med/ mtshan ma'ang med/ bya ba'ang med pas ma kun yid chesashang shes par bya ba na chos kyis yod pa dkon no// shA ri'i
bu ma la la zhig gis ri rab ra'i rgyal po bldad de/ mde la zhu zhing zad par bya nus la/ nam mkha' la 'phur te songan/ gnod pa med ba de khyod kyi yade la ji snyam sems/ yod pa dkonanam
mdaken/ bcom ldan 'das dkon lags so// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa la chos s cig kun laskye ba'ang med/ 'gag pa med/ mtshan ma'ang med/ bya ba'ang med
na/ ma kun yid ches shing shes par byas panas kyis yod dkon no// shA ra'i bu dperan ma mkhar chu zheng mtho dman dpag tshad rer yod la/ sgo bzhir me lce byung ba la ma zhoge khur du lcaskam
po khyer te de nas phar rgol ba rlung drag pos bus pa'i me lce de' lus bsregasan/ mdes mes rtsu'ang ma tshig/ lus kyang ma tshig par bya nus te/ de'i nang nas byung ste/ sngon gyi dang ma mtshud
par med pa de khyod kyi yod la jisnyam yod/ dkon nam ma dkon/ bcom ldan 'das dkon lags so// shA ri'i bu yang dag par gshegs pas bshad pas/ chos so rig kun laskyeb
med/ 'gog pa med/ mtshan ma med/ bya ba'ang medan/ ma kun yid chesashadishes par bya ba ches kyis yod pa dkonano// shA ri'i bu dper na ma la la zhagags rdo la gzings su byas te/
mtshotshulogs kyi 'gram nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par brgal na/ de khyod kyi yade la jisnyam sems/ yod pa dkon namam dkon/ bcom ldan 'das dkon lags so// shA ri'i bu/
yang dag bar gshegs pas bshad pa chos/se cig kun la skye ba med/ 'gog pa med/ mtshan ma med/ bya ba'ang med/ ma kun yid chesashangeshes par bya ba ches kyis yod pa dkonano//
shA ra'i bum la la zhagags gnam ngos bzhi'i 'og rarab ra'i rgyal po dang/ ridang/ chu bo dang/ rtswa dang/ shing kun khur du khyer la/ sbrang bu'i rkang pas skas byas te/ tshangs pa'i
lha'i khams su thug par 'dzegan/ de khyod kyi yade la ji snyam sems// yod pa dkon nam mdakon/ bcom ldan 'das dkon lags so// shA ri'i bu yang dag par gshegs pas bshad
pa chos s 'og kun laskye ba'ong med/ 'gog pa'i ng med/ mtshan ma'ang med/ bya ba'ang med na/ mi kun yid ches shing shes par byas pa ches kyi yod pa dkon no/
shA ri'i bu dper na pad+ma'i kha chu char gyi gams ri rab ri'i rgyal po sbyangs te nam mkha' la 'dug na/ de khyod kyi yid la jisnyam sems/ yod pa dkon namam dkon/ bcom ldan 'das dkon lagA
se[：]shA 'i bu dper na bskal pa zad pa'i m chen pos bsregs pa'i tsho ma zhig gis mchil ma thebs gcig btab pas/ me deg bar nus// yang thabs gcig pus sur 'jig rten rgya
khams dang lha rnams kyi pho brang du gyur par nus pa khyod kyi yade la ji snyam sems/ yod pa dkon nam ma dkon/ bcom ldan 'das dkon lags so// shAri'i bu yang dag par gshegs bas
bshad pa chos so cog kun la skye ba'ang med/ 'gog pa'i ng med/ mtshan ma'ang med/ bya ba'ong med/ ma kun yid ches shing shes par byas pa na ches kyis yod pa dkon no// shAri'i
bu chu bo gang+gA chazhing yangs ba na dengag cing tshad bzung du med de// bcom ldan 'das 'di lags so// shA ri'i bu gnam ngos bzhi'i 'og na char pa chen po khyab par bsams te/ char pa'i thogs
pan chu bo gang+gAtsam na mo la la zhig gis lag pas char pa'i thog ba bzed de lhung zhing zag pa med na/ de khyod kyi yari la jisnyam sems/ dkon namamadakon/ bcom ldan 'das dkon lags ]
so/ shA ra'i bu yang dag par gshegs pas bshad pa chos secog kun la skye ba'ang med/ 'chad pa dang/ 'chad pa kun lasangs rgyas la zlog cing gal ba ste/ sangs rgyas dang rtsod pa'o/
shA ri'i bu chos lacung zad cig thob par 'dzin pa yan chad sangs rgyas dang rtsod pa'o// sangs rgyas dang rtsod pa ni kun log pa'i lam du 'jug pa ste/ nga'i slob ma ma yin no// mya ngan las

'das pa dang rtsod pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang rtsod pa// chos dang rtsod pa/ dge 'dun dang rtsod pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar mthong ba'i man nges khyim nas byung zhing tshul khrims nod du ma gnad do// shA

ri'i bu de ltar mthong ba'i ma ni ngas chu rdubagacig dang yon du ma gnang ngo// shA ri'i bu ma la la zhag de lta bur ma rageba'i 'dod chags kyi don bsal btang ba ni nga'i chos kyi nang du khyim nas byung zhing/
chas lam 'tshol te/ mya ngan las 'das par yang ma sems/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems kyang ma byed/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang ma rtogs te/ mtha' yun du stong pa'i chos kyis
ma sngas ma skag pa de lta bu'i ma yang chos kun 'chad pa'i phyir brtson 'grus spyod na/ ma dge ba la 'dod chags pa de lta bu'i lta skyes kyang ci dgos/ bdag tu lta ba la chags pa dang/
sems can la chags pa dang/ gang zag la chags pa dang/ chos la chags pa de lta bu'i sems 'dod chags kyi rnams gcod pa'i phyir/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang mtshan ma mi
len te/ mi des chos so cog thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kun mtshan nyid gcig yin par khong du chud de/ de namtshan nyid med pa'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bu na monge 'phral gyi/
chos kyi gnyen dulapa'i chos kyi bzod pa zhes bya'o// gnyen dul ba'i chos kyi bzod pa de lta bu thob na/ gdon mi za bar nga' slob ma yin te/ yon phul ba'ang zhu bar bya nus la/ lung ston
par ma mnos// ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu nga' yang dag pa'i bden pa'i mtshan ma'i chos 'di la 'jug tu'ang mi rung/ blang du'ang mi rung/ dor du'ang ma rud/ chags su'ang ma
rung/ bshad du'ang mi rung/ ba'i tshig gi lam chad/ dga' pa'i ng med/ gzha' po'ang med/ 'dod rung dga' ba'i sems kyang chad de/ rkyen gyi rnams tshogs pa'i ng med/
rkyen rnams dang bral bas lam med lam chad/ lam med pas thugs pas sbas pa'i tshig rnams dang/ brjod cing 'gro ba dang/ sgra skad kun chad de gzugs kyang med/ kha dog kyang med/
blang ba'ang med/ chags pa'i ng med/ sdud pa'i ng med/ bden pa'i ng yod/ rdzun pa'i ng med/ mun pa'i ng med/ snang ba'ang med/ zhig pa'i ng med/ rtsod pa'i ng med/ gyes
pa'i ng med/ g.yo ba'ang med/ sems pa'i ng med/ rnam par rtog pa'i ng med de/ thob par mi rung ngo// du ma'ang med/ gtsang ma'ang med/ ming yang med/ mtshan mang
med/ sems kyis bgrang ba'i chos kyang ma yin/ sems kyis sems pa'i ng ma yin te/ nga'i chos 'di'i nang na skyes pa'i ng med/ bud med kyang med/ lca'ang med/ kla'ang med/
gnod spyin yod med/ dri za'ang med/ grul bum yang med/ sha za'ang med/ rtag pa'i ng med/ bdag tu lta ba'ang med/ sems can med/ gang zag kyang med/ 'ongs
ba'ang med/ sed ba'ang med/ zhugs pa'i ng med/ tshul khrims kyang med/ nyams pa'i ng med/ gtsang ba'ang med/ du ma'ang med ting nge 'dzin kyang med/ thub da
med d+ha thub pa'i rtsa ba'ang med/ bsam gtan phung med/ bsam gtan gyi rtsa ba'ang med/ shes pa'i ng med/ mthong ba'ang med/ 'dod pa'i ng med/ rtsod pa'i ng med lam
gyi 'bras bu'ang med/ shes rab kyang med/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'ang med/ snang ba'ang med/ snang ba med pa'i ng med/ grol thar pa'i ng med/ grol thar pa med ba'ang med/
'bras bu'ang med/ 'bras bu thob pa'i ng med/ stabs kyang med/ stobs theb pa'i ng med/ 'jigs pa'i ng med/ 'jigs pa med pa'i ng med/ sems kyang med//
sems kyi rtsa ba'ang med/ 'dug pa'i ng med/ 'gro ba'ang med/ rmog 'ang med/ tshu rol kyang med/ pha rol kyang med/ dran zhing 'du shes kyis rnam par brtags pa'i ng med/
byang chub kyang med/ byang chub kyi shes kyang med/ shes rab kyang med/ shes rab med pa'i ng med/ sa'ang med/ chu'ang med/ me'ang med/ rlung yang
med/ sngag kyang med/ dbal yon yang med/ chos kyang med/ chos med pa'i ng med/ sdug bsngal ba'ang med/ skyid pa'i ng med/ 'dran thor brjod pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i
thog ma kun 'byung// thams cad yongs su bral bas grongs te dud pa'i ng med do// shA ri'i bu gces pa'i tshog bskyod do// nga yas chos kyis sems se cig thams cad dang/ mthod
do cog thams cad dang/ bdud thams cad dang/ le lo yar skye ba kun bshag ste/ dran zhing sems sa// snaba'i tshig thams cad kun bcad bsal to// nga'i chos de'i nangan rtag pa/
med/ rtag pa med pa'i ng med/ sdug bsngal med/ spyod pa'i ng med/ dra ma'ang med/ gtsang ma'ang med/ chad pa'i ng med/ rtag pa'i ng med/ bdag tu lta ba'ang med/
sems can yang med/ gang zag kyang med/ tsho'ang med srog kyang med/ skye ba'ang med/ 'gog pa'i ng med do// datsa'i phyir zhen/ shA ri'i bu yad dag par gshegs bas
chos lacu yang thob pa yod med tsang zhi ba yod pas na/ mang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes byan/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i ng ma mthong/ shwara'i bu sangs rgyas kyang mya ngan las 'das pa/
