smag so// khyod kyis nga'i bal gyi glang po che dgra zla la byin pa bden nam zhes dris pa dang rgyal bus gsol pa// bdag gis stsal ba mad do zhes gsol to// rgyal bos smras pa rgyal ba khyod/
ci'i phyir nga lam zhus par nga'i bal gyi glang po che dgra zla la byin zhes dris pa dang/ rgyal bus/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// sngar yab rgyal po dang dam bcas ba ni/ sbyin pa ci
sbyin na yang mi 'gal bar mdzad do zhes gsungs pa des rgyal bo la ma zhus pa lags so// rgyal pos smras pa sngar dam bcas pa ni/ nor dbyig dang/ rin po che la dbang bar byas na/
bal gyi glang po che ru gtogs/ rgyal bus gsol pa// de dag thams cad rgyal po mnga' ba'i dkor legasan/ ci'i slad du 'di bkol te ma gtogs zhes gsungs/ rgyal pos/
rgyal bu rgyal tshab la smras pa/ khyed ro dan tig tu lo bcu gnyis spangs kyiso/ yul 'di nas myur du byung ste bong zhig/ rgyal bus/ rgyal po la gsol pa/ bdag rgyal po chen pos
bka' stsal pa'i bka' ma gcob na/ da dung gang zhag bdun zhige sbyin pa bgyis te// bdag gso bsam pa rdzogs nas/ yul 'di nas byang ste mchi bar 'tshal le zhes gsol/ rgyal
[# ]@#// pos smras pa/ khyod kyis sbyin pa ma 'os par byas pas yul gyi bangamadzod kun stongs te/ nga'i bal glang rin po che yang med par byas pas khyod spangs pa yin te/ da phyir 'dug
cing zhag bdun sbyin par byar mi gnang gas/ myur du song zhig ces bsre'o// rgyal bus gsol pa/ rgyal po chen po'i bka' bdag ma gcog ste/ rgyal po'i btsunamo nya khri srid kyang rgyal po
gang na ba der lhags nas/ rgyal bu rgyal tshab 'go bdun zhig sbyin pa byin te/ yul nas mchibar gsol pa rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du gnang ngo// de nas rgyal bu rgyal tshab kyis so ser bran
g.yog mngags te phyogs bzha nes nor rdzas 'dod pa rnams pho brang sger 'dus shig nor zas thams cad ni rtag pa dang brtan du rung ba ma yin te/ mthar 'jig cing med pa'i chos can
[£]no zhes bsgo bas/ phyogs bzhi nas slong ba pa mang po lhags pa la rgyal bu rgyal tshab kyis/ bras dang// skom dang/ nor dang/ rin po che rnams zhag bdun gyi bar du yong bzhin du byon
nas dbul 'phongs pa rnams longs skyed dang ldan zhade/ thams cad bde skyid par byas so// de nas rgyal bu rgyal tshab kyis/ chungam la smras pa/ bzhin bzungs longs la bdag ci
zer ba nyon cig/ rgyal po chen pos na beg le bcu gnyis kyi bar du ra denatig ces bya bar sangs so// chungams rgyal bus smras pa'i tshig thos nas/ med ces dngangs te//
[z]langs nas 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal bu la nyes pa ci zhig mchis nargyal pos de ltar mdzad par gyur/ rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag gis sbyin pa ma 'os pa zhig byas te/ rgyal po'i bang mdzod
kyang stongs/ bal glang rin po che yang dgra zla la byin zhes rgyal po dang blon po rnams khros nas// bdag spangs pa yin no// btsun mo man sa smras pa/ rgyal po'i yul du lo lags pa dang/ rgyal
po chen po dang/ blon po dang/ 'bangs kyi bar du bde skyod pa dang/ longs sbyong chab r smon lam legs par btab la/ bdag cag ra la sgem du 'dong de// rgyal bus smras pa// bzhi ba la/
ra na 'jigs pa'i gnas yon to shin tu bya dka' ba bsam dgos la/ seng ge dang stag la sogs pa gcan gzan ma rungs pa yod pas/ 'dab tu 'jigs na khyed na lengs spyod mang ba yin
pas khyod de lta bu bdag la'od dam/ khyod pho brang gi nang na gos su na phra ba dang 'jam ba gyen pa// gnas su ni gur dang yol bas bskor ba na 'dug/ zas su natse la dga' pa bzhin zhig
pa dang mda' ba la phan/ ra lani stan du na rdzu 'dings/ thos sun 'bras bu zan/ khyod de la mos shing dga' ba ci zhig yod/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang rlung dang/ char pa dang/ 'brug
dang Da ser ba che zhing ba mo dang zil pas mi'i spu yang langs pa tsam du/ grang ba'i tshe nan grang rab la/ tsha ba'i tshe na tsha rab sta/ [q]nga gi gseb na 'dug pa'i gnas su yang mi rungan/
sa la gze ma dang/ gsogam dad rje ba yang mang zhing/ sbrul gdug pa yang yod na/ khyod de lta bu dag bzod dam/ man tes smos pa/ bangag la gnyen zhing 'jam
ba dang/ gur dad/ yol ba dang/ mngar ba dang/zhim pas nga zheg bgyi/ rgyal bu dang bral zhing so sor mchi ba bdagam bzod de/ nam du'ang rgyal bu dang ma 'bral zhing lhan cig 'grog
par dga' 'o// rgyal po'i thog mar 'gro ba ni rgyalamarAn me'i thegamar 'gro ba na dud pa// chung ma'i thog mar 'gro ba ni khyim thab yin pas bdag ni rgyal bu la yid brtan tu skyabs su mchi'o/
rgyal bu ning dag gi lha lags ta rgyal bus phyogs ba'i nas 'dus pa'i sbyin pa byin pa'i tsho bdag gis kyang rgyal bu'i glegs bgyid pas/ da rgyal bu lam ring du 'gro ba las/ gal te pha
rol po slong ba 'ongs to/ bdag gis de bzhin du grogs bgyi rgyal bus sbyin pa mdzang na/ bdag gi srog la bab kyang mi byar mi rung bas/ the tsam ma mdzad du gsol/ rgyal bus smras pa//
bdag na sbyin pa la dga' bas/ pha rol gyi sems mo bzlogs te/ pha rol pos bdag la gal te bu'am khyodanyang slong ba 'ongs na yang bdag gis mi gtong mi nus so// ci ste bdag gis bsaA/
pa khyod kyis de bzhin dum byas n na/ bdag gis dge ba'i sems 'khrugs par gyur bas/ 'gro ba ma rogs se// man tes smras pa/ rgyal bus sbyin pa mdzad pa ni/ 'jig rten gang sku
[°]na'ang 'di 'drab med pas/ yid bzhin du sbyin pa mdzad du gsol/ rgyal bus smras pa/ khyod de lta nus na shin tu legs so zhes rgyal bu dang/ btsun mo dang/ sras gnyis dang bcas bgrog
[$ ]rnga yumagang na ba der son gnas / da bdag cig mchi'o zhes mchi phyag byas nas/ yum la 'di skad ces gsol to// yum gyis skabs skabs su rgyal bu chen po la/ ci nas dkar po'i sa/
chos kyis yul gyi srid bde zhing 'bangs mang po snyams las mi bcad par gros gdab par gsol lo// yum gyis rgyal bu 'gro'o zhes mchi phyag byas pa mthong nas/ lhag par mya ngan gyis
gdungs te/ drung na 'dug b.la'ang skad ces smras so// khame'i lus 'di ni rdo ba yin pa lta/ snying ni rdo rje ne pa lta sku/ bdag gis rgyal po chen po'i rim gro bya ba la skyon ma byung na/ da kho
ma'i bu gcig pu 'di dang bral te/ 'gro na ci'i phyir kho me'i snying 'dogs te go bar ma gyur/ bu 'di khe me'i bod pa na 'dul pa na/ skyed shing gi 'dab ma ltar nyin mtshan tshor skyes te/
nga skyed rdzogs nas/ kho mos bor te song bas na/ btsun ma thams cad kyang bdag la snying tshim mozhes brjod la/ rgyal bos kyang bkur bar tshwa 'gyur na/ gal te lha rnams kyis
bdag gasmon lam bzhin mi 'gal bar mdzad na/ bdag gi bu phyi'i yul du 'khor bar shog ces smon lam btab bo// de nas rgyal bu btsun mo dang sras gnyis dang bcas ta/ yab dang
yum la mchi phyag byas te dong ngo// de'atsho btsunamo nyi khris na se se nas mu trig gi chun po re re brdzangs so// blon po chen po bzhi stong gsan ni po che sna bdun las

byas pa'i me tog dang pad+mor re rgyal bu la brdzangs so// de nas rgyal bu pho brang nas byung ste/ grong khyer gyi byang sgor phunanas/ rinapo che sna bdun gyi me tog dang do shal yang ral gyis phyogs bzhi
nas 'dus pa la ma lus par byin no// lung pa de na gnas pa'i mi mang po khri phrag du mas rgyal bu bskyal te/ de dag 'di skad ces gtam du brjod do// rgyal bu 'dan shin tu dge ba/ yul
gyi sprug1na lta bu yin na/ r+ya'i phyir yab yum gyi sras rin po che 'di las ring du spungs zhes mthong ba thams cad kyis 'phangs so zhes smras so// de'i tshe rgyal bu grong khyer gyi phyi'il duskya
shang gi drung na bdag ste skyel ba'i mo rnams la 'di nas phyires dang zhig ces sprab tshog snas pa dang/ skyalaskyel ba che chung thams cad a ma blugs te dus nas phu deng nge// de nas
rgyal bus btsun mo dang sras gnyis shing rta'i nang du bzhag nas/ rgyal bu nyid kyis shing rta'i khe la bsgyur ta/ song ba las rgyangs chad par byon te/ skye shing gi drung na ngal bso zhing
'dug pa las/ bram ze dag cig lhags nas/ rgyal bu shing rta khrid pa'i rta bslangs so// rgyal bus slong ba la rta byin nas/ sras bu gnyis shing rta'i steng du bzhag ste/ btsun
[oj]mos na shing rta'i phyi nas phul/ rgyal bus na mdun nas drangs te/ rkang pas shing rta 'dren cing song ba las/ ring po ma lenapar yang bram ze zhig dang phrad nas/ shing rta bslangs pa dang/
rgyal bus shing rtayang bram ze la bdeno// de nas yang song b.las/ ring bo ma len par yang bram ze slong pa dang phrad nas/ rgyal bus de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te bdag gis
khyong 'a ma byaman ni chags shinge sar sna byed par 'gyuran/ da na bdagu la nor zas zad de 'ang med do zhes smras pa dang/ bram ze na re/ nor rdzas med na lus la gyon pa'i gos de nga
la byin cig ces sbas pa dang/ rgyal bus lus la khyen pa'i gos rin po che yang slong ba labyon te/ gos rong ba zhig gyon te dong ba las/ ring po ma len par bram ze yang slong ba zhig dang
phrad nas/ rgyal bus btsun mo'i gos byin no// de nas yang deng ba las/ ring po ma lon par bram ze slong ba dang phrad nas rgyal bus sras gas kyi gos kyang byon no// de ltar rgyal bus
rtadang/ shing rta dang/ nor rdzas dang/ bgo ba'i gos kyi bar du ma lus ba zad par byin pa yad/ thog ma nas 'gyed pa'i sems skya'i gam tsam mam/ bas tsam yang med do//
rgyal busan sras bu khur du thogs btsun mos ni sras ma phad du khyer nas/ rkang pas song la nga rgyal bu dang/ btsun mo dang/ sras gnyis kyis bar du dga' ba'i mongs dang bcas
[# ]/ terug la ba der yod do// ra den tig ces bya bar/ gul la ba nas lam so rab tu ring ste// dpag tshad phrag stong zhig yod do// de ltar song song ba las/
'brog dgon par phyin nas/ bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa las/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi lce'i dbang pos 'brog dgon pa der/ grong khyar khyim bzang po tshong dus dang/
skyo/ lam srang yodapa/ rol mo dang/ gos dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang ldan pa/ grong khyim de na mi dag gis rgyal bu bsu ba dag stsal to// mamang bos rgyal bu grong khyimed du
bsus te/ zas dang/ skom dang/ bde ba'i yo byad kyis bstabs pa dang/ btsun chos/ rgyal bu la smras pa/ lam ring por bgrod paso rab tu ngal/ da thal byung 'dug tum rud
dam rgyal bus snyas pa/ yab rgyal pos bdag cag la ri dan tig tu song zhig ces bka' stsal to// da 'di'i 'dug par 'gyur na/ yab rgyal po'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur te
bu sri zhu can ma yin no zhes gsungs nas grong khyer de nas byung ste med la song ngo// de ltar song ba las/ ring po ma lonabar/ ra don tig gi drung du phyin pa dang/ ri de'i drung na chu chen po
shin tu zab pa// brgal bar mi thar pa zhig dang phrad do// de nas btsun mos rgyal bu la re zhige 'dare bsdad do// chu chen po bro nas brgal to 'dong ngo zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal bus
smas pa/ yab rgyal pos bdag cag la ra dan tig tu song zhes bka' stsal pas/ da 'dir 'dug par gyur na/ rgyal po'i bka' dang 'gal te/ bu sri zhu can ma yin no zhes smras pas/
rgyal bu de ma thag tu byams pa'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa dang/ mod la chu'i nang nas ri chen po zhig byung nas chu'irgyun bcad do// de nas rgyalabu dang btsun mo gos brjes te/
chu brgal nas/ phar brgal ma thag tu rgyal bus yang 'di snyam du bsams so// thal byung song par gyur na/ chu'akhyil ba 'dis sems can mang du 'chi ste/ grog spur mang bo/
chus khyer bar 'gyur snyam bsams nas/ rgyal bu phyir chu la bltas te/ 'di skad ces smas sa// chu khyod snga mkho bzhin du rgyun du 'bab cing gal te bdag 'dod pa zhig 'ongasaM na yang thar
bar byos shig ces smas ma thag tu chu yang snga ma bo bzhin du 'bab par gyur to// de nas song ba las re dan tig tu phyin nas/ rgyal bus ra de la bltas na/ ri de rang rong dang zad zed du
'dug la/ shing mang po rab tu rgyas shing/ byasna tshogs kyang snyan pa'i sgra 'byin/ 'bab chu dang/ chu mag dang/ mtsho'u dang lteng kar ldan ta/ chu na mngar/ 'bras bu
zhim Da chu bya dang/ ngang du'adang/ 'jon mo dang/ ri skyegs la sogs pa bya rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang gnas pa mthong nas/ rgyal bus btsun mo la yang 'di skad ces smras so/
ra 'dal bltasan/ shing dang tshal gnam la reg pa tsam du skyes na yang/ brdzus pa 'am/ bcad pa med pas/ chu mig zhim po la 'thung zhing/ 'bras bu mngar
thab zaste/ ri 'di la sgom pa dag yod bas/ 'dir gnas par bya'o// rgyal bu ri de la phyin pa dang/ rade la gnas pa'i 'dab chags bya dang/ gcan gzan dang/ ri dgas thams cad/
zla/ rab tu dga' nas/ rgyal bu bsus so// de'i tshe ri la skom pa'i dge slong a tsu ta zhes bya ba lo lnga brgya lon pa yon da lta tsheg dang ldan pa zhig gnas te/ rgyal bu de'i drung du
song nas/ phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'di la gang phyogs na 'bras bu dang chu mag bzang po ldan pa gnas su rung ba ci yod ces dris pa dang/
a tsu das smas pa/ ri 'di gnas thams cad du bsod nams dang ldan pa'i sa gzhi yin pas gang du gnas kyang rung ste/ ri 'di ni shin tu dben pa'i kha nas gtsang ma yin pas na ci rgyal
bu khyod chung ma dang bu smad du bcas te chos slob tu 'ongs sam/ de la rgyal bus smra ma khom par/ btsunamo man tas smras pa// dge slong la 'di skad ces sas so// btsunab ral lam
bsgoms nas ji srid cig lon/ dge slong gis smras pa/ ri 'dir phyin nas/ lo bzhi brgya'am/ lnga brgya tsam lonani// btsun mo man tes smras pa/ da dung bdag dang bdag gi/
bar du 'dzin n/ nam zhig las thob par 'gyur/ de srid du ri la gnas kyang rdo shing dang tham dang de/ bdag dang bdag gi ma 'dzin na/ gdod lam thob par 'gyur zhi'o// dge slong gis/
smras pa/ bdag gis yang dag par ngon de lta bu ma shes so// de nas rgyal bus/ dge slong la sbas pa/ btsunang yul la ba'i rgyal bu rgyal tshang don grub ces bya ba thos sam/ dge
slong gis smras pa bdag gis rgyun du thos kyi ma thong pa ma yin no/ rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal bu rgyal tshab donagrub ces bya ba yin no// dge slong gis rgyal bu khyod gar 'gro//
ci 'dod ces dris pa dang/ rgyal bus smras pa// bdagan theg pa chen po'i lam 'dod de zhes smras so/ dge slong gis smras pa/ rgyal bu'i yon tan dang sbyar na/ ring por ma thogs par
theg pa chen po'i lam thob par 'gyur te/ rgyal bu bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ bdag ni khe gnyes rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog tu gyur cig ces smras nas/ rgyal bu khrid
de 'dug pa'i gnas bstan to// de nas dge slong gis chos bzhin du rgyal bu'i skye blus nas/ mdud pa bor nas/ zas su ni shing gi 'bras bu shing thog za/ skom dun chu mig 'thung ngo/
[']de nas rgyal bus shing dngor bsdus te/ bdag 'dug pa'-i rtswa'i spyil po chung du ma cig byas/ btsun mo man te bu mang srong gnyis 'dug pa'i sbyol pe re re yang byas so// de'i tshon khye'u'i
mnge na yi ra zhes bya ste 'badun lonanas/ gos rang byon nus te pha'i phyi bzhin du 'gro'o// bu mo'i ming ni ge no yanazhes bya ste/ lo drug len pas/ ri dgas kyi bag
pa gyon cing/ ma'i phyi bzhin 'gre'o// 'di la gnas pa'i gcan gzan dang/ ri dgas dang/ 'dab chags bya la sogs pa thams cad kyang rab tu dga' nas/ rgyal bu la rten cing gnas
so rgyal bu ni de la phyin nas/ zhag gcig lon pa dang/ sngon bskams pa'i chu mig ngang rdzong yang chus gang bar gyur skye shang bskams pa rnams kyang/ thams cad me tog dang 'dang
ma skyes par gyur te/ srin bu gdug pa rnams kyang med par gyur nas/ gcan gzan gcig la gcig za ba yang so so nas rtswa la za bar gyur/ 'bras bu'i shing rnams kyang rgyas shing bzang bor

gyur byasna tshogs sAng rdzab skad kyi sgra skad snyan pa 'byin par gyur taM/ btsun mo man tisan pishing gi 'bras bu dang/ shinge thog brnga zhing rgyal bu la phul te/ sras mi sringaganyis kyang bstod do//
sras bum sring gnyis ni skabs skabs su pha ma gnyis dang bral to/ ha cang ya nga ma rong pa'i chu mig ba 'gram dag tu gcan gzan nam/ ri dgas dag dang lhan cig rtse ste/ bar 'ga' zheb len par
yang rtse'o// phyis dus gzhan zhig na/ sras khyabu ya ri seng ge la zhon pa las/ seng ge brgal nas/ rdab cig bsnun pas/ sras bu'i gdong pa cung zad snad de khrag byung ba las/ spre'u zhig

gas shang gi lom blangs te/ gdong gi khrag phyis nas/ chu 'gram du khrid de khrag phyis pa yang rgyal bus rgyang ma nas mthong/ de'i tshe yul ke'u le'u zhes bya bar bram ze dbul po zhig lo bzhi bcu lon
nas chung ma blangs so// chung ma ni rab tu bzang zhing sdug la/ bram ze de ni rab tum sdug pa'imtshan ma bcu gnyis rdzogs par yod de/ de'i lus mdog sol ba ltar gnag la/ gdong la 'bur
'bur po gsum yod pa// sna 'khyor zhing mig gnyis shel ltar sngo ba/ gdong gtor ma can la/ ma mchu 'phyang ba/ smra ba'i skad mi snyan pa/ gsus po che la rku ba 'burab/ rkang pa gnyis
gyol ba/ mgo shub can la/ sku med pa 'dultar mi sdug pa zhig ste/ chung mas kyang mthong mi 'dod pa tsam du/ shi lang bu zhes rgyun du dmod mo byed pa zhig yod do// dus gzhan zhagen/
chung ma de chu chur song song ba las/ lam du khyo ga gzhon nu dag kha cig dang phrad nas/ khyo ga rnams kyis khyim thab kyi ba gzugs bdi'adra'o zhes co 'dri 'ong bgad nas/ khyod ni dpe
med par bzang zhing sdug/ ji ltar 'di 'dra ba'i chung ma byed nus zhes smras pa dang/ chung mas/ khyo ga de dag la 'di skad cas smras so// rgan po'i mgo ni shingel ba mo chags pa
ltar skya ba de/ nang nub shi bar dga' na/ shir ma btub/ ji ltar bya zhes musnod thogs nas/ phyir khyim du 'ongs te/ khyim thab la 'di skad ces smras so// bdog chu nur song song
kha las/ lam du khyo ga gzhon nu dag cig dang phrad de/ de dag bdag la co 'dra yong bgad pas/ da khyod kyis bkol ba'i bran yod na/ chu chu yang mi dgos te/ gzhan gyis
dpyas par yang ma 'gyur ro// khyim thabs kyis smas pa/ bdag cag na shin tu yang dbul 'phos pa yin/ bran khol ba las red par 'gyur/ chung mas smras pa/ gal te bdag gi phyir dran
khol ma btsalan bdag kyang 'gro ste/ khyod dang lhan cig mi gnas so// chung mas yang 'di skad ces smras so// kho mos thos na/ rgyal bu don grub sbyin pa ma 'os par byin pas/ yab rgyal po
ri den dog ces bya bar sbyangs so// rgyal bu de la khye'u gcig dad/ bu mo gcig yod ces grag gis/ khyod der slong du song zhig/ khyim thabs kyis smras pa// re dan tig ces bya ba 'di
tsi nas dpag tshad drug stong lhag tsam gcig gis lam se yod la// sngon la lung bgred kyang ma myongan/ dajaltar bgrod par bya/ chung mas smas pa// bdag gi phyir bran khol ma btsal na bdag
'gags te 'chi'o zhes smras pa dang/ gnyis n kho ban gcig gis gsad kyang sla'o// khyod shi bar mi bdod de zhes smras nas/ khyod kyis bdag slong du bgro bar dad na/ kho bo'i brgyags dang dag
pa sbyor cig ces bsge'o// chungams sas pa/ song zhig brgyags dang dges pa yang med do zhes smras na bram zes brgyags rang sbyar te/ rkang pa sa lam du zhugs te song ngo// de nas bram

ba/ ze yul la bzhes bya ba ga la ba der song ste/ der phyin pa dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang gi sger 'ongs nas/ sgo srungs pa la rgyal bu don grub da ltar go la 'dug ces dris pa dang/ sgo srungs de pho brang gnang
du song nas/ rgyal po da ltar phyi rol na/ bram ze zhige rgyal bu don grub ga rezhes 'dri'i/ rgyal bos rgyal bu gar zhes smra ba'i tshig thos pa tsam gyis sems 'khrugs shange khros nas/ 'di snyam du
'di 'dra ba sha stagag phyir pa'i sres sbangs par gyur na/ de yang slong du 'ongs snyam bsams nas/ dpe 'di skad ces brjod par gyur to// dpar na ma na reng bzhin gyis rmazhing 'bar ba yinen/ de'i//
steng du shing bsnan pa dang 'dra ste/ bdag kyang da ltar mya ngan gyis gdungs te me dang 'dra ba las/ da yang rgyal bu ga ra zhes 'dri ba na mi la shang gis bsnan pa dang 'dra'o// bram zes gsol pa//
bdag lam ring po nas 'ongs pa yang/ rgyal bu rgyal tshab mi'i yid dang ma 'gal par sbyin pa bgyid do zhes ming snyan pa steng du gnam la thug/ 'og tu rum ga gting la thug gi bar
du grags pa/ bdag lam ring po nas re ba yod par 'ongs so// rgyal pos smras pa/ rgyal bu don grub na de ltar rashin tu dben pan gnas ta/ rob tu dbul zhing ci byed med na/ khyod la
ci zhog sbyin du yod/ bram zes smras pa/ rgyal bu la ci'ang med kyang/ bdag phrad par dga' 'ozhes smras pa dang/ rgyal pos kyang gzhan zhig la lam ston cig ces bsgo'i// de nas bram ze song
kru/ song ba khas/ dan tig gi ri drung du chu chen po zhig yod par phyin nas/ rgyal bu 'ba' zhig bsam ngashing yid la byas pas/ chu'i ba gel tu phyin par gyur to// de nas bram ze

ba der phyin nas/ thog ma rjen pa zhig dang phrad do/ rngon pa de la khyed ni de la rgyal bu don grub ces bya ba ma gleng ngam zhes dris pa dang/ rngon pa des kyang rgyal bu sbyin pa la dga' bas bram ze 'di dag gi phyira'i

rgyu la sngangs par shes pas/ rngon pa des kyang bram ze bzung nas/ shing la bcings te/ brdags pas lus la rma mang byang ngo// rngon pas yang snus pa/ khyod rgyal bu dris te ci zhig bya/ mda' 'phang de
zhes byas ba dang/ bram ze de la 'di snyam du/ da ni 'dis bdag gsod yang dgan/ brdzun zhig bya'o snyam bsamAnas/ na pa la khyed bdag la 'dri na ci nyos zhes smras so// de nas rngon pas/
'o na ci zhogs bar sems zhes dris pa dang/ bram zes brdzun tshig 'di skad ces sa so// rgyal po yab rgyal bu mthong bar dga' bas/ bdag 'dir rgyal bu phyir 'gugs su 'ongs so zhes smras/
ma thag tu/ rngon pas kyang bkrol te btang nas sngar ma rtogs te/ rgyus ma shes so zhes bzod pa gsol na// rgyal bu gang na ba dug ba'i gnas bstan to// de nas bram ze de rgyal bu'i thad du phyin
ba dang/ rgyal bus kyang rkyang m nas bram ze 'ongs pa mthong nas// rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ bsus nas gus par phyag byas te/ khyod ga las 'ongs/ lam du nyon mongs shing dal bar
ma gyur tam/ ci 'dod ces skyo ba'i gtam byas so// bram zes smras pa bdag lam ring bo nas 'ongs te/ lus thams cad rtse zhing dal te/ bkres skom zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal bus nang du/
khridi nas stan la 'dug tu bcug ste/ shing theg dang/ shing gi 'bras bu dang/ btung ba'i skom mdun du phab nas/ bram zes kyang skom 'thung/ shing thog zos te/ tha'abyung rgyal bu la 'di skad
sa sbas so// bdag na yul ki'u le'u zhes bya ba'i yul ma yin te/ snga zhig nas rgyal du sbyin pa la dga' re zhes phyogs bcur grags shing thos pas/ bdag ni rgyal bu dbul 'phongs te/
rgyal bu la slong du 'ongs so// rgyal bus skyes pa/ bdag la yod pa las khyod la ma byin na na/ chagasazhinge ser sna byed par yang 'gyur na/ bdag la ci bdog pa sngar btang bas/ da ni
cha'ing sbyin du med do// bram zes smras pa/ de ltar nor rdzas sbyin du med na/ khyod kyi bu gnyis bdag rgan po'i bkel ba 'am/ bran du byin cig ces de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du sbas
nas/ rgyal bus kyang khyod lam 'di bo nas 'ongs la/ bdag gis bu gnyis 'dod pa rab tu legs kyis sbyin no zhes smras so// de'i tshe na bu ma sring gnyis rtser song song ba las/ rgyal bus bos nas/
bu la 'di skad ces bsgo'o// bram ze bde lam ring po nas bu khyed gnyis slong ngo zhes zer nas/ kho bos kyang sbyin pa yin gyis/ khyed gnyis 'di'i phyi bzhan seng ge ces bsgo ba dang/ bu gnyis/
[n/ ]@#// rgyal ba'i mchan du bros nas du sku 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag gse bram ze du ma mthong na/ 'di 'dra bdag cag gis ma mthong ste// 'di bram ze ma lags kyi/ lang
dag par la dgas lags pas/ dbadag cag gi ma shid thog tshol du mchis pa las/ slar ma 'khor bar bdag cag gnyis ya dgas 'di'i zas su stsalan/ gdon ma 'tshal bar 'gum mo//
bdag cag gi ma slar mchis te/ bu dang ma mjal na/ ji ltar ba dang be'u bral ba ltar du zhing cho ngas 'debs te/ ma dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdus par 'gyur ro// rgyal bus/ bu la bsgo ba/
kho bos sbyin par gnang bas bsdad du ma rung ste/ 'di bram ze yin gyis/ yi dgas ma yin pas/ ma zes kyis/ khyad gnyis 'di'i phyi bzhin song zhige/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag ni de chas
te 'gre'o// gal te bu'i ma 'ongs na 'gror med de/ ma btang na rgyal bus bdag la byin pa'i dge ba'i sems bu'i mas zlog cing nyams par 'gyur du dogs so// rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag gis

sbyin pa ci byas kyang thog ma nas ci la'ang 'gyod pa'i sems byung ma myong ngo// de nas rgyal bus chu stod thogs te/ bram ze'i lag par chu blugs nas/ buganyis kyi lag pa nas bzung ste/ bram ze la phul
ban Da sa yang rab tugayos so// bu gnyis bram ze'i phyi bzhin mchir ma btub nas/ phyir rgyal bu'i drung du 'os te/ pus mo sa la btsugs nas/ pha rgyal bu la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bdag cag gnyis kyis tshe bas sngam la mi dge ba'i sdig pa ci bgyis nas/ 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur/ bdag ni rgyal bo'i rigs su skyes nas ci'i slad du pha rol po'i bran khel du gyur
cas= pha rgyal bu la sdig bshags nas/ 'di'i rgyu 'di'i rkyen gyis sdig pa byang zhing/ bsod nams skyes te/ gang nas gang du skyes kyang/ 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal dang phrad par ma gyur cig ces
sbas so// rgyal bus/ bu la sbas pa// 'jig rten mdza' zhing sdug ge cog mthar bye bral bar gyur ta/ thams cad mi rtag pas yid brtan du mi rung/ kho bos nam byan med pa'i mnyam sems
pa'ibyang chub thob pa na/ khyad thar pa'i dzin bya'o zhes bsko'o// bugonyis kyis/ yang yab rgyal bu la sbas pa/ bus ni ma lamachi phyag bgyi ba lags na/ nga gzhar yang mi phrad de/ ma'i don
mthong ba yang/ bdag cag gi sngon gyi sdig pa'i las kyis gdungs par thad na/ bdag cag gi ma ci'i phyir mya ngan gyis gdungs shing/ sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhes ste sngags 'don to// bram ze
sbas pa/ bdag rgas la 1ma chung bas/ byis pa 'di gnyis bdag bar te ma'i thad du bros par gyur na/ bdag gis byar med par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kyis chings la bkris shig ces
smras pa dang/ rgyal bus kyang bu gnyis kyi lag pa phying ka log tu bzung ste/ bram ze nyid 'ching du bcug nas/ phying ka log tu bcings pa'i thogapa bram ze'i lag par byin te sbrel nas khrid do/
bu gnyis na de ltar khrid kyang 'gror ma btub ste 'then pa las/ bram zas lcag thogs te/ ded nas gzhus pa'i lam du khrag phyung ba'ang sa la tshal par gangad// rgyal bus/
da ltar mthong nas/ mchim byung ste/ mchi ma sa la bo bas/ sa yang khel bar gyur to// rgyal bu dang/ ri dogs dang/ gcan gzan mang bo thoms cad kyis bu gnyis bskyal te/ mi snang bar
gyur ba dang/ gzod phyir log go/ ra rigs dang gcan gzan la sogs pas rgyal bu bskyal te/ phyir rgyal bu dang rtse ba'i gnas su phyin nas/ snying rje'i skad phyung ste/ lus sa la rdebs shing

ra 'gre'o// bram ze des lam du zhugs te song song ba las lam khar skye shing zhig yod pa la bu gas btags te 'dug go/ de nas chas pa dang bu gnyis pha ma dang phrad dur nas/ shing ga phagal 'khri shing/
'greram btub nas/ bram zes yad gzhus pa las/ bu gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag la ma rdeg cig/ bdag cag rang 'gro'o zhes gnam la yang bltas te/ yang 'di skad
tshaces smras so// ri gnyan gyi lha dang/ nags tshal gyi shing lha rnams bdag cag la cung zad thugs brtse ba'i dgongs pa mi mnga' 'am/ bdag cag na lam ring bor gzhan gyi bran khel byed du'agroste/
ma dang bral bar gyur na/ bdag cag gi ma ri la shing thog tshol zhing brdar btang ste/ myur du bdag cag dang phrad par shog cig ces ma sbran nam zhes/ de skad smras pa dang/ bu'i mar la 'dug pa'i

rkang ba g.yonab mthil gam 'azhing ga lo ba dang/ mig g.yon pa'i ng 'gul/ nu ma gnyis nas nu tsho'ang rang zag par gyur nas 'di snyam du 'di 'dra ba'i ltas ngan 'gana' nas ma byung na/ bdag gi bu gnyis

la ye 'drog ma byung ngam snyam bsams nas/ shing thog gis ci zhig bya snyam ste// shing thog brnga ba'ang btang nas/ myur bar phyi re gnas su 'gro bar chas so// de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum ba'i gnam gyi lha'i
dbang pos rgyal bus gzhan l bu byin pa nashes nas/ btsun mos dag par bsams pa'i sems kyi bar chad byed du dogs pas seng ge zhig tu sprul nas/ lam gyi srang dubasdad do// btsun mos/ seng ge
lasmras pa/ khyodanagacan gzan gyi rgyal bo/ kho ma nume'i rgyal mo yin te/ ri la 'khod par 'dra na/ cung zung lam las byol te bdag thong zhig/ bdag la chung du ma shed ma bye ba gnyis shig yodad
da tsam gyi bar du ci'ang ma zos bas/ bdag khong du de ste sdod do// seng ge s kyang bram ze de rgyang ring du thal bar shes nas/ lam las byol te btsun mo btang ngo// btsun mo phyir gnas su 'ongs
nus/ rgyal bu 'ba' zhig snang gi/ buganyisam mthong bas/ bdag nyid 'dug pa'i spyil bur bltas na yang bu ma mthong/ buganyis 'dug pa'i sbyol por bltas na yang bum mthong ste//
da nas bu rtse ba'i gnas chu bgram du btsal na yang ma mthong ngo// sngon bu dang rtse ba'i ri dgas sha ba dang/ kha sha dang/ gcan gazanas nig go dang/ spre'u la sogs te/ mdun nas lus sa la
rdebs shing sgra 'byin la/ sngon rtse ba'i rje'i bu'i chu yang basams bar mthong nas/ phyir rgyal bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ rgyal bu la bdag ga bu gnyis ga re zhes dris na//
rgyal bu cang mas+sego/ btsunamos yang smras pa/ bdag nam shing thog thogs te phyir gnas su 'khor ba nas/ bdag gi bu gnyis rgyang nas rgyug cing mdun du bsus te/ brdeg 'chos n yang phyir lad
ta dkyu mchong zhing a ma 'ongs a ma 'ongs so zhes 'bod do// bdag 'dug pa naganyis ka g.yas g.yon na 'dug cing/ phrag pa 'am/ lus la rdul gos na yang 'phya zhing sdug/ da bdag/
gi bu ga re ma mthong na/ gzhan la ma byin nam/ 'di ltar ma mthong bas/ bdag gi snying gas par 'gyur gyis/ bdag gi bu ga la bdug myur du smos shig/ bdag skyes par 'gyur ro zhes/
de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du dris kyang lanam smras so// btsun mos yung smas pa/ lhag par sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te/ bu gso ma mthong ba lta tshod yod na/ rgyal bus lan/
lam ster bas lhag par myos shing 'khrugs par gyur to// rgyal bus smras pa/ yulake'u le'u zhes bya ba nas/ bram ze zhig 'ongs te/ bdag gi bu gnyis bslangs pa las/ bdag gis byin no//
btsun mos rgyal bus smras pa thos ma thag tu ri rdzob pa ltar sa la 'gyel te/ 'gro zhing tshe nges btab bo// rgyal bus smras pa/ ri zhag sdod cig/ khyod sngona'adas pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas mar/

me mdzad kyi tshe dam ji ltar bcas pa mi dran nam/ de'atsho de'i dusan/ bdag na bram ze'i bu gzhon nu zhes bya khyod ni bram ze 'a bu mo su ta ra zhes bya ste// khyed na de'i tshe me tog pad+mo bdun zhig thogs
bdag la dngul gyi dong tse lta zhig yod de/ khyed las pad+mo lnga zhig nyos nas/ sangs rgyas la phul bar byas pa las/ khyod kyis pad+mo lhag ma gnyis po yang nga la byin te/sangs rgyas la 'bul gyis//
smon lam du yang/ bdag skye ba pha rol tu rtag par khyod kyi chung mar shog cig ces smon lam btab pa las/ bdag de'i tshe khyed dang 'di skad ces dam ma bcas sam/ khyod bdag gir chung mar
dga'o na/ bdag gi yid dang 'gal bar ma byed cig/ bdag sbyin pa zhig byed/ pha ma gnyis ma gtogs par gzhan spyan yang/ bdag gi yid bzhin du sbyin pa las 'gal bar ma byed cig ces
dam bcas pa las/ de'i tshe khyod na re/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes ma zor ram/ da khyod kyi bu gnyis gzhan la sbyin pa la bdag gi dge ba'i sems dkrug tu yang ci zhig yod ces rgyal bus smras m thag
tu btsunamos shes pa tsam gyis/ sems dang yid kyi sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pa tshor bar gyur te rgyal bu'i bsam pa myur du rdzogs par 'dod pas/ pa de bzhin du sbyin pa

la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgyal bus sbyin pa byin pa ji ltar sems pa bsam pa 'phyir/ bram ze zhig tu sprul te// bram ze de'ang ma sdug pa rnam pa bcu gnyis dang/
ldan te/ rgyal bu ga la ba der song nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal bu khyod sbyin pa la dga' bas/ pha rol po'i yod dang 'gal bar ma byed ces grag ste/ bdag kyang
ched du 'dir slong du 'ongs kyis/ khyedal btsunamo yod pa de bdag la byin cig/ rgyal bus smras pa/ shin tu legs te/ de bzhin du sbyin nozhes smras so// btsun mos smras pa/ bdag kyang pha rol
po la byin na/ rgyal bu'i g.yog sus bya/ rgyal bus smras pa/ da khyod kyang sbyin pa ma byas na/ ji ltar yang bla na med pa ma nyam sems pa 'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ de nas rgyal bus chu stod
thogs te/ bram ze'i lag pa bkru ba'i phyir/ lag par chu blugs nas/ btsun mo'ang bram ze la phul lo// de ltar rgyal bu la 'gyod pa'i sems cung zad kyang med par brgya byin gyis rtogs
lo nas Da lha rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags te/ gnam sa'ang cher g.yos so// de nas bram zes btsun mo khrid de/ gom pa bdun tsam du phyin pa dang/ phyir 'og nas btsun mo 'di rgyal bu la
phyir gdams kyis/ su la'ang ma byin cig ces smras so// rgyal bus slar smras pa/ ci'i phyir ma khrod/ mi 'dod dam/ ci mor skyes pa'i chung ma'i nang na/ chung ma 'di ni shin tu'ang bzad
zhing mdzes te/ rgyal po'i bu mo lanal/ rgyal po de la bu mo 'di gcig pu las med de/ chung ma 'di ni bdag la chu gang che bas/ kha zas btso ba dang/ bsreg pa'i ng lag dar te byed/ bza' ba dang/
[4 ]btung ba dan kyang na cis mi 'bod de/ rtag tu 'grub che la/ byad bzhing yang bzang la mdzes pas/ khyod khyer na bdag dga' re zhes smras so// bram zes/ rgyal bu la smras pa// bdag ni bram
zo ma yin gyi/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po yan taM/ ched du khyod bgam pa'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no zhes phyir brgya byin gyi lus bzang bor bsgyur nas/ khyed ca deng cir smon ces smras so// de nas/
btsun mos lus phyag 'tshal to/ smon lam rnam pa gsum zhig gsol te/ gang zhe na/ gcig tu bu khrid pa'i bram ze phyir yang bdag gi yul du phyin bar gyur cige/ gas su na bdag gi bu gas
bkres pa dang skom pas sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig/ gsum du nargyal bu dang bdag cag gnyis kyang bdag gi yul du myur du 'khor bar gyur cig ces smras pa dang/ brgya byin lha'i dbang pos kyang
de bzhin du grub par gyur cig ces smras so// rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag ni sems can thams cad skye ba dang/ rgya ba dang/ nab dang/ 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal las sgrol bar gyur cig ces smon
lam btab pa dang/ brgya byin lha'i dbang pos lcas pa/ smon lam 'di ni shin tu'ang rgya che ste/ bla named pa yin no// gal te mtho ris su skye zhing nyi zla la dbang ba'i bdag por 'dod dam/
'jig rten gyi rgyal bor 'dod dam/ tshe ring zhing yun du gnas par 'dod na/ bdag gis sbyin nus kyis/ khyod kyis smras ba'asmon lam khams gsum las mchog tu 'das pa yin pas//
@#kru/ bdag gis nus pa ma yin no// rgyal bus smras pa// da ltar re zhig mchog tu phyug por gyur to/ sngon bas kyang lhag par rtagapar sbyin pa byin zhing/ yab rgyal po dang/ klon
po rnams dang bdag cag phrad par shog cig ces smras pa dang/ brgya byin gyis smon pa bzhin du nges par grub par gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu ma snang bar gyur to// yul ke'u le'ab bram ze des byis
pa gas khrid de khyim du 'ongs na/ chung mas 'di skad du/ khyod ngo se 'di lta bu s 'khor te 'ongs pa lta ngo ma tsho'am/ byis pa 'digs ni rgyal po'i gdung la gtogs pa yin na/ snying rje'i sems kyang
med de/ 'di ltar btsogs brdegasashing/ lus la rma dang rnag khrag gas btsog btsog ltar byas pa bzod dam zhes spyi brgyud nas/ byis pa 'di gnyis tshongs la/ bkol du rung ba lding shog cig

patshaces bsgo ba dang/ khyim thab kyang chung mas bsgo ba bzhin tshong dus su seng ba las/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po sprul te// tshong dus su 'ongs nas/ bram ze de la byis pa 'di ni shin tu rin che bas/su'ang

nyo mi nus so zhes smras so// byas pa de gnyis bkres shing skom pa las/ brgya byin gyis lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lhabadri bsung sprul te/ byis pa gnyis kyi ba spu'i khung bu nas lto 'grangs par byas te/
brgya byin gyis bram ze'i sems kyang bskyar nas/ yul yabar phyin par byas so// yul de'i blon po dang yul ma thams cad kyis rgyal bu'i sras/ rgyal po chen po'i tshe bo yan par ma shes pa
med pas/ yulam thams cad mya ngan gyis gdungs te/ blon po la sogs pas bu 'di gnyis ga las 'ongs zhes dris pa dang/ bram ze na re/ bdag gis bslangs te 'ongs pa la/ khyed kyis dri'i
rtsa yod ces smras so// blon po rnams kyis sbas ba/ bdag cag gis yul du 'ongs pas na/ bdag cag gis 'dra bar rigs kyi/ mi 'dra ba ma yin no zhes blon po dang yul mi rnams kyis bgres
te/ bram ze las bu gnyis dbrog par byas pa las/ de'i nang nas khyim bdag gis 'di skad ces gros btab bo// 'di na rgyal bus sbyin par bsams te/ sbyin ba 'di le rgyal bus bsams pa'i yid dang
'gal zhing dbrog par m rigs kyi/ nyosan rgyal po chen po la gsolan/ rgyal bo chen po nyid kyis rin gyis slu bar 'gyur re zhes byas pa dang/ gros snga ma btang nas/ blon po rnams kyis// rgyal

gol 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal po chen po'i deben po gnyis da ltar bram ze zhig 'tshong zhing mchis zhes gsol pa dang/ rgyal pos tshig thos ma thag tu cher dngangs te bram ze dang bu gnyis tho brang
nang du khrid de shog cig ces bsgo nas/ bu gnyis po bram ze nang du 'ongs pa'i tsho/ rgyal bo dang/ btsun mo dang/ go brang gi slas dang/ blon po rnams kyis bu gnyis mthong nas/ thams cad
dbugs kyis brnangs pa tsam du ma dus ba med do// de nas rgyal bos bram ze de la khyod kyis bu 'di gnyis ji ltar thob ces dris nas/ bram ze na re/ bdag gis rgyal bu la bslangs te thob bzhes//
gze'o// rgyal pos byis pa gnyis 'ong bos te thad par blang snyam pa las bu gnyis 'od dum btub bo// de nas rgyal pos bu 'ad gnyis kyi rin ji tsam 'dod ces dris na/

bram zes smra ma khom par khye'us 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag bu phon dngul gyi deng tse steng dang ba grung zhig ri'i// bu mo ni gser gyi dong tse stong dang ba bzhon nyis brgya ri'i zhes gsol pa dang/ rgyal
ngos = khye'ul 'di skad ces smras so// 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi'i nang na bo ni rin po che dbyig ltar rin che ba yin na/ ci'i phyir bu bon ren chud/ bu mo na ren chab r 'dabs/ bu khye'us gsolab/
pho brang gi slas lta brgyal po dang ba ma lags la/ ma rabs dran las mas su bzhes te/ de 2 thugs dgyes pas/ bkur zhing btsun par mdzad da/ rin po che'i gos skon zhing/ bza' ba
dang btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa bstabs nas/ sras gcig pu zhig mnga' ba ra la sbyangs te/ ya ba can pho brang gi slas dang rol cing/ rel mo mdzad kyang/ sras la cung zad tsam yang dgongs
[%]pa'i thugs kyang ma mab bas/ de bas na bu pho ni rin chung la/ bu mo ni rin che bar mngon no// rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ lhag par mi dga' ba'i mya ngan skyes te 'di skad du/
bdag ni reb tu gnong na/ khyed ci'i phyir kho bo'i thang du ma 'ong/ khyad nga la ma dga' 'am/ 'on te bram zes 'jigs zhes dris na/ byis pa nar/ bdag cag ni rgyal po chen po la mi dga'/
ba 'am/ bram zes skug pa'i ng ma lags na/ thog ma rgyal po chen po' tsha bo las/ da ltar mi'i bran khol du gyur bas/ gang na'ang ma'ikhrin khel rgyal po'i phang du 'dug pa'i tshes med pas mi
stobs so// rgyal pos deskad ces smras pa thos nas/ lhag par mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur te/ mi dga' ba gyur nas/ bus gsol pa bzhin du bram ze la rin byon cig ces bsgo nas/ bu gnyis
gdod rgyal bo'i phang du blangs so// bu gnyis rgyal pos blangs nas/ phyag gis bu gnyis kyi mgo nas byugs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni la gnas pa na/ zas su ni ci ze/ gos suni
khyen ces dris na/ bu gnyis na re/ zas su ni shing gi 'bras bu shing thogaza/ gos su napags pa dang snam bu rkyen te/ byamang po dang rtse dga' bas/ mya ngan gyi sems med do zhes gsel to//
denas rgyal pos bram ze de la phyi rol du song zhig ces bsgo ba dang/ bu gnyis kyis/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bram ze 'di rab tu bkres skom gyis nyin na/ de la kha zas kyis
tshim par mdzad du gsol lo// rgyal pos sbas pa/ khyad lam dega' ba 'am/ khon du 'dzin pa med par/ phyir kha zas sbyin par sems bus smas pa/ bdag gi pha byang chub kyi lam/
la dga' bas/ nor rdzas kyis sbyin du med de/ bdag gi lus kyis slong ba la byon pa'i ng bdag cag la dbang ba'i bdag po lags te/ 'dis bdag cag la bkel ba'i las tsam byed dus/
bcug ba 'ang/ thogam phas bsams pa ltar m gyur te/ de sAng rje'i sems tsam yang ma mchis te/ ltogs shing skom pa bzhin du 'dug ba 'di mig gis kyang su zhigegs/
bzod/ bdag gi bas na bu 'ang ma 'a yas par pha rol po la sbyin pa bangan/ rgyal bo chen pos mi gcig gi kha zas tsam la ser sna mdzad dam zhes gsol pa dang/ rgyal bos kyang bram ze de la kha zas
kyis tshim par byon nas/ bram ze'ang rab tu dga' ste/ phyir bdag gis yul du song ngo// de nas rgyal pas/ rgyal bu 'gugs pa'i pho nya btang nas/ pho nya'ang de ma thag tu chas te/ rgyal bu ga
ba la ba der song ngo// der phyin pa dang/ chu zhig la ma bar nas/ pho 1des rgyal bu nyid yid la byas te/ bsams ma grag tu chud las thar nas/ rgyal bu gang na ba der phyin te/ rgyal po'i bkas
rgyal bu slar yul du gshegs su gsol zhes bsgo'o// rgyal bus/ khonya la smas pa/ thog ma rgya' pes le bcu gnyis kyi bar du la sgoms shig ces bse ste/ da dung lo gcig ma tshang bas//
byedu lo tshang nas bdag 'gro'o zhes bsge'o// de nas pho nya'adar log nas/ rgyal po la de bzhin du gsol ba las/ rgyal po khyod phyag dar te yi ge bris nas/ phyir pho rta la bskur te/ 'di skad
ces bsgo'o// khyod ni mi'i nang namakhas pa shes ba can yin pas/ 'gro ba la'ang bzod cing/ 'ong ba la'ang bzod pa yin na/ ci'i phyir khros te bod du ma btub/ khyod dang lhan cig ba'
00 ba dang btung ba btang dgos kyis/ myur du shog cig ces bo rta 'gugs su btang ngo// de nas tho sa yi ge thogs te/ rgyal bu gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ rgyal bu la yi ge phul lo//
rgyal bus yi ge blangs nas/ yi ge lo phyag 'tshal nas/ lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ med la phyir yul du 'gro bar chas so// de'i tshe ri de nas rgyas pa dang/ ri de la gnas pa'i ri dgas
dang gcan gzan la sogs pa rgyal bu 'gro'azhes shes nas/ thams cad lus sa la brdabs nas/ sal 'bri zhing du ba'i skad phyung ngo// chu mig rnams kyang bsams te/ gcan gzan dang ri dgas
kyi phrug gu'ang mnu/ 'dab chags bya mang po'ang snying rje'i skad kyis sgra phyung ngo/ de nas rgyal bu gos khyen nas/ btsunamo dang 'grogs te phyir yul du song ba las/ dgra zla'i yul gyi rgyal
o rgyal bu phyir 'ongs so zhes thos nas/ bal gyi glang bo che dkar bo la gser gyi sgras bstad de/ gser gyi snodadun dngul gyi rus bkang/ dngul gyi snod du na gser gyi rta'us bkang ba
bshams nas/ rgyal bu bsu ba'i phyir nam mkha' la bstod// rgyal bu bsus nas// rgyal po'i 'phrin du 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni ma shes pa'i dbang du gyur te/ rgyal bu las
bal gyi glang po bslangs pas/ de'i rkyen gyis rgyal bu spangs par gyur pas da 'gyod pas na/ mthol tshangs su gsol lo// da rgyal bu slar gshegs zhes thos nas/ rab tu dga' ste//
bal gyi glang bo che de nyid kyang slar phul zhing gser dngul gyi bye'u rnams kyang phul na/ 'di deg rnams kyang bzhes shade/ nongs pa'i skyona rnams kyang byung bar gsol to//
kra rgyal bus smras pa/ par nam zhigegs kha sa ro brgya dang ldan pa sbyar te/ pha rol po gcig lon pa las/ mdes kha zas zos nas/ phyir sa la skyagasan/ phyir skyugs pa'i kha zas dri
bsung dang ldan te/ bzar rung bar 'gyur dgu/ bdag gis sbyin pa byas pa'i ng skyugs pa dang 'dra bas phyir ma 'dod do// nya khyedapal gyi glang po che 'di la zhon la bdag gi lul du song zhig/
khul du khyod kyis rgyal bo 'di ltar bdag bsu zhing/ sbyo ba'i tshig gis stan par smos pa la rab tu dga' 'o zhes gsol cig ces bsgo ba dang/ pho nya de'angabal gyi glang po che la zhon to/ phyir
bdag gis lul du song nas/ rgyal po la de bzhin du gsol ba las/ bal gyi glang po che de'i rkyen gyis 'thab pa'i dgra zla de gcig la gcig byams shing sdug pa'i sems su gyur te/ rgyal po dang
yul mi thams cad bla na med pa'i mnyam sogs pa'i sems bskyed bar gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po yab kyang bal gyi glang po che la bcibs te rgyal bu bsus so// rgyal bus mgo dang gdong
gis phyag 'tshal nas/ rgyal po'i phyi bzhin phyir yul du song ste/ yul mthams cad kyang rab tu dga' mgu rangs nas/ me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ bdan dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/

07 bla khrel sogs pas mchod pa bya ba'i phyi'i bshams te/ sa gzhi'ang sras chus chag chag btab nas bsdad do// rgyal bu pho brang gi nang du 'ongs nas/ yum gyi drung du phyin pa dang/ mge ngos phyag 'tshal nas/

ba'i tshig gis snyan gsol to// de nas rgyal bos rin po che'i bang mdzod thams cad rgyal bu la gtad de/ yid bzhin du sbyin pa byed du bcug nas/ sbyin pa snga ma bas kyang lhag par rgyunam chad par sbyin
pa byed du bcug pas/ mngon par sangs rgyas kyi byung chub thob par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsalapa/ ngas sngon gyi sbyin pa byas pa mngon du drenapa ni de lta bu

yin no// de'i tshe de'i dusan/ rgyal bu don grub ces bya ba ni de ltar ng nyid yin no// de'i tshe yab rgyal por gyur pa de na de ltar de'i yab rgyal bo zas gtsang ma yin no// de'i tshe yum du gyur pa de ni da

ltar yum lha mdzes yanano// de'i tshe na btsun mor gyur pa de na de ltagrags 'dzin ma nyid yin no// de'i tshe dge slong a tsu ta zhes bya ba da ltar mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yin no// de'i tsho brgya byin lha'i

dbang por gyur pa de na deltar shAri'i bu yin no// de'i rjen par gyur pa ni de ltar kun dga' bo khyod yin no// de'i tshe khye'u yi ra zhes bya ba ni da ltar nga'i sras sgra gcan 'dzin yin no// de'atshabu mar gyur

pa de ni yum sru go'u ta ma zhes bya ba yin no// de'i tshe bram ze slongs mo pa de na de ltar lha sbyin nyid yin no// de'i tshe bram ze'i chung mar gyur pa don de ltar bram ze mo tsan tsam na yon no// de ltar nang
shin tu byed dka' ba'ang grangs med/ dang gtumed/ dge ba'i las byas pa yang grangs med dpag tu med de/ de bas na mdo sde 'di dge slong dang bram ze lu sogs ba la rgyas
bar ston cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba 'di lta bu dag yin no// 'phags pa rgyal bu don grub kyi mdo zhes bya ba'i bam po gcig
ts+tsa rdzogs so///sngon rgya las 'gyur ba'i brda rnying par 'jug/(@#/// bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal bu kun tu dge zhes bya ba
'a theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thes pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapa ni/ sngon yul dbus
'gyur tshul gyi rgyal ba shing rta bcu pa'i sras rgyal bu kun tu dge zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes pa'i tshe/ skye bo yongs kyis kyang bkur bar gyur to// 'bong rtsal dang/ yig rtsis dang/ bzo dang//
ma sman dpyad dang/ rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas shing gsal ba cig skyes pa 'tshi/ rgyal pos sras la bstod pa ni/ rigs dang gzugs byad mdzangs dang ldan// shes gsal mkhas shing spyod
lam mdzes// shel ltarogasal ba'i sa gzhi la// zla ba'i 'od zer shar ba 'dra// nyid skyen mun pas ma gnas shing// yon tan ni chen mdzod du 'gyur// mthong na skye bo nyams dgab ste/

0 thams cad yid dang ldan gyur to// gzhon nu rnams kyi slob dpon du gyur pa skyes pa'i tshe/ yab rgyal po na sku naso'ang bgres pa'i steng du bsnyen drag po cig kyang btab ste/ 'jig rten ma phul 'di ru
kun 'di bo gnas gnas mi 'dra nas sras kyis lab la phan dam pa cig gdagasan cis gdags snyam pa'i rjes la/ ring por ma lon par yab 'das par gyur nas/ 'bangs rnams kyis rgyab
bu la rgyal srid ma phul gyi skabs su/ rgyal bu rab tu byung ste/ nags tshal dben par drang srong gi spyod pa la zhugs te/ tshangs bar tshul bzhin du spyod do// re zhig na 'bangs rnams kyis
rgyal bu la rgyal srid dbul bar bshams pa las/ rgyal bu rab tu byung ba mthong nas/ rgyal khams kyi ma yu 'khayongs su ma dbe'u ster pa 'am/ nya thang la ltung ba bzhin 'gro ldog cing/
skyesngags kyi tshig las kye ma'o// lus srog skyong ba'i rgyal pa yab 'dasaso// 'bangs rnams kyang mya ngan gdungs pas nen// dan sras kyang rab tu byung nas ni// 'jig rten 'di runyinub mun gyis
bsgrubs/ kyi hud kyi rgyud ces smre sngags 'don pa 'i tshig las/ 'di bos len par 'bangs rnams kyis rgyal bu la yang zhus pa/ kyi rgyal bo lags/ lus srog skyong ba'irgyal po yab 'das nas//
'bangs kyis rgyal srid lugs bzhinam phul ba// khri len chos bzhine chad pa nod// zhes dang yab kyi mdzad lugs bzhin// rgyal srid bzhes la 'bas rnams skyongs// rgyal po yab
kyi bka' yang de lags te// 'bangs rnams kun kyang de bzhin spyan sngar mchi'o// de skad ces zhus pa las/ rgyal bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag na 'di ltar/
yab rgyal bo ma 'das bzhus rab tu 'byung bar dam bcas pa lags/ dan slar ldog par mi nus so// bdag gis bdud rnams bcom nas ni// gzhan kyi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir// yi dam
chen por bcas pa yin// slar yang ldog par ma nus kyis// blon po khyed rnams kyi nang nas gang mdzangs shing drang ba gcig gis rgyal srid zung zhig ces gsol pa dang/ blon po rnams kyis
slar gsol pa/ 'bangs kyis rgyal srid 'dzin pa ni// sngon chad med srid du byung bas// lugs med mkhos su mi rung bas// gzhan du smras na ngo tshar rung// zhes zhus pas/ yang rgyal bus
gsol ba/ khong nas thang la bor zin pa'i// mchil ma'i thal bar gyur pa de// byar la blangs nas 'thung byed pa// dpe zla gzhan la gan yod// skad cig sgyu ma'i rgyal sridenu// mchil
ma thang la bor ba 'dra'o// phyogs mtshams skyong bar byed pa dang// rgyal khams skyong bar byed pa gnyis// snying rje tsam du 'dra mod kyang// de gnyis khyad par bsam yas te// mtsho
dang glang rjes sems pa 'dra// rab tu byung nas log pa dang// log par lta ba'i sdige mthong na// shani tu 'jigs shing skyi g.yar rung// gas ka phung byed mi sna bar// blon po/
[s ]/ rnams kyang phyir la deng// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ blon po rnams kyis bsam ba la/ lha sras chos la ma khregs pa'i steng du/ 'oskal 'bangs su gyur pas// tshig gsan du mi bzhed na/
da ji ltar bgyi zhes bgyis pa dang/ sngon yab kyi thugs grogs po/ lul bar rtan rgyal po dga' ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ des rgyal bu rab tu byung pa la gros btab na/ rgyal srid
'dzin du btub par nges so snyam nas/ rgyal po dga' ba'i 'od kyi spyan sngar mchis te 'phrin btang/ phyag bgyis/ zhus gsol pa/ kye rgyal po lags/ bdag cag yul dbus 'gyur
tshal gyi rgyal po shing rta bcu pan 'das/ sras rgyal bu kun tu dag ni rab tu byung nas/ rgyal sa na stengs/ 'bangs rnams nasel bur gyur na/ de rgyal bu rab tu byung ba las slar phab ste/ rgyal
srid 'dzin dum gzhug tu mi rung/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ rgyal bo dga' ba'i 'od kyang thugs la gcags nas/ 'khor blon po dang bcas nas rgyal bu rab tu byungaba'i spyanasdur
mchis te 'phrin btang/ phyag bgyis zhus gsol pa/ kye btsun pa lags/ skun tshod de tsam la/ gzhon pa rnams la'ang ma gzigs sam khyim bzangs dpal dang 'dra ba bor nas
ni[﹙ ]radags bzhin du nags tshal dben par 'khyams// mtho btsun rgyal po'i lus bor nas// dbul po'i lus kyang nye bar blangs// nganapa'i gos gyon skye bo yongs kyis 'phyas//
[r/ ]/ dkong sprang bzhin du grong khyer slongs mos 'debs// dus 'dir khyod kyi gnas skabs 'di la ni// bltas nas dgra yi mig kyang mchi mas khengs par 'gyur// la nga na skyes
sam bgegs kyis bslus par des// da lta mya ngan dbang du ma gyur par// rgyal srid bzhes la'abangs rnams skyong du gsol// rgyal po yab kyi bka' mang de lags te// 'bangasa rnams
kun kyang de bzhin spyan sngaramacha'i// de skad ces smras pa dang/ rgyal bus slar gsol pa/ kya rgyal po lags/ dper na ma lte 'grangs pa la kha zas kyi gtam zer ba yi gar mi 'ong ba dang 'dra
[“ ]bar bdag dad pa skyes nas rab tu byung ba la/ sur zlog pa'i gros ngan pa 'debs pa 'di ni tho bur yang ma legs so snyam nas yang zhus pa// kye rgyal po lags/ khyed kyis smras pa'i
tshig de rnams// byams te smras par yin shes kyang// bdag gi don dang shin tu 'gal// nags tshal dben pa gcig pu'i brjida mthong na// rgyal po 'khor
mangs longs spyod skya mgreg tshong 'dra// tsa bur tshugs can dag gi brjod mthong na// dar ber klubs pa sgyu ma'i 'ja' tshon 'dra// brtan po dka thub tshe mthar gtugs mthong na// srog/
lus yal bar 'doro ba smon pa 'dra// skyon sel mgo mang 'dul ba'i rlabs mthong na// gzhan tshon 'dra byed byas pa'i rtsed mo 'dra// kyirgyal po chen po da yang snyan gson cig/ khyim gyi
so nam bya ba la// bya thag chad pa gnyis yod de// sna ma bsams pa sdug bsngal yani// phyi ma bsams pa sha thud ngo// 'jig rten 'di ni tshe btsan phyugs dregs kyang// 'chi bdag dbang du
ma gyur gang yang med// tshe 'disrid la zhe don rgya che yang// yun gyi tshes 'dod rgyal srid la shes na// sa dkar skyes shing gnyer ma'i tshogs 'dusakyang// byis pa shed ma bye dang ci ma 'dra//
don lamakhas pas brtags pas sems can snying re rje// kyi rgyal po lags/ du yang snyan gson cig/ skyon rnams sgyu mar rtogs pas dgral nam ljang// yon tan sgyu mar bshad bas
gtanal dang ma chags// khanas su nges pa med pas sprugs pas ma ma u0f7anga// sems la skyeshi med pas bsad pas 'jigs pa med// nor du nges pa med pas dbrog pas nyam ming//
dpal gyi ral srid kyi chu brag kyang// 'grogs pa'i grogos po bla med byang chub bzang// gser gyi la g.yu ya khren babs kyang// nor gyi dbyig tu sems kyis chog shes bzang// stong zhing
dben pa'i gnas na yun du bde// chog shes khrel 'dzam gos ni kun l sAms par dro// mi rtog rnam grol zas ni sman dang bdud// yang dag bde bar 'tsho yis rgyal bo khyodakyang deng//
de skad ces gsungs pas/ rgyal po dga' ba'i 'od kyis bsams pa/ btsun pa dad pa skyes nas rab tu byung ba la/ slar zlog pa'i gros ngan pa 'debs pa 'di ni tho bur yang ma legs so snyam nas
[; ]dbu@#// yang zhus ba/ kye btsunapa lon na chen po'i gnas khyod la// blo gros ngan pas 'khrul te ma rige nas// nongs pa chenub smras pa'i tshog de rnams// thugs rje chen po'i
sku la bzod par gsol// bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar ci genang lags// zhes zhus pas/ rab tu 'byang bar gnang nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smig gyenanas/ rgyal bu'i g.yas
gral du gnang bar gyur to// de'i tshe 'bangs rnams kyis bsam pa las/ rgyal khams gsakyi rgyal po rab tu byung ba las bsams na/ dam pa'i tshes bya pa'i ding thang bar yid ches nas/
bdag cag kyang nga ba tu 'byung bar ci gnang zhes zhus pas/ rab tu 'byung bar gnang ste/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smig gyon nas/ rgyal bu'i g.yon gral duganang bar gyur to// de'i
tshe de'i dus na/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis/ sa bon me btab par rtsi shing dang nags tshal thams cad kyang zas dang skom du gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal du kun tu dge rab
tsha tu byung ba ni gzhan du ma sems shig/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa nyid de// rgyal po dga' ba'i 'od rab tu byung bani gzhan du ma sems shig 'phags pa byams pa nyid do// 'khor
blon po dang 'bangs rnams rab tu byung ba ni gzhan du ma sems shig/ tshodang ldan pa shA ra'i bu la sogs pa tshe dang ldan pa rnams so/ rgyal bu kun tu dge rab tu byung ba'i sku'i yon
tan gyis rgyal khams gnyis kyi blon po dang 'bangs rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//ka@#// rgya gar skad du/ sgrib ropa naman dran/
bod skad du/ gnas brtan spyan drang ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ dgongs nas kyang shel dang/ nor bu dang/ dadul dad/ ku mud
dad kha ba'i phung po dang/ zla ba'i zer dang/ ston gyi chu dang/ nam thang ba dang/ pad+ma'i rtsa lag ltar drame med par mdzod la/ rlung gi stobs kyis shinge ga lcag phran bskyed pa dang/ rmog
rgyudang sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang klog daMng/ rta'i shing rta'i rdul dang bal glang gi phrug gu'i rna mchog dang/ sbrul gyi rtsa dang/ zil pa dang/ rgya mtsho bskyed pa'i rlabs ltar g.yo ba'i
yod skad cig re re la'angam sdod par 'gro ba/ rtse gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis yud tsam zhig rgyu ba nang du dgag tu gsol/ smras pa// ri gzar 'bab pa'i dba' rlabs 'gyur/
bas kyang// gang gi dba' rlabs 'gyur la bskrunamed par// 'jig pa thogs mad g.yo ba'i yid de ni// yud tsam rtse gcig mdzod cig btsun pa rnams// lha yi bu mo yi de chad shugs
byung skad cig zim mer byas pa'i mig/ ring zhing rje ldan bkra la 'od zer migechags lta ba'i g.yo ba yis// gang gi thugs ni skyeb rgyun gcod rgyu las 'khrugs par ma gyur pa// bdud kyi
'phung la/dpung 'joms mkhas gcig thams cad mkhyen pa de la phyag mdzod cig/ skye ldan gang du brtan nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas sems dmya 'gazhi dang// mi dgas 'jig/
rtan gnas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur sdug bsngal 'jig byed pa// 'khor ba dag na 'gro ba chen po rnams kyi grogs 'gyur 'phags gcig du// zhi bde grong khyer ser gzhol/ chos de la nas pas/
ston par mdzod// zhi ba'i bdag nyid gang zhigo bde gshegs gsung rab mthar phyin 'byung sla zhing// gang legs par cung zad tsam zhig byin yang sbyin pa 'phel 'gyur la// ye shes snang bsamun
ba zad byas dge slong dge 'dun de la ni// nyon mongs gcod pa'i ched du thams cad kyis kyang gus par phyag mdzod cig/ lcang lo chun po'i sgra mang mgo la thogs shing dbung mgo gnyim yog ga/
rang gi 'od zer phyogs mthun 'bro ba rnams kyis 'jig rten kun 'gengs pa// lha dbang brgya byin cod pan btud de tshangs la phyag bya gang yin de// phyin nas dga' byas sems kyi tid 'dzin shin tu
chen po'i 'bras bu ni// rdo rje 'od 'phro 'phreng bas dbung rgyan 'dres nas mdzes gyur cing// lha la bka' stsal dbang po ma 2se skyong ba gang yin pa// de dag dge ba dag 'byung rnam smin 'gyur
dus nyams dga' zhing// mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyun u yin// kha nas rgyags 'gyur drazhem 'byang zhing mig gi mtha' dmar la// dbugs 'byung do shal ga las
bsanum 'bur la 'dud byed pa// smyug gu lhan cig nor bdag dga' tshal 'dug pa gang yin pa// de yang 'gro nyams dga' sbyin pa'i bdag nyid chen po yin// 'brug sgra sgrog cing sprin rnams chu ni
kun tu len byed pa// rlabs 'byung dus nanor bu byu ru dung dang nya phyis 'byung// rin chen gnas ni chu la nyid kyi 'byor pas gang srung ba// der yang rgyun spyon pa mchog ces thub pas bka' stsal
to= gang lang 'od zer rnams kyis mkha' la skarama'i 'kher la zil mnan cing/ ku mud la rje de yangs rnams su dpalani re tu rnam bye nas/ krung po' ba'idapal dang ldan zhing
mtshan mo shin tu rab mdzes pa// de yang nges par sbyin pa nyid kyis 'bras bu ro bri mang po yin// ri rab rtse la shing rtasalam ka 'dug pa'i rin chen rdo gtseg cing// rta yi rkang lag rnamA
kyi dgu tshigachu bo'i rlabs ni gcod byed la// mun pa bsal phyir nyi mas skar ma thale mnan lam me gang yin pa// de rgyu yod kyi ting nge 'dzin rgyu bskyed pa'i sbyin par thub pas gsungs/
rgyal mtshan rtser gtags rin chen 'od zer snang ba nam mkha' dmar gyur cing/ rta rmig 'dor bas mkha' la sprin gyi 'phreng ba dag kyang 'dral byed lo// rnga yab dkar pos g.yabs
shing 'khor los sgyur ba song ba gang yin pa// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu de yang sbyin pas bsgrubs zhes thub pas bka' stsal to// gser gyi pad+ma'i rdul gyi phye mas dmar bros mtshoranikhrus/
byas te// de yi gnas 'dab bung sgra 'byin rnams su nyal ba'i bde rud nas// ge'adzin chung ma lhan cig 'jigs med mkha' las 'grob gang yin pa// de yang
zla ser sna 'dril zhing skyon med dga' ba'i sbyin pa'i gzi brjid yin// mA la yi ri rtsa tshan dan grib mas bsil ba yangs pa dang// 'bags byed ra deng gangs dang lhan po'i re deng man+tA ra'i bol
grub pa'i tshogs chen chung ma lan cig 'jigs bral dga' po gang yin pa// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu tshe 'di'i snying po 'byor pa de yang gtong ba'i yani// budamed rkang gdub 'khrol ba'i 'grog
sa 'bur pa'i thug don gnas pa yin// khang pa mthon po rnams dang 'bags byed ri skye 'granapa'i ba glang dang// gdugs dang rnga yab bud med g.yog 'khor rin chen gser dang
rta rnams dang// bzang mdzes de dag kun kyang sdon gyi sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rnam smin yin// ban d+hu ka ltar rtsa dmar rgun chang gsar snod bzang por legs blugs pa// yongs 'du a
ma smin gas lta bur dra zhemo ut+pal 'gying zhing ldem// na chung shAnam nam snyogs dus kyis stobs shing yams grangs mang 'grim pa// mchog tu dge ba de rgya sbyin pa yin zhes blo gros dag
bas gsungs/ gsar gyi phag skad skyed bcings snyan sgra 'dzin zhing smon pa ya gcig skyod// mge yangs rnar thug dka' gnag 'byes la skra bgab mo tog 'phrong dkrigs pa/
na chung bzang bo ban rgyas bdag nyid legs byas rnams kyis bran ltar byed// tshogs bsags 'bras de sbyin pa'i chab tid ces zas gtsang rgyal pos gsungs// de ltar lags pas bde
bar gshegs pas gsung rab mtha' dag thugs su chud pa ni tu rgyas pa'i chu ltar gyur pa/ snying po dri ma med pa dang/ lha'i skye bos klu'i gnas su gyurab tshul khrims 'dren ma ma yin zhing
rgya che ba'i chu dang ldan pa/ dge ba la rnam par rtog pa'i zla ba shar ba'i dbang gis/ ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs rgyas pa'i dus kyi rlabasakyis byang chub pa na lag skyon med pa' nor bu mang pos
jug langs pa/ sems kyis gzhi la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i'i ngo tshan po rtam pa/ 'bras bu'i bye brag thob pa/ gang zag chen po'i chu srin rgyu ba/ 'phags pa'i bden
pa dang/ yang dag par sbyong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i ngogs dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa'i re ma gonas pa// sbyangs pa' yon
tan goms pa/ dag pa'i mu tig ga te phyis kyi khog lus dang ldan pa/ mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid gting mi dpogs shing zab pa/ rgyun ma 'chad par klog pa dang kha ton byed
pa'i sgrachar 'byung ba/ 'phags pa'i dge slong dge 'dun gyi tshogs rgya chen po la bdag gsol ba 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ srid pa'i 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ dumanas
nu// dge ba'i sa bon btabab/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan ba'i gzhal med khang gis gzhi ga bur gyur pa bzod pa dang/ des ba dang/ byams pa dang/ tshul
khrims dang/ thos pa dang/ zhi ba'i gnas/ bdag dang gzhan gyi gzhung gi don gyi de kho na ma lus par rtogs pa/ yongs su shes pa bsgoms pas dran pa nye bar gnas pa/ yang dag
pa'i yongs dang mthong bas/ log par lta ba'i ring 'bri bsal kha/ legs par brjod cing shis la rgya che ba'i ming dang ldan pa// skye bo bla ma la bsenabakur byed pa dang/ mngon du/
ba dang/ phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i tshul bzang po dang ldan zhing/ mdongs gsol bas snyan pa rnams bsad pa/ sten gyi zla ba nya ba'i 'od zer dag pa lta bu'i yid 'byung ba sbyin
bdag chen po mi ba'i bdag nyid can mange 'di zhes bya ba 'di ni/ khyim bdag legs sbyin dang/ bzang ldan dang/ btsunam 'kher gyi blo dang/ mu sha la dang/ tra pu sa dang/ go/
la dang/ rta pa gar na ka dang/ mgon med zas sbyin dang/ drag po dang/ nag pa dad/ nam gru la sogs pa dang/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das la yid dad pa gsal rgyal dang
tshangs pas byin dang/ rgyal po shar pa'i bu dang/ gtum po rab tu snangal sogs pa sa'i steng la dbang ba'i sbyin pa las byung ba'i legs par spyad pa'i rjes su slob ste/ lus dang/
[s ]longs spyod dang/ srog la sgyu ma dang/ smig rgyu dang/ dri za'i grong khyer dang/ mgal me bskor ba dang/ rmi lam dang/ ri'i 'bab chu'i chu ltar g.yo bar rige nas/ stobs bcu mnga'
bas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang/ chos mngon pa dang/ 'dul ba dang/ mdo sde 'dzin cing/ dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yod do zhes bsod nams kyi sa bon
skyed pa'i rgyu/ 'khor ba'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi/ skye bo ngan pas red par dka' ba/ ser sna can gyi yid 'joms pa sgrub pa na/ ston gyi zab dri ma med pa ltar dang ba'i thug
mnga' ba/ srid pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sa bon gcod ba/ sems can thams cad du bsam pa mkhyen pa// grags pa 'jig rten gsum du khyab pa/ bdud kyi bu me stag pa rgyun gcod//
pa'i rgyu/ skyabs su 'os pa// chos ston pa// 'gro ba la dge ba'i phyi'i bya dka' ba'i 'phrin las rnams kyis/ chos thams cad thugs su chud pas rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas
nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba gsal bas rig nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa ltar rang shong rdzi ma legs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa/ gnod sbyin gyi bdag po'i gtsug gi nor bu chen pos zhabs kyi ser/
ma kun tu bskor ba gser gyi mchod sdong ltar gsal ba bas/ sku la rdo rje dang/ lcags kyu dang/ pad+ma dang/ nya dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ gdugs dang/ 'khor lo la sog
[ri ]@#// pa'i mtshan rnams kyi mtshan mnga' ba/ pad+ma'i 'byung gnas rnams la snang ba mdzad pa'i 'od kyi 'phreng bas bye brag med par khyab par 'gengs pa// bung ba'i tshogs ltar sde
ba'i gtsug tor gyi nang nas kun tu 'byung ba'i 'od kyi dra bas phyogs kyi dkyila 'khor ma lus par bkram pa'i byas ra/ khan ma tho ba med par zhugs pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa ston pa/ zhi ba'i
gzhol ba'i lam du 'dren pa/ 'jig rten skyel bamanyes gshin pa'i gnyen gcig du/ mu stegs can ngan pa'i rgol ba rnams kyis gsung dang/ thugs dang/ dga' ba dang/ mthu la mnon/
pa zas gtsang ma'i sras/ yul rnams kun la sred pa 'byung ba'i rgyun skabs byed pa'i rgyu/ skye bo mkhas pa rnams ni sad par bya phyi'i shar gyur pa// bag la nyal gyi rab rib sel ba yi shes
snang ba 'i mchog/ sa rnams mtha' dag snang ba phyogs rnams thams cad snang mdzad pa// phyag dang zhabs dang dbu na rab tu byin zhing tshul khrims dang// smon lam dgas byang chub lam bzang
ma yang dag bsgrubs gyur ba/ srid pa'i 'gro ba'i dug gi snye ma'i steng du lhung ba yi// skye dgu rnams lakhan ma tho med pa ston mdzad pa// srid pa rnam pa gsum 'jige pa/ bcom ldan
'das stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa ma 'jigs pa bzhi mnga' ba/ dpa' ba dang mthu kha na ma tho ba med pa// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pas sku brjid pa/ pha rol tu
byin pa drug dang/ dka' ba brgyaphrag du dam pa'i chos dkon mchog bsgrubs pa/ btsal ba tsam gyis sems can mtha' dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dunarang tuzhi ba dang/ tshul khrims dang/ thos ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ bzod pa dang/ byams pa dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs
pa'i rab rib dang lange tog ma lus pa bsal ba/ 'khor ba'ared bzhin rig pa dang/ phyogs phyogs kyi gtsug lag khang dang/ kun dga' ra ba dang/ ri dang/ nags 'dab
dang khrad khrod dang/ chu dang/ ri sul dang/ gshe sa dang/ ne'u gsing dang/ shing gi grib ma rnam pa sna tshogs la dgyes pa yul dang ljongs du ma la phan gdags
pa stsol bar mdzad pa// yang dag pa'i dran pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ dga' ba thob pa las ma nyams pa// phung po lta sa'i skad cage bar lang dag ga so sor rtog pa'i yid la
byed bar bskyed pa/ mdo dang/ 'dul ba dang/ chos mngon pa dang/ skyes pa'i rengs dang/ gleng gzhi dang/ tshigs su bcad pa dang/ rtogs pa brjod pa dang/ de lta
bu byung bgatanal khab pa'i gtam gyis sems sbyangs pa/ rang gi lus dang/ dag dang/ yid kyi 'jug pa dran ba nye bar gnas bar rgyu ba/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/
byang chub kyi len lag dang/ bdenapa dar/ 'phags pa ba le ma dad/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa goms bas dad pa thob pa dang/ tshor bas gzhan dang
k+Sha gzhan n bsags pa'i rnam par smin pas grub pa/ ji ltar 'byon par nus pa dang 'thun pa'i rtsom pas tshogs bsags pa/ phan yon lnga'i rgyu/ sems can thams cad gnas par byed
pa 'jig rten pha rol tu bde ba thobapar byed pa/ kha dog dang/ dri dang/ rodang/ reg pa dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba gya nom pa'i bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/
bldag pa dang/ brtsub pa dang/ gzhib pa la sogs pa zhal zas bsham par bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs zhal zas khyad par can gyis spyan 'dren to// de la thog mar bcom ldan 'das
shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa'i tsho/ gang dag ye shes kyi mes nyon mongs pa'i ng thams cad ma lus bar bsregs pa// gtong ba'i ngang tshul can gyi sbyin pa'i sa bon
'phel ba'i rgyur gyur pa/ phra ba gzigs pa mkhas pa/ de kho na la sgom dalta ste/ gnas brtan b+ha ra d+ha dza bsod snyoms len dang/ 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin dang/ sbyin byed
dad Da lam bstan pa dang/ skyed bod dang/ gser be'u dang/ rtogs byed dang/ rdo rje can gyi bu dang/ 'phags pa bsrungs ba'i klu dang/ klu sde la sogs pa slob ma bstan pa
gnas bar bya ba'i phyir/ gnod par gyur kyang lus kyi khur khyerab rnams dang/ gzhan yang gang dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i skye ba la na ba'i phyir/ gser gyi rdo leb chen po'i snying na 'dug
pa'i rig sngags 'chang mchu lenapas glang po che yur ba/ bung ba'i pad+ma la 'jib cing 'khod pa'i ma mda' ka'i rdzong ga chu dang ldan zhing/ yal ga gsal ba'i steng na rin po che'i me tog gi
'phreng ba bres pa'i shing yongs su 'dus kyis kun tu mdzes par byas pa'i rolhun po 'bab chu 'bab pa'i sa gzhi la 'khod pa rnams dang/ yang gang dag/ gser gyi rked nas bsil ba'i
chu 'bab la// chu la zla ba'i gzugs brnyan 'byung 'gyur zhing// zla ba'i 'od kyis ku mud kha phye ste// ku muta tshal na skad snyan dad pa gnas// dad mo mtsha'u na sgra skad snyan pa 'byin//
mtsho rigs rma bya dgar khacas rgyags pa gnas// rmabya rgyags sgras risul san pa grags// ra sul yal ga glags pas ri rtsa 'khris// rartsi stong rnams nan sbyin chags la// lang ling
sngon smineshong khra khro snang// sman shong skyes pa'i nor bu ldum bu gsal// ldum bu las bral lhung ba'i me tog ldan// me tog rgyas pa'i dpag bsam shange tshalamadzis// mdzes pa'i
lhas gserakyi phag skad drud// gser gyi phag skya'i sgros ni bya 'drogs shing// byas tshesaM shing thog rtsa las chad de bul// rtsa 'phyang khu ba zag ba spos kyitra// sa glang dbang
nyusu// po'abreg zag dra'ib ma// drileb che ba'i lo sha re 'khor mang// bal grang mo rgyags drag 'gro lang long gyur// bung ba'i khyu yis me tog zegs gyur cing//
bal ba/me tog rgyas pas gad bdakar// gad pa chad pas nor bu'i dum bu snang// me tog mgo lcog brul bas rnam par bkra// nor bu sol ma mang pos ri zhol spras// mo tog zags
ba'angeshing gi yal gar gnas pa'i bung ba dga' bas phung rnams dang// zla ba 'dog zer dkar po dang pa lta bu s nye 'khor rdo ba chag chag btab// lhun po mtho ba'i saM la thug pa gang dag
rab tu zhi ba'i shugs kyise zhugs// dri dag dri med zla 'dra'agrag ldan 'a di yosbyin pa'i gnas la snyan du gsol// rgya mtsho ba'i chu 'gramar bo ma la ya'i// ra ngos ta ma la stsalamag
'thon pa yi 'phreng ba can// sprul ma 'khris pa tsan dan shing gi nags tshal na// bstan pa gang dag bzhugs par gyur ba de dag dang// ma'i shing rta'i rmig pas rdo bcag cing//
ma 'am ma phrugs kyi nyams dga' ba// 'a sul mthon po dpag bsamanags mang dang// rab gab rnams na gangadag bzhugs pa dang// shing gi me tog 'bul bas dri zhim
byas ba'i ser bu ngad ldang zhim// nags na glang po dregs pa zags pas bsgom pa'i rin chen 'khri shing khyim// khyim la chags pa med pas bsten pa'i bsod nams chu gling gi/
gnya' shing 'dzin bya rgyags khyug gnas pan gang dag bzhugs pa dang// bal glang ma sogs snang ba ro bri'i tshal// me tog ldan zhin ser bu ngad ldan pa// sa hur bo ngo ngos yangs pa la/
yongs dag thugs mnga' thub pa bzhugs dgu dang// pad+maut+pal rgyas pa 'byung ba'i gnas// nyin re nyi ma'i shing rtas rdo snad can// srid pa'i 'jigs bral rab tu yid 'ong ba/ 'char
ba'i re steng gang dag bzhugs pa dang// ri la rtsi mas sngo sangs sprinathalasman ljongs can// dogs ldan chu bon ra ma dasan sul bkrus/ glang po che yi mche ba soms pas phyogs glogs
ba yo'o// 'bigs byed rma bya rgyags gnas pa na bzhugs dgu dang// sna tshogs 'byung khung tshon gyis kha bsgyur phug dang ldan zhing sprin kyang chags gyur la// kolags ldan pa gtsang
ma'i chu yi sa ngogs kyis thob mang po bkrus gyur cing// ngos la ba glang mjug ma mang po'iphyang zhing klog 'gyus snying byas pa// yos 'dus ri rtse phrog na gcig bu sred dang bral ba gang
dag bzhugs pa dang// yang gang dgashing dang 'khri shing rnam pa mang po 'dab chags par gnas pa/ ne'u gsing 'jam zhing sde ba'i steng na rma bya'i khyu gar byed cing sgrasnyan pa 'byin pa//
'i dgas kyi tshogs bag yangs su gnas pa'i sos bcad pa'ilco'amyu gu yod pa/ me tog gi dri zhim pos bsgos pas bser bu 'jam zhing bsil ba'i ngod ldang ba'i nags 'dab rnams su
[g]@#// gnas bcas te bzhugs ba rnams dad/ yang gang dag dus su rlabs 'byung ba'i chu'i dba' rlabs kyis g.yengs pa' na le sham dang/ lisha dang/ la pa la
'bras bu sngon po mang po 'grigs pa'i tsan dan dang a ka ru'i shing khrod na gnas pa'i sprul mgo gdengs ka gdengs shing 'jigs su rung ba yodapa/glang po che dregs pa dang bcas pa'i snas byu ru'i
sdong bu bskyel ba dang ldan zhing/ t+tima'i 'od zer gyis reg pa'i dbang gis mu tig gis yod pa'i te phus kha bye ba'i kheg pas rnam par sa pa// lta bar bul ba dad ldan pa// nor mchog gi rdol/
grub pa'i chung ma'i skye bo gnas 'dabya 'khyu dga' sesgra 'byin pas klu len pa lta bu yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i klong dag na/ klu'i bdag pos lus chen pos sku dkris te/ gdengs ka'i gdugs
kyis ma'i 'od zer bsgribs shing bsam gtan mdzad pa rnams dang/ sman ljongs dgan phyogs kyi klong chen brang gis rdo ba khebs pa'i khyu 'khod cing/ 'khor bcas lan cigam yaner ro/
ba'i gnod spyin mo dag gnas gyur la// klu ya rdzal po mgo des bstod de kha nas 'od 'bar 'byung bas shange 'barangashing// gangs ri tis lan blo gtsang gang dag zhal ton mdzad cing bzhugs
pa dang/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis kha shal ba'i ro 'gab ldan pa ma smad pa// ri bo man+da ra la nyin phyed tshun chad bzhugs// bzhugs shing nyi ma phyed par 'gyur nas gad dag gzhan du
bzhugs pa'i phyir// nor bus rtse me bkram pa'i khor yug ra la sten pa dang// gang dag 'bri sheshing gzhon nus rdo bas khe bsu gyur ba'i// dbang chen rtse mo yid du 'ong bar bder gnas te//
mkha' ljang shugs kyis nang du klu rnams krugs pa yi// rgya mtsho rin chen gnas pa gzigs pa dang// ngang pa'i tshogs nyon shon tu gtsang ba drag 'bab can gyi chu yas ri bgab bkrus gyur cing//
phyogs kyi glang pos bskyel ba'i sa la ka yis rdo ba chen po mang po 'khebs gyur la// gcan gzanadabang po ral pa 'khyil dung gsal bas dpung ba'i phyogs 'bar 1la bas gang gyur cing//
sbal mig 'thon pa'i lcag mas 'khor ba grub pa ngal sos ri bo krin dzar gang gshegs dang [}]nga dag mun bsal khyad par can gyi blos// shing lcen sna tshogs me tog rgyas gyur cing
ri dgas rgyu bas ne'u gsing gzhon bsnad ba// gzi rdon gas rnams mi stong bzhugs pa dang// yang gang dag nub kyi ba lang spyod dang/ shar gyi lus 'phags dang/ byang gi sgra mi snyan
dang Da gling gzhan dag na skyes pa'i lcag phran mdeg snyam zhing sde la 'jam par mang pos sa gzhi kun tu khebs pa zhing gi grob ma'i dkyil 'khor bsil ba dang/ 'khri shing gis 'khor
cing de dgas mad de gnas pa'i nags tshol de dang de dag na bzhugags pa rnams dang/ yul dar dang/ gnad ra dang/ gu zan dang/ lo dang/ shi rade dang/ bag 'a dang//
bru sha dang/ kha che dang/ rgya yul dang/ grong khyer zas 'dra dang/ rdo 'jog zas 'dra dang/ skyes ba'agrong khyer dang/ phyogs mtshams dang/ kun tu me la ba dang/ srung byed dang

grong khyer dang/ tsa tu bag dang/ tsa ta dang/b+hanakad tsa dang/ ko'u shal deng/ ser skya'i gnas dang/ mnyan yod dang/ mi thub pa dang/ grong khyer me tog dang/ ra dang/ bcom brlag dang/ grong khyer
longs spyodadang/ tsam pa dang/ rgyal po'i khab dang/ dbang po'akhrig phug dang/ 'brog dang/ ko'u na' grong dad/ kun dga' grong dang mchod rten rgya grong dang/ 'phrul bcug gi grong dang
rnam par rgyal kha'i grong dang/ gangs ba li dang/ kha raring 'phel ba dang/ 'phel byed dang/ zangs kyis g.yogs dang/ sde snyigs 'dzin dang ko sa la dang/ an dra dang/ kaling ga dang/

bar ba ra dang/ la kha ni'i klong dang/ sange ga la'i grong khyer dang/ gser skyes dang/ ha ke la dang ba rosha ka ta dang/ nal ke ra dang/ pan sa'i gling dang/ shur pa ra dang/ rnam pa'i grong khyer dang/
dpal gyi shong dang/ dngul chu'i gnas la sogs pa lu la dang/ cha byad dang/ skad dang/ gnas pa dang/ cho ga dang/ rigs dang/ nus dang/ tshul khrims dwang tshul khrims can dumar yul mi
gnas ba'i yul gzhan dag na bzhugs ba rnams dang/ gang dag sngonachad tizla'i 'od kyaem phog cing// shel sbrul gyi lus kyi 'obs nas ra ro rung// de yi ge tshug gi rin chen 'od kyis mun pa sa/
ba'i sa 'og tu nA redi por ma thogasagshegs gyur dang// gang dag chu ltar sa la thogs med bye'u zul mdzad pa dang// gang dag sar gnas phyagag rtse zhes zla ba reg mdzad dang// gang dag bya
ltar ma mkha' la nishugs kyis rgyu mdzad cing// na bza'amatha' mas spronemathurareg pas sngon ling 'jig mdzad dang// gang dag lha dang/ chu dang/ grub pa dang/ 'khor ba dang/ tshogs rnams kyis rtag
tumachod pa 'jig med dang/ bung ba'i ri ded rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshel dang/ shar kyi ri bo dang/ nub kyi re bo dang/ sha re kun ba ta dang/ kun so ma dang/ tan sa' tshaladang/ bsil tshal dang/
lhas sbal dang 'jigs med dang/ nags tshal chen po dang/ tsher ma can gyi nags tshal dang/ byams pa 'a ni dang/ chusun byis gsod cing kyi dang/ ri nag po dang da gnas kyi ro dang/
gser skya'i reding/ me tog dang/ dang/ tsanadanar dad/ klu'i po ra dang/ tsan danar bo dang/ tshor ma'i ri bo dang/ lha yul bangs dang/ a bsam b+ha dang/ kun dga' stong ldan dang/
ri bo'i rgyal mtshan dang/ bzhi bkrus dang/ rang rig mchod rten dad/ sa lu sbyangs ldan dang/ pho brang 'khor dpal yon can dang bya rgod kyi phung bo dang/ ri dgas kyi nags dang/
ka shod dang/ gtsug lag khang gsar ka nas ka sha pa la sogs pa cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams dang/ dar ma ra dzi ka'i mchod rten dum dang/ sangs rgyas bzhi'i
[7, ]// gdan khri yodapa/ bsod nams su 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs rgyun mi 'chad par klog pa dang/ kha ton dang bsam gtan dad/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ sems par 'jug
pa dang tshul bzhin yod la byed pas 'jug pa dar ba'i dgra bcom pa rnams bzhugs bzhugs pa// chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ mal chadang/ na ba'i gsos sman yo byad dang/
rgyu 'tshog chas rnams kyis legs par byas pa/ mtha' mtha' na chu'i gnas yod pa la nye bar spyod pas nyams dga' ba/ bde bar gshegs pa'i zhebs kyis bcags pas gtsang bar gyur ba'i
sa gzhi can/ zhi ba thub pa'i skye bo gnas pa rnams la/ de dpon bsgoms pas yid kyi ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa tshe'i lhag ma gnas par mdzad pa rnams dad/ gang dag glog 'gyu sbyagar dag
gis sku lus bkra byas sngon snum 'drar gyur nas// bkres pa'i sdug bsngal snodargyur mda' rtse rnon po lta bu'i spyi yis rab gang zhing// skom pas mge zhu ma stag bcas pa'i ma rnams kyis
ni kun nas lus bskor ba'i// ya degs gnam du lta ba rnams la thugs rjes steng nas char gyi rgyun 'babs dang// rin chen bye ma'i 'phred ba bya rgyur dkrigs mthul// ngang khyu bag/
yangs gnas shing lang long nyal gyur cing// chu dang nye bar chu yi zer mas bsil gyur ba// mnos la mtsho gling bsam gtana mdzad dgu dang/ gang dag mi rigs mang po'i sha dang khrag gi re bre
bas dga' bar gyur pa 'a bya bA 'i tshogs kyis gang gyur pa'i sa phyogs ma go'i byed pa gas nas tshal thigs thigs thog pa'i snam gyis mchod pa'i mes tshig cing rang gi me lces shing gcar ba bskams/
shing rnyes pa/ lag pa dang rkang pa dang/ so dang/ skra'i dum sgrugs kyis gang zhing zla ba dri ma med pa'i 'od lta bu'i kengarus kyi phung po yod la/ skad cig tur langs byung nas/ ma la la a
la la zhis sgra 'byin cing/ ma stag dar bas pa'i gad mo drag pos 'byung po 'khrugs shing skrag par gyur pa// ce spyang me shis pa'i kha nas du ba dang bcas pa'i me lce byung ba'i dur khrod chan
po dag na bud med kyi re spros shing lhang nger gyur pa'i steng na 'a dug cing dga' ba'i bya rgod kyimechu dang sder mos brad cing lce'i nang na srin bu'i rigs rnams gnas pa/ co sbyang gi stobs kyi
shugs kyis drangs pa'i nang khrol drame zhem po'i dum bus 'khor la/ bya khA bkres pas mag gosha brus pa dag la gzigs shing rtag tum sdug pa bsgoms te/ gang dag kha cig ro yi gnas
mal dong nas niaM// khrag dang sa chags dmar zhing rtsub ba'i sku 'khyil dang/ bya la mchu dang sder mos mig rgo brusapar yang// mo ro phor ba lus la gzigs par gyur pa dang// sgo
dang srang bar la lar me 'bar me lce'i rtse mo mang pos mgo rmongs shing// ral gri gtun dang rdo bas bstan cing brdungs nas skye bo khu co 'don gyur la// gshin rje'i pho nya snying brtse med pa
[e]/ @#// stod cig zer ba'i bzod ga sgras gang ba'i// sems can dmyal ba rnams su'ang srog chags don phyir gang dag skad cig 'jug pa dang/ gzhan yang sha ba ra me'i dug
za mdas glang po che 'khrugs pa'i mdun legasan/ mal ba bregs pa'i sdong bu yod// phyogs kyi be nasarlung chen po langs bas bod ma'atshol bskyed nas 'khri shing gi drub dang 'drud pa las
me byung ba'i me lcesashing mchog sna tshogs tshig nas/ ri dgas dang phag rgod mchog mgyogs pa brgya dag skrag cing mgo rmongs pa yod ba/ shing le mang po lhags shing rus ba can/ bsal
ba'i grob ma sang seng med pa// nyams dga' ba'i longs spyod yod pa// nags kyi ma hadang phag rgod kyi mi tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ kahan bskyed pas chu dri zhim por gyur pa'i me'u
'gram na shang la spre'u khyu gnas pa/ nye 'khor gyi ro las chu rlabs mi drag par 'bab pas 'khor nas ne'u gsing med pa'i sa gzhi yod pa'i 'brog dgan/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid can//
'tshang pa dang/ klog po dang/ kha ton dang/ bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa gang dag bag med pa'i gnas dar la bab pa yal bar mdzad pa rnams dang/ ri bo'i rdo leb che zhing
yangs la rab tu rnam pa 'dra gyur cing/ glog gi 'phreng bar ma rtogs yod la 'ja' yis bkra ba'i bdag nyid can// chu bsal sngon chags rnams la chu 'bab zer phran chags pa'i
[o/ ]rdzi ldan spyan// bser bus na bza' g.yo ba gang dag nyi ma'i gung la bzhugs ba dang// de bzhin du rtag tu goms pa'i lam nas 'deng ba'i glang po'i khyu'i rmig rjes yod pa/ nags kyi ma he
'khrugs pa'i ris grog 'khor chen po bshig pa'i shol gyi khung bu nas sbrul gyis lus phyed phyung ste/ nags kyi rlung 'gam pa yod pa// snga tshal stug po dang/ 'dum bu dang/ shing ka sha
stug po'i khrod na/ stag zung du gnas pa can/ phag rgod kyi snas glogis pa'i glang sang gi rtsa ba 'dzangs pa ral pa ltar 'dug pa yod pa/ shing na tshuli'i me tog brul bas rdo ba rtsa
dmar bar gyur pa yod pa/ gshong gi phyogs su ri dgas kyi khyu 'dam rdzab thogs pa yod pa// shing la dro sngon po stag por skyes pa mang pa yod pa'i gsher sa 'i chu dgur dag tu mngon par
dgyes shing dge ba'i phyogs ston pa rnams dang/ rin po tsho'i 'od zer gyi chu rtsa dmar bar gyural/ thugs bsam gtan la zhen pas dpag bsam gyi shing galcag ma'i rtsa mes reg pa'i rdo sbis
kyi bad lcang gi sul na rtsol ba med pa ragang dag bzhugs pa dang/ gang dag seng ge bskyangs pa yod pa/ ri dgas rgyu ba dang ldan pa dang/ chu 'dus to'ababo pa yod pa/ g.yos pas/
stang gi rtse mo ldem pa'i stangs kyis skar ma'i tshogs pa/ sa steng na lci ba lhun po lcag phran la la bu bzhin du bsgrim ma degs par zhabs kyaser ma sa'i 'og gi rnang dang bcas par 'phen pa
chu// dag dang/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa gang dag char ba'i rjes rdol ba'i bu ga dus nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba/ zla ba lta bu yod cing/ rmang rdo dang rtsig ngos shag shig tu
gyur ba'i mtshams su brgya chagasal/ sbrul gsob rlung gis gang ste/ lhad der 'dug pa'i 'phreng pa rtag tu yod cing de nags kyi ri dgas kyi lces tsha sgo rdul can rtsub po bldags pas/
shing rtsa sang seng du gyur pa yod la/ rmig rmang dusrin bu go de'i tshogs ring nas gnas par gyur cing/ sra me mgo bstod de phyogs su lta bas bya ba skag pa yod la nang du rtswa sngon de stug
po skyes pa'i 'jig pa'i drung gi gseb na phye ma leb rgyu ba yod cing/ 'ug pa mang po sgra 'byin cing glu len pa lta bu yod pa'i grong stong/ sus kyang ting nge 'dzin ma byas pa rnams na/ sten
pa'i bka' nan gyis bsgrub pa rnams dang/ gzhan yang gang dag/ g.yag gi rmig pas rdo bcag yod cing sprin glings ldan gyur la// mtha' mar sa ral dang thang shing skyes la chu bsal
ma khebs 'bab yod cing// bsam gtagazhan pa'i glos na ba ba bab bsatshes gos lci zhing zag gyur kyang// gas ra dag gi ldeng na 'gro ba shing ga drung du bzhugs par dgyes pa dang/
nang na chu srin 'khrugs te g.yos pas rnams kun 'khyer zhing// skom pas nyam chung gyur pa'i sprin btud kha yis chu 'thung la// gshong du 'khyil bor sprul dbugs phyung bas dnga'
rlabs rgyun 'a chad pa 'o// rgya mtshol yang mtshan mo brtan ba gang dag 'chag mdzad pa// snod gyur bdag nyid thugs ldan gtsang ma'i lhung bzed phyag bsnams shing// bsod nams ldan pa'i
skulus na bza' chos gos rab g.yo ba// de dag sang ga bdugs ni gnam gyi gung du phyin pan// gaN+Di brdungs pa'i sgra snyan skad gsang grags pa'i tshe// bstan bcos sna tshogs kyi de kho na
goms pa ba chu blugs pas ma shes pa'i sems kyi dri ma bkrus pa'i khams pa'i tshogs 'dus pa/ nyim shin tumang po dang nas 'dris pa'i srid pa'i spres pa bcad pa/ bde bar gsheg
pa'i gsung rab rin pochab sgrom du gyur pa dge ba'i chos bdud rtsi'i btung ba'i kazhi bro yoshes kyi gser ma rtogs ba/ bdar ba'i brdar rdo sngon por gyur ba/ legs par spyang pa stong
