ldan pa'i che bdun dang bcas pa'o// kha zasan til dang/ me tog dang/ rgya sran smug pa za'o/ lha ni dbang po dang lha'i// rus nimtshan me zhes bya ba'i rgyud do// kyi bad+ma'i snying
po can/ rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni/ lho phyogs kyi skor gtogs so// rgyu skar lho mtshams ni skar ma bzhi ste/ glang po che'i mgo dang snalta bu 'o/ zas ni chang dang/ sngon tshung dang/
sbrang rtsi'o/ lhan mgo rus rigs pa brgyad 'gro'o// rgyu skar snonan skar ma gsum mo// dbyibs ni them skas lta bu 'o// yud tsam bco lnga dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o//
kha zas ni 'bras sa lu dang/ mar dang/ 'bras thug go/ lhan debang po'o// rus ni legs byed kyi rgyud do// rgyu skar snyibs ni skor ma dgu ste// dpas na skar ma gsum dang ldan ng ba'i
dgas kyi rgyal po rmad du byung ba'i ril pa lta bu 'o// yud tsam na sum cu dang ldan pa 'che bdun dang bcas pa'o// kha zas ni'i ma dang/ nags kyi rtsa dad sdong bu dang/ 'bras bu za'i//
lha na sdom pa can no// dusan ke t+yA yo nub rgyud do// rgyu skar chu stodonaskar ma bsti/ dbyibs na mchod ba lta bu 'o/ yud tsam sum cu dang ldan pa'i che bdun dang bcas pa can gyi
rgyud do// rgyu skar chu smad na skar ma bzhi ste dbyibs ni gom pa yon po lta bu 'o/ yud tsaman bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa go/ kha zas ni sbrang rtsi dang 'os
seDa lhan thams cad ces khya'o/ rusan sog gu zhes bya ba bskyed do// rgyu skar bye bzhin na skar ma gsum ste/ dbyibs ni gleng mgo lta bu// yud tsam drug dang ldan pa de
las Da ud tsam gcige la thog mar las byed do// kha zasarlung zi'o/ lhan tshadas pa'o/ rus na gso ba can gyi rgyud do// rgyu skar gre bzhinan skar ma gsum ste// dbyibs
na rje lta bu 'o// yud tsam ni sum cu dang ldan pa dang cha bdun dang bcas pa/ kha zas ni mer bsrubs ma thag pa dang dushi za'o/ lhan khyab 'jug go/ rus namo'u 'gal gyi
bu'i rgyud do// kye ba'i snying bo can/ rgyu skar bdun po 'di deg ni/ nub sgor gtogs so// rgyu skar mon gre ni skar ma bzhi ste/ dbyibs ni bya lta bu 'o//
yud tsaman sum cu dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o/ kha zas na byi la'angesha la reg par byed pa dang/ rgya sran smug po za'o// lha minor lhago// rus na gnas pa zhes bya ba'irgyud do//
rgyu skar mon thun skar ma gnyis te/ dbyabasan skor ma gcig dang 'brel ba'i me tog ga phung po 'dra'o// lud tsamo bco lnga dang ldan pa'i bdun dang bcas pago/ kha zas ni'i sha za'o lha
ni chu lha'o// dus na skar ma 'bu rgyud do// rgyu skar khrums stodan skyer ma gnyis te/ dbyibs ni shing rta 'dra'o// yud tsam na sum cu dang ldan pa'i cha bdun dang bcas pa'o// kha zas
lug ga sha dang khrag go/ lhan 'ong gi 'ba' zhig 'tsho zhes bya'o// rusan skye bo'i las kyi rgyud do// rgyun ra khrums smad na skyer ma gnyis te/ dbyibs khri 'dra'o// lud tsam bzhi
bcu rtsa lnga dang ldan pa'i che bdun dang bcas pa'o// kha zas ni de la sran no/ lha ne'i rgyal gyi rgyud do// rgyu skar ma khrun skar ma sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ dbyibs na skoram gcig
dang ldan pas gru lta bu 'o// yud tsam nasen cu dang ldan pa'i nyin bdun dang bcas pa 'odo/de'i sa ni desha dang phye'o/ lhan nyi mgo rus ni skyid pa'i buzhes bya ba'i skyed do//
00 rgyu skar tha skar na skyer ma gsum ste/ dbyibs ni rta mgo lta bu 'o// yud tsag ni sum cu dang ldan pa'i che bdun dang bcas pa'o// kha zas na sbrang rtsi dang sha'o// lha ni dri za'o// rus ni rta/
'jig gi rgyud do// rgyu skar bra nye na skyer ma gsum ste/ dbyibs ni mi mtshan lta bu 'o// yud tsan ni sum cu dang ldan no// kha zas ni til dang 'bras so/ d+hAlhani gshin rje'o// rus ni bka'i
rgyud do/dkyipad+ma'i snying po can/ rgyu skar bdun 'di rnams ni/ byang gi sgor gtogs so/ le'u ste bcu drug pa'o/// nam mkha' las 'byung ba brtags
po'i le'u las 'byung ba gshanirjeding/ chu lha dang/ dbang po dang/ lus can la sa dbyug pa lta bu sha shor po mtshan mo 'am/ nam phyed kyi dus na yud tsam mam/ yud tsam gsum
gyi bar du nam mkha' las phal cher rab tu snang ba yal ga mang po rgya chen grang po shin tu ring ba shin tu 'phros pa 'byung na/ zla ba gcig gis de'i yul 'khor du 'grub pa dang/ lo
dang mi'i dbad bo dang/ char pa la gnod pa byed do// le'u bcu bdun pa'o//// kalcang ston dang/ rtsub po dang/ bar chad pa dang/ ljang ser dang/ 'od
('tsher ba dang/ dud pa lta bu dang/ sbrul 'dra ba dang/ dbyug pa 'dra ba brgyad snang na char pa mi 'bab pa dang/ lo zaso dang/ bkres pa dang/ srog chags la sogs pa la pa
'jigs par 'gyur ro// shing ta la phyed tsam snang ba 'am/ shing la gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi 'am/ lnga tsam gyi dbyibs ltar snang na/ yang
na 'phral du smin no// yang zla ba bcu gnyis sam/ zla ba brgyad brgyad la las dang/ ma'i dbang po dang/ chu bsags pa dang/ 'chi ba dang/ 'thab mo'i yul dang/
nor stor ba'i rnam par smin pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'ang mod la char bab na gnod par ma 'gyur ro// 'bras bu rnam par sman pa bstan pa ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du/ shar
ga phyogs sam/ nub phyogs su dbyug pa lta bu snang na/ rgyal po gzhan dang/ bram ze 'chi bar byed do/ byang phyogs dang lho phyogs nas dbyug pa lta bu snang na/ de'i
'khor kyi mi la gnod pa dang/ mi'i 'jigs par 'gyur te// shing ridis thad kar byung ba'am/ chu rlabs mang po ltar snang ba 'am/ mig mangs ris lta bu'i dbyug pa
'dug na/ rkun po'i dpung skye ba dang/ yul 'khor don cing ma rogs bam 'byung de// rtsub bo dang/ dum bu dang/ 'jam ma yin pa dang/ glog skar ma da' dang/ gnam
lcags dang/ skar mamajug rongs dang/ mas 'gag pa ltar snang ba la/ thogo gam skar mda' 'dres na mi'i debang po dang/ yul 'khor du 'jigs par byed d/ leg
tsa ]bar gyur pa'i tshes grangs dang/ byed pa'i yud tsam// 'byung po'i de byug pa ltar snang ba' gnod par ma byed de/ rgyal po'i sride che pa dad/ char 'bab pa dang/ yul phanang ra/
'gyur ro// shar phyogs dang/ byang phyogs na dbyug par snangan/ de'i phyogs nas dbyug pa la gnad do// phyogs 'tshams nas dbyug pa ltar snangan/ bud med dang/ baglang sbrum ma
rnams 'jige ge/ kyog kyog dad/ mamanyam pa la sogs pa rgyal mtshan dkar po ltar gyin du byung na/ rgyal pa dang/ yul 'kher 'jig pa dang/ skran nad dang 'chi bar byed de//
nyin mtshan kun tu dbyug pa rtse mo 'gyed pa ltar snang na/ yul gyi rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dbyug pa lta burtse mo can du snangan/ yul thams cad kyi rgyal po 'chi ba dang/ de'i yul
'jig par 'gyur ro// gal te na mtshan rgyun mi 'chad bar rtag tu dbyug pa lta bu snangan/ yul 'khor de 'jig pa dang/ de'i yul phyogs su nad dang/ me dang/ char ma 'bab bo//
le'u bco brgyad do///skar mda' bshad pa'i li'ul/ skar mda'i 'dra ba dang/ gdugs dang/ shing ga yal ga 'dra ba dang/ rtsa khrud bo dang/ dbyug
ba 'dra ba dang/ 'khor la lta bu'i skar mda' snang na/ bram ze dang/ rgyal po rigs gtso bo dam pa dang/ rgyal po'i btsunamo dang/ nadam dang/ lul 'khor gyi mi dang/
mi'i dbang po dang/ bla mar bya ba dang/ blon po 'ben 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la skar mda'i snang ba las gyur na/ char mi 'bab po// skar mda'i dus gnyis su
byung ngam/ skar mda' phar phyir log na/ gnam gar song ba'i gnas der gnod par 'gyur ro// skar mda' dkar po la dbyibs legs par snang ba ni/ bsngags pa bya ba yin no//
chu'i nang gi srog chags gya gyur 'gro ba dang/ mtshon shag ti dang/ skar mde'u dang/ rta lta bu dad/ bya la lta bu dang/ sgra dang bcas ba phal cher snangan/ nyes pa mang po 'byung ngo//
gyur skar mda' 'bar ba bzhin du song ba las phyir log pa dang/ skar mda' gzhan gyi phog ste zhigen yu la de'i rgyal bo la gnad pa'i regraskyed do// nad par ram/ nub mo 'au0f00/
bo de'i mtshams su skar mda' rtsab mo yon po snang na/ rab tu bsngags pa yin no/ skar mda' gnam gyi dbus su song la/ sprin gyi chu 'thung ba ltar zhugs shade/ skar mda'i sgra
@#med la/ skar mda'i dbus kyi mtshams yod par snang ba 'jam zhinge drangal shin tu yangs shing dkar ba/ logs g.yas g.yon du'anganam ma kha'o la rnam par rgyu ba snang na/ skar
mda' de dag ni dge ba ste/ 'bras bu dam pa rab tu sbyin par byed do// skar mda'i kha yod pa zhig snang na/ rgyal po la gnodapa dang/ btsun mo la gnod par 'gyur ro// skar
00 mda' rgyab kyis bong la/ dud pas chogab lta bu sgra gcan du byungan/ yul de'i 'khor ma rungs par 'gyur ro// srid la skar mda' 'byung ba ni bkra shis so// skar mda' ri bong gi khrag
ltar snang ba 'bar ba lcangan/ rgyal bo dang dmag dpon la gnod do// skaramada'amtshan mo zla ba la phog gam/ nyin par nyi ma la bogon/ ma'i bdag bo zla ba 'am/ skar mda' la
mes par byed pa de 'tsho ba'o// skar mda' rab tu 'bar bas gza' 'am/ rgyu skar la mngon par phog na/ de la mos pa rnams la ma rungs par 'gyur ro// nyin par skar mda'
me'i bod lta bu lhung na/ yul 'khor gyi dbang po dang/ yul du bcas ta rnam par 'a jig go/ yul gyi sa gang du skar mda' sgra grag par ltungan/ yul der rgyal po dang/ blon po
dang rkun po'i drag shul snang bar 'gyur ro// skar mda'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//3nam mkha' las sgra 'byung ba'i ltas kyi mtshan ma bstan pa/ rlung
gnyis phan tshun nas phrad pa las/ gnam grub pa de lta bu'i sgo byung ste/ de'ang sa la babs pa dang/ rkyen du 'byung ba dang/ thad du dang/ rgyadang po khong du chud par bya'o//
nyi ma rtsel sgra byungan/ rgyal rags la gnod do// snga dro sgra byungon dmangs la gnod do// nyi ma phyed kyi tshe sgra byung na/ bram ze'i rtogs la gnod do// nyi ma nub pa'i tshe sgra byung na/
rje'u rigs kyi tshogs la gnod do// nyi ma nub ka'i dus su sgra byung na/ rigs ngan rnams la gnod de// nam gyi gzhi thun gyi tho rangs sgra byung na/ la la gnod
doDa Damtshan gyi gung sgrakhyung na/ srin po mang po phung bar byed par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' phan tshunan sgra byung na/ glang po che dang rta ma rung bar byed do// nam nangs nas sgra
byungan/ 'gron bo mad po la gnod de// sgra byung ba sgyu nga la dal na gnod pa chung ngur 'gyur ro// sgra ring du byung na 'jigs pa 'byung ngo// dus gsum gang yang rung ba'i mtshams su
sgrochen po khyang phyogs logs su lhung na/ bram ze dam bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rgyu skar gyi tshogs gong gi nyi ma la sgra byungan/ de la rten pa'i bram ze gang yin pa la gnod do//
bden bral gyi phyogs nas sgra byung na/ drag shul gyi las byed pa la gnod do// rlung gi phyogs na sgra byung na/ mtha' khob kyi lho bal la gnod do// me'i phyogs na sgra byung na/ mes
tsho ba la gnod do// phyogos rang du sgra 'byin ba der dpa' bo rnams dang/ sbrul bo chol gnod de// sgra ltas kyi le'u ste tishu pa'o/// nyi ma dang zla ba 'bum
pa'i ltas kyi bye brag bstan pa// nyi ma 'am/ zla ba'i 'od dang/ rlung gcig tu 'dres pa las byung ba na 'od 'khyams bzhes bya'o// de la mar dang/ til mar dang/ chu dang//
dadul dad/ 'o ma dad/ thab lta bu'i kha dog tu 'khrims nachar 'bab bo// bong bu dang/ rdzamo dang/ shing rta lta bu'i 'od 'khyims pa las rab tu zhig to rnam par gyes shing kha
dogo dan bas snang na/ ma dge bar 'gyur ro// nyim dang zla ba gnyis ka'i nyin mtshan 'da'akhyims par rtag tu gron bcing ba dang/ mtshon dad/ nad 'byung ngo// me 'bar ba
bzhin du 'khyams na chu mngon par skye'o// 'ja' 'dra ba'i dbyibs su 'khyimesan/ mtshon mang po'abyung ngo// rdul 'dra bar 'khyims namu ge 'byung ngo// sum ral du 'khyin
naDa grod dang rgyal po lam dge'o// skyegs kyi khu ba dang/ zho'i mdog 'dra bar 'khyams na/ 'ograb mo dang g.yul 'byung ngo// ser por 'khyams na/ yul 'khor
gsum 'jiges bar ston/ skya bo dang ljang sngon du 'khrims na/ sbrum ma'achi'o// nor bu 'dra ba'i phyed dang gsum chab dum bu gcig 'khumasan/ char pa 'phral du 'babago/
mtshan dus gsum du 'khyamesan/ nyin gsum gyi bar du'ajam zhing snum par 'khyibs na char pa 'bab ba/ rtsub por 'khyamasan/ zla ba gcige na 'jage pa 'byung bar ston to//
skar ma dang gza'i thog tu 'khyims pas non na/ rang gi mthu las 'byung ba'i 'bras bur bstan par bya'o// nyi zla 'khyims pa'i le'uste nyi shu gcig go//
[z/ ]@#// 'ja' zug ba'i ltasakyi mtshan ma bstan to// rlung dang/ srin dang/ nyi ma'i 'od las byung ba ni'aja' zhes bya'o// 'ja'i tshon sna tshogs su snang na char 'bab bo//
chu'i nang du zugan char rab tu che'o// tshon dkar po la sogs pa ni bram zal sogs pa la gnod do// ser skya dade/ me'amadog dad me tog rma zang zing rtsa ser ba lta bu'i 'ja' zug
na yul du 'jigs pa 'byung ngo// 'ja' sngon por zug na lo ma rung bar 'gyur ro// 'ja'i dbus nyi rtse zhige chugs na mkhad par 'gyur ro// mtshan ma shar phyogs su 'ja' zug na
rgyal po lo gnod do// nub phyogs su mtshan mo'i 'thuganama'i gtso be la gnod do// char 'bab pa'i tshe 'ja' zug na char 'chad do// char ma 'o bab pa'i tshe 'ja' zugag na
char 'bab bo// shar phyogs su 'ja' zug na mar 'bab// lce phyogs la sogs pa phyogs gsum du 'ja' zug na bram ze la sogs pa la mchod pa 'ong ngo// de bzhin du lce
phyogs nas/ nub phyogs su 'ja' zugan rgyal rigs dang/ rje rigs dang/ dmangs rigs la gnod do// dus gsum gyi mtshams su 'ja' zugan yul 'jog par byedo//
nyi ma'i rtse la lho phyogs su 'ja' zugan ma la 'jigs pa 'ong ngo// mtshams su 'ja' zug na bud med ma rung bar 'gyur ro// lan gnyis su 'ja' zugan bde ba 'phel ba dang
la legs par 'gyur ro// tshes grangs bzang bo dang/ rgyu skar bzang po dang/ yud tsam dang/ phyed pa dang/ gatha'i bzang bo dang/ khyim pa dang/ skabs bzad pa'i tshe 'ja'
zug na dge ba ste/ rgyal po'i srid skye/ rkun po'i sa 'gong bar 'ong ngo// de bzhin du nya 'dra ba dang/ dbyug pa 'dra ba dang/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dad/ phyogs tshag pa dang bcas
bar snad ba'od tshul gong ma dung 'dra bar tshes grangs dad/ rgyu skar dar/ gzab la sogs pa bzang ngan gyi tshul gong ma dang 'dra bar gdon mi za bar rtogs pa'i nI sa par bya'o//
da lta bur snang bar gyur pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshunachad du char ba bab na zhi ba yin/ legs par 'gyur ro/ 'ja' ltas kyi le'u ste tishu gnyis pa'o//
sa g.yos pa'i ltas kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa/ de la chos ma yin pa'i mthu las byung ba'i dus su skar ma drag shul can dang/ yud tsam dang/ thad cig drang/ tshes grangs ma bzang
ba'i tshos g.yos na/ skye bo thams cad kyi zhag lnga bcu rtsaldan 'byung ngo// dgun zla tha chung la sa ga sa na/ 'bras bu zhag brgyad na 'byung ngo// dpyade zla ra ba la sa g.yos pa'i
'bras bu ni/ zhag lnga bcun 'byung ngo// dpyid zla 'bring po la saM g.yos na/ zhag lnga bcu rtsa gsum na 'bras bu 'byung bar skar mkhan gyis shes par bya'o// de ltar sa g.yos
[091 {]pa'i 'bras bu ni de ltar bstan pa yin no// de ltar zla ba'i de ra ri zhange sa g.yo ba'i dmags kyang yar gyi tshes gcig dang/ mar gyi tshes bcu drug dang/ mar gyi tshes
nyishu rtsa gsum dag dad/ yar gyi tshes bcu bzhi dang/ bco lnga dang/ taishu dgu dang/ sum cu ste/ dus tshigs 'di rnams lta bu'i dus su sa g.yos pa'i 'bras bu ni tshul de ltar
blta'o// sa g.yos pa'i ltas kyi le'u ste shu gsum pa'o// nam zla ba bcu gnyis kyi de kun la sa rtag par g.yos te/ shing yad 'gul/ chu'ang g.yos te
mer mer byed cing/ de ltar dus tshags dang/ sa tshigs ma yin par g.yos te/ rlung langs pas shing yang bcag/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong 'dab dad/ grong de na sman
zla pa'i skye ba rnams med nga ra gyur ci/ gcan gzan gyis zil gyis non nas/ yul 'brog tu gyur te/ de ltar sa g.yos pa ni gnod pa'i 'bras bu la btse ldan/ yul phyogs der yang
su'ang ma gnas par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar smin drug go ma la sa g.yos na/ phreng dad/ grong khyer la me bstad par shor to/ shing rdzu yang tshig/ gos nag po gyen pa'i sde dang/ nor bu
mkhan rnams dang/ mgar ba dang/ bram ze mi 'byed pa'i spyod pa byed pa rnams dang/ 'di rnams la ma de/ 'byung khung nas nor bu 'byung khung nas dang/ 'phel ba rnams kyang sungs
par 'gyuno/ yul de la rten pa'i bgrang shing rta 'dren pa'i mi dang/ bram ze dang/ 'dreg mkhan spu gri las byed pa dang/ yul san tuzhes bya ba'i yul phyed kyi me dang/ yul a ma pa
lta dang/ yul chu klung lta zhes bya ba na gnas pa'i mi deng/ yul sha'i ba zhes bya ba dad/ yul ba sa ti zhes bya ba dang/ yul ta she ka zhes bya ba dang/ yul srarta dad/ yul rta la rgyu na
zhes bya ba dang/ yul gangs khrod na gnas pa rnams dang/ lho phyogs kyi lung ba na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ de ltar sa g.yos pas gzabarjid nyams te/
nad drag pos 'debasaM/ ltogs par 'gyur/ than chen dang/ chom rkun dang/ pha rol gyi dgra rnams kyis gnod pa drag po byed par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar snar ma'am la sa g.yos na/
sa bon thams cad chud zos par 'a ra to/ sa la 'bru btab pa'i ng mi skye/ de dang 'dra bar rtsa yang dken/ nags khrod nas cung zad ci 'khrus pa'i ng dkon no// bud med sbrum ma rnam/
kyi num rab tu ma bde/ mu ge dang/ mtshon dang/ nad kyis zad de/ skye bo sum cha gcig gnas par 'gyur ro// ma'i dbad pa che'i bdag nyid can dang/ dpal dang ldan pa'i mi'i
mchog rnams dang/ bram ze gzi brjid can mang po dang/ ba glang phyug pa dbang dang ldan pa dang/ yul pa'i pha sha dang/ yul natu ru dang/ yul srin du dang/ yul An dang/
tu@#/ chu bo ban sto'i 'gram na gnas pa dang/ chu bo e ra ba ti'i drung na gnas pa dang/ yul ku na gnas pa'i mo ded/ chu bo tsun tAb gzhes bya ba'i 'khor na
gnas pa'i mi dang/ chu bo su tan zhes bya ba dang/ chu bo 'di deg gi 'gram na gnasaM pa'i mi dang/ yul nags 'brog chu dang ldan pa dang/ chu bo a kro dang/ se ra sa ti zhes bya
kha 'a khor dang/ yul sa pa rta pra rta zhes pa'i rnams dang/ ra mdog pa'i gtso bo dang/ 'di rnams bzhi so g.yos na gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skaramago'i rtse mo las/
g.yos na sman rnams dad/ nad dpyad byed pa'i sman pa rnams dang/ rtswa so ma zhes bya ba la skem du sbyar tu 'thungs pa'i chos bzhin byed pa rnams dang/ rtswa sa ma la skom du 'thungs
pa'i rnams dang/ bram ze nags khrod na gnas pa dka' thub byed pa rnams lami rung bar 'gyur/ yul dbus ma ga da cher char 'bebs te/ lo legs/ bad bar 'gyur/ rgyal po
nang phan tshun mi mthun te rtsod par 'gyur/ yul a b+hi shaha'i mo dang/ yul shu ran sen dang/ chu bo tshar mnA na gnas pa dang/ yul ka la'i mo dang yul bang sa'i ma dang/
yul pan tsa la'i lho phyogs dang/ yul pan tsa la'i byed phyogs dang/ yul ma g+ha d+han gnas pa' mo ded/ ma la gnod par 'gyur// yul su la'i ma deng/ yul be ga la'i mo dang
[z/ ]yul mal zhes bya ba'i 'khor ma deng/ 'di rnams la gnod pa rnam pa drug 'byung ste/ chom rkun dang/ mes 'jigs pa dang/ ma nges dang/ than chen la sogs pa'i khyad zhugs pa'i
gnod pa rnams kyis skye bo la zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar lagalos g.yosan/ shinge 'o ma can rnams dang/ 'o ma marung bar 'gyur/ zan skom phyogs sum rung bar
'gyur 'gron pa rnams dang/ gcan gzan dang/ rgya mo thogos pa'i 'chor ba la sogs pa rnams dang/ 'obs rko zhang khron pa rko ba dang/ sdig pa'i las can rkun po rnams
dang Da gdol pa dang/ rigs ngan dang/ yul shar phyogs dang/ yul bun da pa rtadang/ mu stegs gcer bu pa rnams dang/ yul o tra dang/ yul pu la no de'i mo dang/ yul sha
pa ro'i rnams dang/ nags 'brogachu dang ldan pa a ta bya so ka ta zhes bya ba dang/ tshul gzhan yang de dang 'dra ba/ chu dang ldan pa'i nags 'brog kyang gnod pa drag po ma bde ba sna tshogs
rnam pa drug gis gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar nab so'i nyi ma sa g.yos na/ chang 'tshong dang/ gsal shing dang/ mtshon thogs pa'i mo dang/ 'khur ba 'tshong ba'i mo dang/
gdugs byed pa'i m deng/ shing mkhan rnams dang mi gsod pa'i gshed ma rnams dang/ btsas dang/ 'gro ba'i tshong pa rnams dang/ 'khor lo byed pa rnams dang/ 'khor la
lha/// slob pa rnams dad/ lhang tsher thag cing sbyor ba dang/ sha tshong dang/ dung tshong dang/ grong na gnas pa'i tshong pa dang/ gang dag skye bo phal po che lhan cig gnas
tho bas tshong ba dang/ tshul can rnams dad/ char char 'bab pas la la'ang gnod par 'gyur/ rgyal bo dang/ lho ka'i gnas na gnas pa'i rgyal phran rnams dang/ rgyal phranade dag la phyogs
ba'i yul mi rnams dang/ yul gyi mchog dang/ to ka zhes bya ba dang/ mon yul kam ru na gnas pa'i mo de rnams dang/ spyang kikyi med pa rnams la sa g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro//
rgyu skar rgyal gyi nyi ma las g.yosan/ ma dege ba byas pa dang/ bram ze dam pa dang/ rgyal po spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams dang/ rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu dang/ dbon sna 'phra ma me dang/
mi mang po'i tshogs dang/ bon po rnams dang/ dge slong rnams dang/ sprang po dang/ bram ze dang/ mkhas pa rnams dang/ chos la rab tu brtson pa rnams dang bsod nams chen po
khyad pa'i mi rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro// de ltar shar phyogs dang/ lul tam li ta'i grong rdal dang/ shar phyogs kyi gling bu mar ti pa dang/ mon yul ka ma ru pa dang/ shar phyog
kyi rgya mtsho'i glingen gnas pa nas gling pa dang/ gser gyi globen gnas pa dang/ chu bo g+hApa'i rgya mtsho'i geting du 'bab pa dang/ 'gram na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro//
tsha rgyu skar skag ga te me la sa g.yos na/ ku rnams dang/ sbrul rnams dang/ sdig sprul rnams dang/ grogs rnams dang/ grol ma mang bo rnams srin bu sna tshogs dang/ e dang rnage ba gcig brnag
dang = dug rnams dang/ dug sbyor shed byed pa'i ma rnams dang sems can gang dag ra khrod na gnas pa rnams dang/ yul mtha' 'khob na rku 'phrog byed cing 'joms pa'i mi rnams dang/
zol ba dang/ rku thabs kyis 'thob mo 'byed pa'i mi rnams dang/ sdig pa'i las la dga' ba'i mi rnams dang/ ma blun po rnams dang/ mden pa dang/ tshig ngan pa smra ba rnams dang/
yul to sa la dang/ yul ko la dang/ grong khyer kun tsi dang/ yul lang ka dang/ yul an dra dang// yul an dra'i byed phyogs dang/ yul yama'i grong rdal nyams dga' ba dang/ rin d+hu dang/
sbyin 'i byang phyogs kyi ngos dang/ ri de'i byed dang/ rtse mo dang/ srung sa nu gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la gnod pa drag po nad dang/ me dang/ mi ngas dang/ than chon dang/ ser ba dang/ yang
dung yang mtshon dkar 'gyed pas yul de phyogs na mya ngan byed cing 'gro ste/ sa g.yos pas gzi brjid nyams nas gnod pa de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar mchub nyamel sa g.yos na/
rgyal po chen po mya ngan byed par 'gyur/ mchod sbyin byed pa dang/ dad pa'i rnams rtogs par 'gyur/ mamang po 'du ba dang/ dga' ston byed pa dang/ lha'i gtso bo la mchod sbyin byed
pa rnams dang/ sngags thams cad na ldog par 'gyur ro// gang dag btsas pa dang/ cher skyes pa dang/ gzhan yang mkhas pa'i mchog dang/ rol mo mkhan
mkhas pas glu snyan pa dang/ rigs chen po blo dang ldan pa'i mi rnams dang/ 'bru nag po til dang/ zar ma sranam la sogs pa la gnod/ yul ka lang ka'i phyed dang/ ka ling ka'i
nub phyogs dang/ yul an 'a ra la rten pa'i mo rnams dang/ rib+hun d+ha'i des phyad la rton pa mi rnams la sa g.yos pa dang/ sa rnam par g.yos na de dag la yang gnod pa 'byung
bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar gre'i nyi ma las g.yos na/ dus tshigs lug par 'gyur te/ de'i rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ bstun par byas pa ma rung bar 'gyur/ yod pa'i ng ma rung
bar 'gyur/ smad 'tshong ma dang/ chos la dga' ba dang/ g.yos mkhan dang/ sho gam gyis 'tsho ba dang/ btson 'tshob dang/ snam bu 'thug pa dang/ khyad par du chu bo sin
chu'i lho phyogs kyi phyed dang/ shar phyogs kyi phyed dang/ yul ma nyaka ra ri khrod kyi sdong bu dang/ yul dang/ lung pa'i nang na gnas pa'i skye ba dang/ ri kos kon pa'i grong khyer dang
grong rdal dang/ de bzhin du yul shur pa ra kar dang/ yul tsha sar chab nags ri chu mang ba na gnas pa'i ba glang la sogs pa dang/ skye bo bsrun pa mad pos bskor cing/ me tog
[rs/ ]rgyas par ldan zhing gnas pa la sa g.yos te/ mdangs nyams na gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar dbang nyi ma la sa g.yos na/ tshod pa rnams dang/ gling phranan gnas
pa'i mo dang/ 'gron po lam du zhugs pa dang/ mchod sbyin gyi snod dang/ yo byad rnams dang/ sbrul gyi gdong gis 'tsho ba'i ma rnams dang/ bag ma lam bcug pa sogs dad/
bkra shis byed pa dang/ yul ma ha se nA'i grong rdal dang/ grong khyer nyams dga' ba ba glang gi khyu mang pi dang ldan pa dang/ chu bo ga da ba'i 'gram gyi yul dang/ yul na b+haban na dang/
chu bo mahA sar tu'i 'gram na gnas pa'i grong rdal dang/ grong 'dab kyi mo dang/ yul dbus ang ga dang/ mon yul bang ga dang/ yul ka ling ka'i phyed dad/ sul ni kri ti dang/
yul kha shu'i mi rnams dang/ mas bud med mang po bsrel ba dang/ sange las sems pa'i mi rnams dang/ grong dang grong dam pa'i mi rnams dang/ rgyal po la brtan pas 'tsho ba'i mi
de lta bu la sa ga pos na gnod par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar me bzhi las g.yosu na/ rdza mkhan dang/ sman pa'i rnams dang/ tshogs kyi gtso bo dang/ blon po dang/ blon po chen po dang
dmag dpon rnams dang/ glang po 'dul sbyod byed pa'i mi dang/ chom rkun byed pa mang po dang/ chom rkun byed pa'i gtso bo ni khrid sa btsan la rten pa'i mo rnams dang/ bram ze srad bu/
se ral du thogs pas 'tsho ba rnams dang/ lha don du gnyan gnyer ba rnams la spyod pa'i mo rnams dang/ bram ze'i lag brda'i kha ton 'don pa dang/ chos sbyin
gyis yo byad kyi tshogs sbyor ba dang/ yul ha pa na'i grong rjel nyams dga' ba dang/ ri rma bya zhes bya ba'i drungan gnas pa dang/ de par la tA'i drung na gnas pa dang/ stongs dang/
lung pa dang/ lung pa phun mang po snatshogs gnas pa'i mi rnams dang/ yul pang ku ra dang/ yul sa grogs dang/ yul amu tra dang/ 'di rnams las g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro
rtswa rgyu skar nag pa la sa g.yos na/ ri mo 'dra ba'i las rnams ma rung bar 'gyur/ ra me khro bo rnams dang/ shing mkhan rnams dang/ bzo ba dang/ gser mgar ba dang/ rdo rjes
bsor ba'i las byed pa dang/ bzang kan dang/ nor bu 'bug cing nor bu 'dogs pa dang/ rgyan la dga' ba dang/ tshod pa dang/ mig sman sbyor shes pa'i mi dang/ rgyan byed pa'i
uts+tshi ma dang/ yul lwa ba ka sha dang/ yul an le'i grong rdal dang/ yulam gyi sa dang/ yulaa pan teding/ ri sa bya'i drung dang/ ri khyon 'da'i 'khor na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dang/
mi dram rnams la de ltar sa g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar sa ril sa g.yos na/ chom rkun byed pa'i mo rnams dngo/ mgar mkhana rnams dang/ 'tshe zhing gnod pa'i mi
[na ] rnams dang/ la 'phrang 'joms pa'i mo rnams dad/ yul gangs ri'i byang phyogs kyi shed na gnas pa'i mo rnams dad/ rol mo mkhan dang/ bzhad gad mkhan dang/ dka' thub can/
zas su rlung za ba dang/ tshul ma yin pa'i deka' thub grub pa'i mi rnams dang/ mi dge ba dam pa'i rnams dang/ nga rgyal can rnams dang/ yul sa hata' mo deng/ yul an dar
sta'i mi dang/ yul ba de la dang/ yul ka tsa'i skye bo mang po phal po che dang/ yul ba ya bdang/ yul shud kra ka dang/ yul da ra ga zhes bya ba grong dang/ phal ched pa'i mi dad/
gling sna tshogs na bud med dam pa gnas pa dang/ rkang 'gros kyis gang bar rgyas shang/ grong khyer ku be ra zhes bya ba la 'byor cing rgyas par gnas pa dang/ ri dam pa bra dza ya ho zhes bya ba'i
drung na gnas pa'i me dang/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas pa 'a ma deng/ yul bye sna dang yul an drag dang/ ma du zhes bya ba'i mi dang/ sa twa ta zhes bya ba'i mo dang/ 'di dag gi gnas
rnams dang/ mi'i sde d+hu Tarna ba zhes bya ba rgya mtsho mchu'i grong khyer rnam pa brgyad dang/ grong khyer rnam pa steng sed du gnas pa de dag la sa g.yos na/ rab tu gnod par 'gyur ro//
rgyu skar sa ga la sa g.yos na/ me sa las su bya ba rnams ma rung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze dam pa me la rjod pa rnams dang/ gsal bam 'khrul ba sna rnams dang/ til dang/
thu@#// bal gyi sa bon dang/ monasran sde'u dang/ bu ram shing gi khu ba dang/ 'bru rnams dang/ mi rgod po rnams dang/ mi phal po cher gas pa rnams dang/ 'brasaso
ba dang/ sa bon btab pa sman las sran chung dang/ sran ma dang/ sran ma tsan sha ka dang/ rgya sran nag po dang/ yungs kar dang/ yul tu ra'i ma dang/ yul mang ku ra'i mi dang/
yul ba ya na dang/ de bzhin du yul ra ma ka'i mi dang/ yul kha par n ma mang pos gang ba dung/ yul ka ma ra a don+ti ta zhes bya ba na gnas pa'i mi de dag la sa g.yos na/ gnod pa 'byung
bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar lha mtshams la sa g.yos na/ mdza' bo byams shing stag par byed byed par 'gyur/ chu dang nor gyi bya ba la sogs pa rnam pa bcu gcig tu bshad pa gnyen bya zhing/
bgam blong ba la sogs pa dang/ yo byad bsags shing spel ba dang/ bgam blong ba'i rnams dang/ mchod sbyin bya ba rnams dang/ de dag gi las bya ba dang/ bkra shis par bya ba rnams
rgyudang ltas su blta pa rnams dang/ bram ze zhi ba dang ldan pa rnams dang/ dka' thub can rnams dang/ thub pa dang ldan pa rnams dang/ dka' thub pa dang ldan pa rnams dang/ brtul
zhugs dang ldan pa rnams dang/ yul ka shA zhes bya ba dang/ rgyal sride chen po rnam pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa'i yul dang/ rgyal po'i mtha' 'khor yug gnas pa/ 'bra go'i tshal nya/
00 dga' ba'i gnas na/ khragos 'tsho ba rnams dang/ skad rnam pa sna tshogs shes pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams dad/ ga bde mi mngon par byed pa'i gzugs dang/ gos dang/
rgyan dang/ spyod pa dang/ byed pa dang/ 'grob dang/ chu byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zas su sha za zhing/ lus nyams bde ba skyed pa// de lta bu'i mo rnams la sa gdes na//
rab tu gnod par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar snon la sa g.yos na/ rachen po snyale bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa'i rlung rab tu sdang yul as kazhes bya ba'i yul du yul ku shaka' ma'i dang
rkun po tshul ma yin pa dag gis phan tshun du gnod pa byed par gnas pa rnams dang/ yi dgas sha za ba rnams dang/ sems can gang dag ril gnas pa rnams dang/ mu ge myur du 'byung//
sa la chu'adi myur du skams par 'gyur ro// dgra rnams radrung du song nas/ den dga' bar gnas/ chos kyi yo byad rnams dang/ gang na nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa dang/ dgun na
dang rdzabu ram shing gi khu ba dang/ 'bras bu dngar pa cung zad yod pa rnams dang/ shing du ka'i tshel dang/ me tog sna tshogs rnams dang/ 'bru dang/ sa bon rnams dang/ 'bras
la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang/ la gyi las kun brtsam pa dang/ brtan par bya bab rnams dang/ rtsa ba bskyed cing bsun pa'i las snatshogs dang/ ro langs byed pa'i
las 'gyur mgayon can dad/ rgyan po dga' ba'i mi dang/ de bzhin du sgo lcags 'byed cade rku ba'am rnams dang/ yul an 'dra'i mi rnams dang/ yul du
da na gnas pa'i ma rnams 'jig par 'gyur/ mdza' ba'i dpung dang ldan pa'i rnams dang yang phyed par 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po dang/ snyems dang ldan pa rnams dang/ tshar chod pa dag
bya rog dang/ ro dibs bri sha dad (gcan gzan dang/ gcan gzan drag shul can chen po rnams dang/ yul ka ra dang/ yul pa ra dang/ yul shud d+ha se na gnas pa'i mi deng/ yul ma la la'i
ma rnams dang/ tho kar yug bag le dang/ par sig gi yul dang/ za hor gyi yul dang/ ga bu sha'i yul gyi re ba ringeshes na'i 'khor na gnas ba'i mi dang/ 'di rnams la sa g.yos
na dgra drag po myur du 'byung zhing gnod par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar snabs la sa g.yos na/ rkang bzhi pa dang/ rkang gnyis pa dang/ de bzhin du phug na gnas pa rnams dang/ 5 degs
sha za rnams dang/ sems can gang dag ril gnas pa'i rnams dod/ mu ge myur du 'byung/ sa la chu'ang myur du skams par 'gyur ro// dgra rnams ra drung du song nas/ de na dga'
bar gnas/ chos kyi yo byad rnams dang/ gang nags tshal phun sum tshogs po dang/ dgunar dang/ bu ram shing gi khu ba dang/ 'bras bu dngar pa cung zad yod pa rnams dad/ shing
du ka'i tshig dang/ me tog sna tshogs rnams dang/ 'bru dang/ sa bon rnams dang/ 'bras la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad sna tshogs dang/ khyim gyi las kun brtsam pa dang/ brtan par bya/
ba rnams dang/ rtsa ba bskyed tsang bskrun pa'i res sna tshogs dang/ ro langs byed pa'i las rnams dang/ yul sun dang/ gog yul dang/ yul kata ya 'a mo deng/ ba glang mi la sogs
ba'i ri'i rtse mo dang/ phug dang/ sde khun gnas pa'i mo rnams dang/ rkang bzhi pa sna tshogs dang/ dka' thubatsan shing thog dad/ rtsa bza ba rnams dang/ yul katsharesha'i byang phyogs kyi
gnas yul sa btsan po la rten pa'i mo rnams la sa g.yos na/ gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar chu stod la sa g.yos na/ ma las skyes dang/ 'gron po 'am na gnas pa
dang/ tshong pa dang/ rgya mtsho la rgyu zhinge 'gro ba dang/ kha zas nyas 'tsho ba dang/ chu srin byis pa gsod dang/ 'ug pa dang/ chu srin nag rti dang/ chu srin ma kar dang/ rus sbal
dang/ nus dang/ rigs dang/ phyug po dang/ mkhas pa rnams dang/ zhon bab mchog bdog pa de dag la 'jigs pa chen po rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ chu'i las su bya ba
rje de bskyal ba dang/ rdzing bu brko ba dang/ tshal bu dang/ skyed mos tshul sna tshogs dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ chang gi yo byad sbyor 'tsho ba'i mi rnams dang/ yul taru na dang/
yul ru ga ka tis re'i mi rnams dad/ yul gam bu dzanas skyes pa'i mo rnams dang/ blo gar gyi yul dang/ yul shu nas skyes kyi mo rnams dang/ yul shA sa'i me
dang phyugs rdzi rnams dang/ yul ka nanas skyes ba'i mi rnams dang/ rigs nyams pa'i mi deng/ skye gnas ngan pa nas skyes pa'i ma deng/ bya gag dang/ bud med dang/ chu bo che
pa/ po pag shi 'gram na gnas pa'i rnams dang/ gangs ri'i ro logs kyi ngos gnyis ka na gnas ba'amo dang/ ri ka dang rang dung na gnas pa'i me rnams dang/ ri rgyud chad pa na gnas
pa dang/ lung ba na gnas pa rnams la sa g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar chu smad la sa g.yos na/ bzo bo rnams la gnod par 'gyur tu/ lcags mgar dang/ phyag
mkhan dang/ tshon mo stang mkhan dang/ shing mkhan rnams dang/ 'dreg mkhan dang/ phyug po rnams dang/ rkun po rnams dang/ bzo bo rnams dang/ sna tshogs rnams dang/
thos zlos 'don pa'i gcam bu rnams la gnod par 'gyur/ yul gan ra'i mo rnams dang/ yul ka ka ya dang/ yul kha sha pa rnams dang/ gu zan yul dang/ yul ba gur na gnas
pa'i ri brag pa gtum po rnams pa stong nyid dang/ bru sha yul la sogs pa dang/ lul sa ga bar de'i skye bo rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar gro bzhin la sa g.yos na/ rgyal
0 bos bkur ba'i mi rnams dang/ bram ze rig byed sob ba'i mi rnams dang/ bstan bcos mkhas pa'i ma rnams dang/ snyan dngags shes pa'i mi dang/ yul ga da ra nas/ yul ke'u
rab 'i bar dang/ yul me ta ra sta na gnas pa rnams dang/ soge nas kyi tshul gnyis dang/ yul dusmras ha dang/ yu'ael rjed pa'i mo dang/ yul sag ka'am dang/ yul lam ba ka'i mi deng/ yul na ka
ra dang/ yul tsa ta bsha ya dang/ yul gartsakan gnas pa ma rung ba du ma dad/ yul la ba zhes bya ba'i rdo la gnas pa dang/ mtha'i rgyal po chen po rnams dang/ yul kaM sang ta dang/
lul sab tir dang/ yul bar re za dang/ yul bar n bu ra'i grong rtal dang/ klu'i gnas rnams dang/ 'di dag la sa g.yos na gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar mon gre la sa g.yos
na mi phyug po dang/ ra lug dang/ bong bu dang/ rnamo dang/ dre'u dang/ lo dang/ ri dgas kyi rnam grangs tha dad pa dang/ ma ha dong/ 'phong dang rtsal che ba dang/ 'dun khang
sna tshogs dang/ grong khyer gyi tshong dbon rnams dang/ yul kha ga dang/ yul sA sta man tra dang/ yul kha la dang/ yul mun dang/ yul ba tA ka ra dang/ yul gon tha mi'i mi
rnams dang/ yul bo za dang/ yul si la'i grong khyer 'brug yul dang/ gu zan dang/ yul tsadi tAdang/ chang zhim po sna tshogs dag 'a dga' ba rnams dang/ rag sha'i ra 'degs
bya @#// na gnus pa'i mi sne tshogs la sa g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar man gru la su g.yos na/ sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams dad/ rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa'i
sems can rnams dang/ sems can gzhan yang chu la rten pa'i rnams dang/ de bzhin du rta dang/ glang po che dang/ khyi rnams dang/ bong bu dang/ rngabo dang/ bya rnams dang/
de bzhin du dmag ma dpa' bo dam pa dang/ mtshon shaka ti dang/ ral gra kyi ka po dang/ ral gri thogs pa'i mi rnams dang/ yul bral lha'i me ded/ yul lho phyogs kyi rgyud kyi ring la
rtan pa dang/ lho phyogs kyi ri rgyud la drang srong thub pa gnas pa rnams dang/ yul ko lo gcig pa zhes bya ba'i me dang/ bud medanu ma ya gcig pa rnams dang/ dmag dpon du bskos pa 'di dag la
sa g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar khrums stod la sa g.yosan/ chu dang mes 'tsho ba'i me dang/ de bzhin du ba glang gsed cing ma la rna ba dang/ nor bu de sogs latshong byed pa dang/
yul su bar 'byor pa dang ldan pa dang/ lug gsod cing 'tsho ba'i mi deng/ nags kyis 'tsho ba'i rje'u riges dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ rol ma mkhan dang/ ma dam pa dad/ na rnams
dang/ yul mal la dang/ yul mal la ba dang/ sgo 'byed cing rku ba'i mo ngen pa rnams dang/ 'di deg la sa g.yosanaganod par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar khrums smad la sa g.yosan/ tshod
dang chu la rten pa rnams dang/ 'gron lam du zhugs pa rnams dang/ tshong pa rgya mtsho la gru bo che'a'agro bar nus ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' ba rnams dang/ gang gi rigs rnams
dang Da chang 'tshong gi las byed pa dang/ yul shi ba'i mo dang/ yul ba'i po ti'i mi rnams dang/ rgyal rigs a'adzun ya na'i rgyudar/ yul man du dang/ yul d+ha nus sna dang/ kha che
yul gyi ma deng/ ri khrod zab mo na gnas pa'i mo deng/ rtse rgod na gnas pa'i yul dang/ yul rnam pa du ma dang/ yul tang ga la bar nang ga la'i mi dang/ lha bu bang gi gnas me tog sna
tshogs bye bas brgyan pa/ yul ri gecan brgyad ces bya ba na/ skye bo du mas gang ba gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ mtshonacha sna tshogs dang ldan par gnas pa la sa g.yos na gnod
par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar nam gru la sa g.yos na/ 'thob mo'i ge su la drag shul cher 'byung/ grong phun sum tshog sapa dang ldan pa dang/ grong ma rnams dung/ ra khrod na gnas pa/
dang Da 'dun khang rnams dang/ yul de ta la'i mi dang/ yulaa nu sha dang/ tsa ka dang/ yul ji ba ra dang/ yul ma thadang/ yul sha ka dang/ yul ban ka na zhes bya ba na/ dpung gis
bsnyegs pa'i nga rgyal mchog dang ldan pa dang/ rlom par gnas ba gar byed cing glu len pa dang/ smad 'tshong mas 'tsho ba dang/ la shan ka dang/ yul a bder dang yul nan ti dang//
yul tsar mnan tan gnas pa'i me deng/ dmag ma rnams dang/ dmag dpon dang/ yul ma tila'i grong rdal chen po dang/ yul ni mi'i 'khor gyi grong rdal gyi mi dang/
bal yul nas shar phyogs dang/ byang phyogs kyi mtshams kyi lul 'di deg la sa pa/sa na gnod par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar tha skar la sa g.yos na/ rta rnams la gnod 'byung bar 'gyur/
grong du ma gsod pa 'byung/ mi snyunanang gsod pa 'byung/ tha skar gyi de la rum du bu chags pa la sa dga'o// tha skar gyi dus su btsos pa la ma dge ste/ de phan chad khe gsum nam bodi ba byung dam/
denas lobcu na 'chi bar 'gyur// yul la ri da dang/ yul tu gar tadad yul pan tsa la'i skye bo rnams dang/ yul a rdzu nu'i mo rnams dang/ yul da ru dang/ yul du na bya dang/ yus
sa ta ne'i mi rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar bra tu la sa g.yos na/ rkun po rnams la gnod pa cher 'gyur/ rgyal pa byed pa dang/ mdud pa dang/ sgo lcags 'byed cing rku ba dang/
me long 'tshong ba'i tshong pa dang/ dbyigs dug sbyor zhing sdud pa'i mi deng/ 'khor re byed pa dang/ btson srungs dang/ gtum po sdig can rnams dang/ rkun po rnams dang/ g.yo byed pa
rnams dang/ mi bsrun pa dang/ phra ma byed pa dang/ gdol pa dang/ rigs ngan la sogs pa'i yul gyi mtha' na gnas pa rnams dang/ rgya yul na rgyal rnamos dang/ rgya dam pa rnams dang
yul dga' ba bzang po nas bya ba rnams dad/ yul s+ya ba na gnas pa 'amo rnams dad/ chu bo chen po su zhes bya ba'i 'gram na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dang/ mtsho ma dros pa yod bzhin zhes/
bya ba'i 'jig rten rnams la grags pa de la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams dang/ rig sngags grub pa dang/ rig 'dzin gyi tshogs rnams dang/ drang srong thub pa rnams kyis kyang bsen par bya ba
shing 'dzam bu'i skye bo mang po gnas pa dang/ ke la sa te se'i gang dang/ gangs mdas te/ nor bu can gyi ra dang/ spos ngad ldang ba gangs ltar go dang/ de bzhin dusu ri par sha zhes bya ba
ngos bzang ba dang/ ri dang ris par ni zhes bya ba dang/ byang phyogs ngos dang/ glongo rnam pa sna tshogs mang bo dang/ ri ded dod dug na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang/ 'byud pa dang/ sha za
dang dri za dang/ srin po'i tshogs mang po dag dang/ grub pa dang/ rig 'dzin dang/ klu rnams dang/ de bzhin du smad rnam pa stong snyad la gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar na
sa g.yos pa'i rjes ' bzhi g bdun tshun chad du/ sa la phan pa'i sngon sde gnag 'jam po mgo bsku ba'i sman gyi mdog ra chen po 'dra ba las 'brug sgra grag laM/ glog rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyu zhing
nam mkha' la sngon po shur shur bo lta bur snang ba 'am/ sgra 'byung ba'am/ skar mda' lta bu tshad la/ rlung madreg pa ldang zhing tshub ma lta bu mi sdug pa ni med/ sprin gyi gzugs bkra/
shis kyiri mo sna tshogs dang/ dbang po' rdo rje lta bur snang ba dang nang par nyi ma 'char ba dang/ nyi ma nub nas zla ba 'char ba'i tshe/ sngon gyi mchod pa 'char ba dang
nam mkha' la sprin dal snyoms pa 'jam po'i gzugs rgyang por sod/ glog phan tshun du 'phro ba'i sgron de lta bu n dge ba'i mtshan ma yin no// sngon 'jam la dal snyoms te/ bar tshad
med cing sprin gyi gzugs ma sdug pa ma snang ba de lta bur snangan/ sngon gyi mtshan de lta bu dang ldan pa ni lha'i dbang po'i sa g.yos par bstan pa yin no// de ltar gang dang gang du sa g.yos
zla pa'i phan gnod kyi 'bras bu'i dmagasani 'jigs shing sngangs pa med par yade ston la sa bon thams cad thob cogo/ las dnga'atsho nam rnams kyang rgyas shoge/ rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur
ba bstan to/tshong pa'i ng de'i tshe kun tu song 'jigs pa med do// yang sa g.yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du nam mkha' la sngon gyis khebs te/ mthar chags su spyan bal
ltar dal sems par song la/ nub phyogs su nam mkha' la chu srin byis pa gsod ba dang/ sbal pa rnams dang/ ta dang chu srin 'dra ba'i lcenigyi gzugs snang la/ nang nub tu nyim dang zla ba
'char ba'i tsho/ sngon gyis bsgribs bamed ba de ltar snang ba'i mtshonani/ chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa g.yo ba zhes bya ste/ de ltar sa g.yos pa'i phan gnod kyi 'bras bu'ang drang srong chen pos ji
ltar mthong ba bzhin dubastan par bya ste// glang bu dang/ ri ngos dang/ zhade dang/ mtsho 'gram dang/ de dag tu sa bon theb cig dang/ sa dma' ba dang/ stacang chu che ba'i sa dad/ 'dam
rdzob can du btab na nam rung bar 'gyur/ tshul de lta bur sa g.yos pa na bkra shas te/ chu'i se g.yos pa zhes bya'o// yang sa g.yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du rlung drag por
langs la/ nang par dad/ nubu kar nyi ma dang/ zla ba dmar ser du snang ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma snang bar mthong na/ de ni rlung ga sa g.yos pa zhes bya ste/ de'i phan gnod kyi 'bras bu
bstan pa'i ng nyon cig/ de'i tshe shes rab can bdag gar yang ma 'bro bar go ba ste// 'dug la mtshon cha brgyag pa'i gozan brtsigs pa dang/ 'obs brko ba gyis shig/ rgyal po la
rol po dang/ mtshams gcig tu 'dug pa dang rtsod par gyur te/ skye bo la 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar sa g.yos pa thams cad na lhag par ma rnams la gnod par
'byung bar bsgrags te/ de lta bu'i rlung gis sa g.yos pa zhes bya'o// yang sa g.yos pa'i rdzas la zhug bdun tshun chad du/ de'i tshe skar mda' shin tu drag po lhung ba dang/ nang
nub kyi tsho dmar por gyur la/ nyim dang zla ba'ang dmar po'i snang ste/ tshul de ltar mthong na/ de ni me'i sa g.yos pa zhes bya ste/ khyim rnams bsrungs kyang mes 'tshig par 'gyur/
du ba dang/ me dang/ mtshon rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ zla ba dgur mar ma 'bab ste/ zhing tha bar lcas pa/ra 'gyur/ de ltar sa g.yos na ngan cing ma dge'o///
ma 'a sa g.yos pa zhes bya'o// de la snga dro sa g.yos na/ rgyal po dang/ dmag gi dpud dang ldan pa rta glang po che dang/ dmag dpon dang/ blon por bcas pa la ma dge ste/ rim gung
la sa g.yos na/ nad kyis 'debs sa// phyi 'phred sa g.yos na/ ba glang phyugs dang/ dmangs riges dang/ de bzhin du rdzo'u rigs rnams la gnod par 'gyur/ nang
par dad/ nyi ma nub pa dang/ nam gyi kung dus mtshams su sa g.yosan/ rkun po dang gos dmar po gyon pa'i mo rnams la mi dga'// mtshan mo srod la sa gas na/
gnod pa byed pa dang/ mtha' 'khob na gnas pa'i rkun po rnams dang/ ma ning rnams dang/ mtshan 'gyur ba rnams dang/ phyug po dang/ tshong sogs byed pa'i tshong pa dang//
ning med pa la ma dge'o// zla ba mar gyi de ba'i num chung la sa g.yos na/ gtum po drag shul can ngan byed pa rnams la ma dge'o// zla ba yar gyi de'i nem chung la sa g.yos na/
chos sbyin byed pa'i yo byad dang/ bram ze chos sbyin byed pa rnams su gnod par 'gyur ro// sa g.yos kyi le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o//da ma dang zla ba'i 'od dang
gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan ma bstan pa/ yul gang du ma shar ba'i tshi/ nyi ma 'dra bar nam mkha' la snang na/ de'i lho byang gi phyogs kun tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs rang rtags
ba'ang ma yin/ 'od zer pa dmi gsalal/ sprin gyis kyang nam kun chod na/ de na che ba 'bab pa yin te/ dbyar gyi tshon ma 'dra ba rtag par yang 'byung ngo// dus 'di ma yin/
ba sa gzhan gyi tsho ma 'dra ba snang na/ 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yul gang du nyi ma 'dra ba dkar po shar ba/ yul dang bram ze rnams la mi rung ngo// nyi ma 'dra ba'i kha
dog dmar po'i shar na/ rgyal rigs rnams dang/ mtshon cha thogs pas 'tsho ba la gnodapar shes par bya'o// khyim 'dra bar kha dog ser po 'am/ kha dog sngon por gyur na/
rdzobu rigs rnams dang/ ba glang dang/ phyugs kyis 'tsho ba'i ma rnams la gnod par shes par bya'o// gal tayul gang dang gang duti ma 'dra ba kha dog nag por shar na/ dmangs
rigs rnams la gnod pa dang/ char pa chen 'gyur ro// gal tanyim 'a g.yas rol du 1ma badra bar byungan/ lho phyogs su 'jigs pa cher 'byung/ zhag bdun tshun chad du char pa
char 'bab par bshad do// nyama'i byed phyogasan/ nyi ma 'dra ba'i kha dog dkar por snang ba byang na/ de ni byang phyogs kyi rgyal po la 'jigs pa cher 'byung/ char mi 'obab//
0/ @#// mu ge 'byung/ phan tshun du 'thab par 'gyur/ gal te yul gang du nyi ma 'a dekyil 'khor dmar bar snang na/ btsod kyi kha dog ltar dmar la/ gal te sngon po thum
por snang na/ zla ba ldan rgyal bo'am bar 'gyur ro// de lta bu byung na de'i rjes la ltas ngan drag po 'byung ste/ rgyal po nang 'grub cing gsod pa dang/ khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad rnams kyang
'byung bar 'gyur ro// nam ma'i dkyil 'khor gyin ng na/ mi skyes pa'i gzugs 'dra ba mgo dang bcas pa gsal bar snangan/ zlob bzhi tshun chad du rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro//
yul de'i rgyal po sde dang bcas te ma rung bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i dekyil 'khor gyi nang na zhugs pa sngon po dang/ sor bo dang/ dmar por shar ba nam snang ba'i tshe/ zla nga bzhi na
mi'i dbang pa ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang/ lul du mnad kyang 'byang ste// 'jigs pa chen por shes bar bya'o// nam tu me'i dekyile 'khor la ral gri gyen du 'greng ba ut+pal sngon po'i
'dab ma dang 'dra 'chang zungs dang bcas par snang ba dang/ gong du zhugs par snang ba de nyid kyis 'bras bu'ang 'dir bstan te/ khyad par du mi mang po mtshonagyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro//
nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na rale ba spyi blugs lta bu 'am/ reng reng bo 'am/ thub lta bu snang ba/ zla ba gsum tshun chad du bram ze rnams dang/ rgyal po la'ang gnod pa 'byung
00 bar ston to// de'i tshe lo ma rung bar 'gyur ba'i tsher mo che 'bab pa dang/ mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur ro// timo'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na bsil yab 'dra ba dang/ yang na sprul 'dra ba snang ma/
zla ba gsum na yul du 'jigs pa drag po 'byung bar ston/ ma sbrul gyis zin pa rnams M kyang sbrul gyi dug gas thog pas mi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// me'i dkyil 'khor gyin nganogal te bya rig
lta bu snang ngam/ 'on ta bya snang na/ bram ze rnams dang/ rgyal po la gnod pa zla ba phyed dang gsum na 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang tima'i nang na bya rgod kyi gzugs dang/ gcan gzan mi
gam ti ka'i gzugs lta bu snang na/ zla ba phyed dang gnyis na gnod pa 'byung ba'o// wa'i gzugs lta bu snang na/ zla ba gcig na gnod pa 'byung ngo// lung dung ga gzugs lta bu snang
na[？ ]zhag bcu na gnodapa 'byung ngo// yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na dbyag pa lta bu ma/ gtan ba sbom po lta bu nyi ma'i nang na snang na/ rgyal bo nang phan tshun gcig pas gcig
srod che bas bstengs pa dang u0f38/ rgya mtsho bzhi la dbang ba'i me'i dbang po dalta bu la ma dag ste/ 'jigs pa mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar ltas ngan gyi 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus
nges pa bstan pa las dus dar gnod par ma byung ste mi snang na/ de na lo gcigen 'bras bu gsum 'gyur du skyes te/ gnod pa 'byung bar ston to// zla ba dum bur lhags sem/
mdog gyur tam/ gas pa dang/ zla ba'i gzugs chen por ma/ 'gro ba dang/ rab tu ga yo ba dang/ zla ba tshes pa'i ru ma gsal ba 'di rnams ltar snang na/
skye bo la 'jigs pa 'byung ba 'am/ skye bo las 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zla ba de la gza' spyang kis thams cad zin na'ang skye bo la 'jigs pa 'byung bar bshad do// tshul 'di deng

T+Tha badra bar nyin la gatha' zhugs te nyim shana'ang zla ba dang 'dra por lta zhing/ bag yod par la de la gzung zhing shes par bya'o// yang zla ba'i mdog thal bo 'dra ba dang/ ste ring 'dra ba dang/
zangs 'dra ba'i mdog dang/ mdog ser po dang/ skya bo dang/ byu ru'i mdog tu snang ba dang/ zla ba'i mdog ma gsal bar snangan/ migand kyi 'jigs pa 'byung ba dang/ mtshon gyis 'gyed
pa dang/ nad kyis 'jigs pa 'byung ba dang/ gzhan yang gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang zla ba'i mdog dkar la snum zhing gsal bar snang na/ phyogs su bde ba dang/ char che ba
zhi bar 'gyur ro// de ltar zla ba'i 'gro ba dang/ bya ba dad/ gnas dang/ zla ba'i tshod dang/ mdog gyur pa dang/ tshulo dang zla ba rgyu ba'ang sems can bsod nams ma yin pa byas pa'i
'bras bu mu ge dang/ mtshon kar 'gyed pa dang/ 'chab dang/ tshogs 'byung ba'i gnod pa 'byung bar ston to// mtshan mo zlo ba tshos pa nas gza' rnams kyis zla ba'i steng na par
thar te songan/ da rnams kyi gnod pa'i dmigs so sor bstan te/ spyir ni rgyal po dang mi dam pam rung bar 'gyur ro// char pa ha cang che ba dang/ bla ma ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang
rgyal srid ma rung bar s+ya sten to// zla ba'i stengan pa wa sangs kyis mnan te song na/ rgyal po ngan pa ma rung bar 'gyur ro// zla ba'i thog nas mgo dmar dang sen pas naon ti seng na/
bkris pa'i 'jigs pa dang/ khon drag shul can du'abyung ba dang/ rab tu 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ zla ba la phodu mjug rangs kyis men te songan/ mu ge dang mtshon gyis
'gyed par bstan to// zla ba la gza' dag gsanon du song na/ le legs pa dang/ bde bor 'gyur ro// de ltar zla ba'i steng na phar gza' rnams kyis non cing phug ste song
bu'i 'bras bu de ltar bstan pa yin no// gza' rnams kyis zla bal phug ste song ba de 'bras bu ni zla ba gzas thug pa las zla ba'i gzugs cher skyes la// 'od lhag par che na
de ni rgyal bzhes bya'o// gal te pham par gyur te/ mthu rtsal drwa ba na/ zla ba 'dar zhing g.yo na pham pa zhes bya'o// de la pa wa sangs kyis phug ste seng na/ yul man
tra dang/ lul pan tsa la dang/ yu'am ga da nga dang/ yul da mo tadang/ yul ku pa ra dang/ ram gyi yul dang/ yul sa ra ga ra dang yul kha sha dang/ yul
[ra]@#/// bu lan drudang/ yul ke ka la dad/ kha che yul dang/ ban sog gi yul dad/ ri khrod na gnas pa'i rnams dang/ bud med rgyal mo byed pa'i yul dang/
khul u pa rda ste dang/ yul ang ga dang/ tshul u ru kur tsa dang/ yulasu shine ra dang/ yul du nu sha dang/ yul ru lin hadang/ bal yul dang/ ba glang rdzil sog
pa'i rnams dang/ yul stan dang/ yul sta la da na dang/ bcu la gnas pa'i mi nems gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la gnas pa'i mo rnams la/ zla ba bdun tshun chad kyis gnyen
dang bcas pa'i rnams ma rung bar 'gyur ba'i 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ nam zla ba 'od gsal ba phur bu phog ste song na/ yul pa sa ta dang/ yul san du dang/ yul gan da dang/
rakhrodan gnas pa'i ma rnams dang/ bag le'ilul dang/ sogala'i yul gyi lung pa la ljongs ri khrod pa brgya stong med dang/ kha che yul gyi mo lazla ba bcu tshun chad kyis gnod bar
the tsom med par 'gyur ro// nam zla ba'i 'od gsol ba mge dmar gyis phug na/ rgyal bo lul gzhan du 'gro ba 'am/ rgyal sri de bya bar brtson pa 'am/ rgyal sring byed par zhugs
ba la ma rung bar 'gyur ro// bzhon pa'i rta rnams zad par 'gyur/ phan tshun du bya zhing gnod pa dang/ dug dang mtshon mang bos ma rung bar 'gyur/ lul a yod dang/ yul du
00 lani dang/ yul ka lang ka'i rgyal bo rnams dang/ yul pa ra deng/ yul shag tume ta'i skye bo rnams ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ yul tre gar rta dang/ yul ma la ya ba dang/ yul ku
ra dang/ yul pa tad tsa ra dang/ yul sha be ya ba mo rnyems dang/ dmag dpon rnams dang/ ma'o tshogs rnams dang/ dmag gi tshogs rnams dang/ dpung dang ldan pa dus dang/ dang
tshul la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i mi rnams dang/ lul lho phyogs nu gnas shing rten pa'i mo rnams la zla ba drug gis 'jiges ba 'byung bar ston to/ nam zla ba gza' spen bas thug ste song
na= bram ze gtso bo dang/ rgyal po gdugs thogs pa 'thab ma'i g.yul du 'jug/ 'grub par byed/ blon po dang bcas/ sde'i gtso bo dpon tsan rnams 'thab par gyur/ grong
rdal dang/ tshong pa lam du zhugs pa dang/ yul mu tsu ta'i mi ded yul go'aa'i ma ring/ yul ab sha ha'i ma dang/ yul ga shud tu'om dang/
yul ma la ba dang/ yul mi po re dang/ mya ngan rnams dang/ yul mang ba rnams dang/ ba glang dang/ bong bu dang/ rdzam dang/ 'di rnams rgyal mtshan du byed pa'i yul
rnams ma rung ba dang/ yul rus pa can du 'gyur ro// tshul de rnams kyi mo la zla ba bcu bzhi ne sdig pa zhi ba dang ldan pa yin no/ nam gzang lag gis zla ba phug na/
nu@#// lo lags/ nad med/ char pa legs pa 'bab/ skye bo la gnod pa med cing bde ba dang zhi bar 'gyur ro// klu ba la zod na/jug rings kyis phug ste song na/ ga'/
zate skar khrod las dud pa 'thul na/ mi dpal ba dang/ mchon gyis 'tshob rnams dang/ chom rkun byed pa'i rnams gzhan gyis rtsal dang/ gnod pa dang/ drag shul gyis 'chi bar
'gyur ro// yang gal te zla ba de la gza' gzhan gyis 'bugs shade/ zla ba'i ngos la mdud cing reg par song na/ mtshon gyis gnod pa sna tshogs mang bo 'byung ngo// gal te zla ba'i
gza' rnams song ste nuban/ rgyal po 'chi be dang/ lus dang nor yang ma rung bar 'gyur ro// yang btsus pa'i bar skar gyi nang du gza' spyang kazhugs pa'i m zla ba la gza' spyang ki/
zhugs la/ skar mda' zla ba la phog na/ rgyal po 'chi'i// zla ba dang/ gza' gnyis kyi 'od zer phrad pa dang/ gza' zla ba'i thog na phar nen tu reg par song na gsar du zhugs pa/
smana gnas rnams 'jam par byed pa dang/ rgyal po skye bo rnams 'joms shange za bar 'gyur ro// zla ba me tog pad+ma me tog kumu ta dad 'dra// tshes grangs bzhin du zla ba skyo zhing shas
chab r snangan// dkyil 'khor 'od zer ldan te nyams pa med par 'gro ba yane// de ltar 'od zer bsale ldan ma rnams rgyal bar 'gyur// zla nga 'char zhing 'gro ba bshang po'o//
ka[d/ ]rgyu skar dang/ rgya skar gyi khyim gyi nang na gza' mig dmar zhugs pa'i mtshan ma bstanang/ rgyu skar mig dmar rgyu skar gyi khyim gang yang rung ba'inang du/ gzab mag dmar 'od kyi mdog
'jam pa dang ldanozhinge chen por 'gyur te/ zla ba brgyad dam/ zla ba bdun gyi bar du zhugs shinge 'dug pa las/ 'od kyi kha dog dang/ bong che ba nyamasan de na me dege ba yin te/ rgyu
skar gang dang gang ga nang du gza' mig dmar zhugs pa de nyid la gnod par 'gyur ro/ gza' mig dmar tshul de ltar zhugs pa na/ skye bo rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro// yang gza'i
mig dmar yon por 'gro zhing 'jug pa dang/ phyir yang 'khor zhang zhugs pa dang/ mig dam gyi bod dang/ mdog nyams pa dang/ gza' mig dmar rgyu skar dang nye zhing 'od 'dres pa
dang Da mig dmar las dud pa 'thul ba dang/ 'bar bdang/ mig dmar gyi rtse mo las 'od zer dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ phan tshun du'adzazhinge ba gro ba 'am/ lam gcig tu 'dug
la'od dmar po 'am/ yang na dud pa mo snyeg pa cher 'thul na gnod pa byed 'dod de den skye pa po 'am bar 'gyur ro// yang na gza' mag dmar 'od dmar po 'bar na/ 'byung po
thams cad lam rung bar 'gyur ro// yang na gza' mig dmar nam mkha' rgyu zhing/ shar nub ltas ma snang bar 'gro na/ marogs bzhi rnams 'jigs par 'gyur/ gang dang gang
khya// gis rgyu skar nang du zhugs pa de ltar m snangan/ mi de dag la gnod par 'gyur ro// nam ga zu'u mgo dmar rgyu skar dang/ skar ma kun gyi nang du 'od kyi mdog bzang/
bor sungan/ mi'ogis bzhi thams cad la phan par 'gyur ro// mig dmar gyi mdog dang/ 'od nyams rnam dag stangan par blta// yang gza' mig dmar yon por 'go zhing 'jug
pa/ tsha ba zhes bya ba dang/ gdong mchi ma can zhes bya ba dang/ sbrul zhes bya ba dang/ gdong dmar bo zhes bya ba dang/ mgo dmar yon por 'gro ba drag shul can zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin du gtum

bu zhes bya ba dang/ mig dmar shar ba rgyu skar bdun gyi nang du zhugs pa dad/ yang na rgyu skar dgu 'am/ yang nargyu skar brgyad kyis nang du zhugs ba las phyir lag na/ de ni yon po tshang ba zhes bya'o/
mig dmar de ltar zhugs pa la de'i tsho/ khang thog ga thid ka 'am/ nags tshal gyi tor ti'iklad ka nas/ mig dmar rtag tu rgyal ba bzhin du 'dug la/ nag guredared po zhig tu gyuran
rims nad kyang 'byud/ rab tu dga' ba med par byed/ gang dag me'i las kyie 'tsho zhing btso ba dang/ sreg bar byed pa de dag kyang me shor zhing byarabs/ skye bo zad par 'gyur go/ rgyu skar
bcu gcig gam/ mang nargyu skar bcu'am/ yang na bcu gnyis kyi nang du zhugs te 'dug na/ den gza' drag po yon por zhugs pa gdong mchi mazhes bya ba ste/ gza' de ltar zhugs pa ni/ hrani
[}]du char pa 'bab sta/ char legs par 'bad kyang/ gzhan gyis gnod pa byas pas pham par ma 'gyur mi'i lus kyi srog gzungs lnga yang nad can dugyur pas/ de'i phyir nad mang po 'byung bsam kun red
cing/ ba dang/ 'jig rten dum rnams la nad mang bo 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar bcu gsum mam/ yang na rgyu skar bcu bzhi'i nang du gza' mag dmar zhugs pa las slar log na/ den lon po
sbrul zhes bya ste/ glang po che rnams dang/ sngal po che dang/ sbrul rnams kyis gnod pa byed par 'gyur/ don gyis sbas pa rnams ma 'tsho/ sman dang/ 'bras bu rnams dang/ steng bu rnams
legs par smin cing 'khrung bar 'gyur/ char snyoms par 'bab/ sa bon thams cad rab tu 'khrung ngo// yang rgyu skar bco lnga 'am/ bcu drug gi nang du gza' zhugs na/ gza' drag shul
can de gdong dmar po zhes bya ste/ rgyal po phan tshun 'thab cing/ g.yul bkye ste/ mtshon gyis smos pas de'i tsho/ sha khrag gi 'dam du 'gyur ro// yang gza' mig dmar rgyu skar ba bdun
gyi nang du zhugs ste/ phyir log nade ni drag shul can dang/ gtum bu drug pa zhes bya ste/ de'i tshe na skye bo mang po rnams snying rje med/ snying brtse ba med/ bka' khrims dang chos lugs med de/
de'i dus na skye bo rnams gcig la gcig ral gri dang mdung bus 'debs shing 'phan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gza' mig dmar gzang drug tu 'pho zhing 'gro ba tshangs pa skye dgu'i bdag po/
@#/ ltar rab tu nyon/ de lta bu la gza nag dmar de sod na 'dug gam/ yod dam/ med dam/ byar la da mi rung ste/ de la nam zla ba gsum gyi bar du gza' mig dmar
rab tu songan/ de tsho skya bo rims nad kyis ma rung ba dang/ sa'i bcud nyams par 'gyur ro// gza' mig dmar bong chung dur gyur/ rnam par gzar bar gyur/ rnam par gnod par gyur
dkyil 'khor chud du gyur par yul phyogs gang na snang ba detsho/ mig dmar 'pham pa zhes bya ste/ de ni yul phyogs su gnod par 'gyur ro// gza 'a mtheg dmar de ltar gyuran/ mi'i las dang
rgyu la rjed pa'i las byed pa'i mi dang/ lul ma la bya ba'i yul mi dang/ lul ku sha'i mi dang/ yul ma sha'i mi dang/ lul ba 'o ma dang/ lul sa padama'i ma dang/ mul la ba'i mi
dang yul mog tu mi dang/ lha rjed pa'i mo rnams dang/ yul ma gu ra dang/ yul mi'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang/ yul sA ra zhes bya ba 'di rnams la gza' gzhan gyis gza' mig
dmar ba pham par byas na/ yul de rnams kyi mo la gnod par 'gyur ro// ar+ya ngag ru la kar rna'i nang nas gza' skar gyi ltas 'byung ba btus pa/ ltas dang mtshan ma dge bar gyur cig/
zla ba'i khyim brtsi ba dang/ rgyu skar brtsi ba'i mdo sde las 'byung ba/ zla ba'i bam brtsi ba/ ston zla tha chung nya nas/ dgun zla ra bar nya'i par du/ zub
gcig ste khyim sdig ba/ dgun zlar ba nya nas/ dgun zla 'bring po ta'i bar du zla ba gcig la khyim gzhu/ dgun zla 'bring po nya nas/ dgun zla tha chung lta'i bar du/ zla ba gcig la khyim chu srin
dgun zla tha chung nya nas/ dpu de zla ra ba'i lta'i bar du/ zla ba gcig la khyim bum pa/ dpyid zla ra ba ta nas/ dpyid zla 'bring pa lta'i bar du/ zla ba gcig la khyim ta/ dpu de zla 'bring po'i te
nas/ dpyid zla tha chung nyapa bar du/ zla ba gcig la khyim lug/ dpyid zla tha chung nya nas/ dbyar zla ra ba'i bar du/ zla ba gcig la khyim tshang/ dbyar zla ra ba nya nas/ dbyar zla 'bring po/
lta'i bar du/ zla ba gcig la khyim sbyor ba/ dbyar zla 'bringe nga nya nas/ dbyar zla tha chung ta'i bar du/ zla ba gcig la khyim sprul ba/ dbyar zla tha chung nya nas/ ston zla ra ba lta'i bar du//
zla ba gcig la khyim seng ge / ston zla ra ba nya nas/ ston zla 'bring po nya'i bar du/ zla ba gcig la khyim bu mo/ ston zla 'bring po nya nas/ ston zla thu chung lta'i bar du/ zla ba gcige la
khyim srang/ rgyu skar brtsi ba/ ston zla tha chung mar gyi ngol/ rgyu skar smin drug dbang/ tshes bcu drug la snaram dbang/ chos bcu bdun la mgo dbang/ tshes bco brgyad la lag/ tshes bcu/
dgu la nab so/ tshos rtishu la rgyal/ tshes teshu gcig la skog/ tshesatoshu gnyis la mnu/ sa te shu gsum la gri/ tshesatigu bzhi la dbo tshes nyi shu lnga la me bzhi/ tshes nyi shu drug la
nag pa/ tshes nyi shu bdun la sa ro/ tshes nyi shu brgyad la sa ga/ tshes nyi shu dgu la lha mtshams/ tshes sum cu la snon dbang/ tshes gcig la snubs/ tshes gnyisol
tho chu stod/ gsum la chu smad/ bzhi la byi bzhin/ lnga la go ba zhin drug la man gru/ bdun la mon gre/ brgyad la khrums stod/ dgu la khrums smad/ bcu lanam gru/ bcu gcig la tha skar/
sgyu bcu gnyis la khra/ bcu gsum la smin drug/ bcu bzhi la snar ma/ bco lnga la mgo dbang dgun zla ra ba mar gyi de la/ tshes bcu drug la lag bcu bdun la nab so/ bco brgyad la rgyal
bcu dgu la skab// ti shu la mchu/ nyi shu gcig la gri/ nyishu gnyis ladabo/ ti shu gsum la me bzhi/ nyi shu bzhi la nag ba/ taM shu lnga la a ri/ nyi shu drug la sa ga/ tishu bdun la lha
mtshams/ nyishubargyad la smon/ ti shu dgu la snubs/ sum cu la chu stod dbang/ dgun zla 'bring po yar gyi la/ tshes gcig la chu smad/ gnyis la gro bzhin/ gsum la men gru/
bzhi lo men gra/ lnga la khrums stod/ drug la khrums smad/bdun lanamagru/ brgyad la tha skar/ dgu la khranye/bcu la smin drug/ bcu gcig la snar ma/ bcu gnyis la mgo/ bcu gsum la lag
khacu bzhi lenab so/ btsolnga la rgyal dbang/ dgun zla 'bring bo mar gyi ngo la/ tshes bcu drug la skag/ bcu bdun la mchu/ bco brgyad la gre/ bcu dgu la dbo/ tishu lame bzhi/
ti shu gcig la nag pa//nyishu gnyis la sa ni/ nyi shu gsum la sa ga/ tishu ni lha mtshams/ nyishu lnga la snon/ tisha drug la snubs/ nye shu bdun la chu stod tishu brgyad la chu smad
ti shu dgu la byi bzhin/ tshos sum bcu la grobazhin/ dgun zla tha chung yar gyi ngo la/ tshes gcig la mon gru/ chos gnyis la mnag/ gsum la khrums stod/ bzhi la khrums smad lnga la nam/
gru drug la tha skar/ bdun la bra ka/ brgyad la smin drug/ dgu la be'u ded/ bcu la mgo/ bcu gcig la lag/ bcu gnyis lanab so/ bcu gsum la rgyal/ bcu bzhil skag/
bco lnga la mchu dbang/ dgun zla tha chung mar gyi de la/ tshes bcu drug la gro/ bcu bdun la dbo/ bco brgyad la ma bzhi/ bcu dgu la nag pa/ nyishu la sa ra/ nyishu gcig la sa ga/ tishu
gnyis la lha mtshams/ nyishu gsum la smon/ nyi shu bzhi la snubs/ nyi shu lnga la chu stod/ nyi shu drug la chu smad/ nyishu bdun la bya bzhin tishu brgyad la gro bzhin/ nyi shu dgu la mon gru/
tshes sum cu latshon gyi dbang/ dpyid zla ra ba yar gyi ngo/ tshes gcig la khrums stod/ tshes gnyis la khrums smad/ tshes gsum la nam gru/ tshes bzhi la tha skar/ lnga la bra to/ drug la smin
drug bdun la khebu ded/brgyad la mgo/ dgu la lag/ khacu la nab so/ bcu gcig la rgyal/ bcu gnyis la skag bcu gsum la mchu/ bcu bzhi la kre/ bco lnga la dbodabang/ dpyid zla ra ba mang
[7/ ]u// gyi ngo la/ tshes bcu drug la me bzhi/ bcu bdun la nag pa/ bco brgyad la sa ra/ bcu dgu la sa ga/ nyi shu la lha mtshams/ li shu gcig la smon ti shu gnyis la stsabs/ ti

shu gsum la chu stod/ tishu bzhi la chu smad/ tishu lnga la bya bzhin/ nyi shu drug la gro bzhin/ shu bdun la mon gru/ tishu brgyad la men gyi/ nyi shu dgu la khrums stod tshes sum cul khrums smad dabang/
pany+tsa dpyid zla 'bring po yar gyi ngo la/ tshes gcig la nam gru/ gnyis la tha skar/ gsum la bra te/ bzhi la smin drug/ lnga la be'u ded/ drug la mgo/ bdun la lag/ brgyad la nab so/ dgu la rgyal/
bcul skag/ bcu gcig la mchu/ bcu gnyis la gri/ bcu gsum la dbo/ bcu bzhi la me bzhi/ bco lnga lanag ba dbang/ dpyid zla 'bring po mar gyi ngel/ bcu drug la sa ni/ bcu bdun
kha so ga/ bcobargyad la lha mtshams/ bcu dgu la snon/ nyi shu la snabs/ nyishu gcige lachu stod/ tishu gnyis la chu smad/ tishu gsum la bya bzhine/ nyi shu bzhi la gro bzhin/ tishulnga
la monaglu/ nyishu drug la mon gyi/ nyi shu bdun la khrums stod/ nyi shu brgyad la khrums smad/ nyi shu dgu la nam gru/ tshos sum cu la tha skar dbod/ dpyid zla tha chung yar gyi ngol/ tshes
gcig la brate/ tshes gnyis la smin drug/ gsum la snar ma/ bzhi la mgo/ lnga la lag/ drug la nab so/ bdun la rgyal/ brgyad lo skag/ dgu la mchu/ bcu la gre/ bcu gcig
la dab/ bcu gnyis la ma bzhi/ bcu gsum la nag pa/ bcu bzhi la sa ri/ bco lnga la sa ga dbang/ dpyid zla tha chung gi mar gyi ngel/ tshes bcu drug la lha mtshams bcu bdun la snon//
bco brgyad kha snabs/ bcu dgu la chu stod/ ti shu la chu smad/ tishu gcig la bya bzhin/ tishu gnyis la gro bzhin/ tishu gsum la mon gru/ nyi shu bzhi la mon gre/ nyi shu lnga la ldums
stod/ tisha gi la khrums smad/ tishu bdun lanam gru/ tishu brgyad la thaskar/ shu dgu la bra te/ tshes sum cu la smin drug dbad/ dbyar zla ra ba yar gyi ngol/ tshes gcig la snaram
tshos gnyis la mgo/ gsum la lag/ bzhi la nab so/ lnga la rgyal/ drug la skag/ bdun la mchu/ brgyad la gro/ dgu la dbo/ bcu lam bzhi/ bcu gcig la nug po// bcu gnyis
la sa/ bcu gsum la sa ga/ bcu bzhi la lha mtshams/ bco lnga la snon dbang/ dbyar zla ra ba mar gyi ngo la/ tshes bcu drug la snabs/ bcu bdun la chu stod/ bco brgyad la chu smad/
bcu dgu la byi bzhin/ tishu la gro bzhin/ nyishu gcig la men gru/ tishu gnyis la mon gra/ nyishu gsum la khrumasasnyedaM/ nyi shu bzhi la khrums smad/ tishu lnga lanam gru nyi shu drug
la tha skar/ nyi shu bdun la bri te/ nyi shu brgyad la smin drug/ nyi shu dgu la snar ma/ tshes sum cul mgo dbang/ dbyar zla 'bring pa yor gyi ngo lo/ tshes gcig la lag/ tshes gnyis la
bya// nabaso/ gsum la rgyal/ ban lo skag/ lnga la mchu/ drug la ga/ bdunal dbo/ brgyad la me bzhi/ dgu la nag pa/ bcul sa ra/ bcugacig la sa// bcu
dganyis la lha mtshams/ bcu gsum la snon/ bcu bzhi la snabs/ bco lnga la chu stod dbang/ dbyar zla 'bring po mar gyi ngol/ tshes bcu drug la chu smad/ bcu bdun la bya bzhin/ bco
bsgyu brgyad la gro bzhine bcu dgu la mon gru/ nyishu la khrums stodo/ tishu bcig la khrums smad/ tishu gnyis la nam gru/ nyi shu gsum la tha skar/ ti shu bzhi la khra ka/ nyi shu lhag la sman
drug nyi shu drug la snar ma/ nyishu bdun la mgo/ ti shu brgyad la lag/ nyi shu dgu la nab so/ sum cu la rgyal/ dbyar zla tha chung yar gyi ngol/ tshes gcig la skag/ tshos ga nyis
lo mnu/ gsum la gre/ bzhi la dbo/ lnga la me bzhi drug la nag pa/ bdunal sa ra/ brgyad la sa ga/ dal lha mtshams/ bcu la smon/ bcu gcig la snabs/ bcu gnyis
a la chu stod/ bcugasum la chu smad/ bcu bzhi la byi bzhin/ bco lnga la gro bzhin dbang/ dbyar zla tha chung mar gyi ngo la/ tshes bcu drug la man kru/ bcu bdun la mon gre/ bco brgyad
la khrums stod/ bcu dgu la khrums smad/ nyi shu lanam gru/ nyi shu gcig la tha skar/ tishu gnyis la bra nyo/ nyishu gsum la smin drug/ nyi shu bzhi la snaram/ nyishu lnga la mgo/
ci shu drug la lag/ nyashu bdun la nab so/ nyishu brgyad la rgyal/ nyishu dgu la skag tshes sum cu la mchu dbang/ ston bla ra ba yar gyi ngo la/ tshes gcig la gri/ gnyis la dbo//
gsum la me bzhi/ bzhil nag pa// lnga la sa ra/ drug la sa ga/ bdun la lha mtshams/ brgyad la snon/ dgu la snabs bcu la chu stod/ bcu gcig la chu smad/ bcu gnyis la gro/
bzhin/ bcu gsum la bya bzhin/ bcu bzhi la mon gru/ bco lnga la mon gyi dbang/ ston zla ra ba mar gyi ngel/ tshes bcu drug lakhrums stod/ bcu bdun la khrum smad/ brtse brgyad la nam gru/
bcu dgu la tha skar/ tishul bra/ tishu gcig la smin drug/ tishu gnyis la snar ma/ tiseshu gsum la mgo/ nyishu bzhi la lage/ tishu lnga la nab so/ nyishu drug la rgyal/ nyi shu bdun
la skag/ ti shu brgyad la mchu/ tishu dgu la gre/ tshes sum cu la dbo dbad/ ston zla 'bride po yar gyi de la/ tshes gcig la nag ba/ gnyis la sa'i/ gsum la sa ga/ ba la lha
mtshams/ lnga la smon/ drug la snabs/ bdun la chu stod/ brgyad la chu smad dag la gro bzhin/ bcu la bya bzhin/ bcu gcig la men gru/ bcu gnyis la mon gra/ bcu gsum la khrunA
stod bcu bzhi la khrums smad/ bco lnga la grwa skar dbad/ ston zla 'bring po mar gyi de la/ tshes bcu drug la bra nye/ bcu bdun la smin drug/ bco brgyad la snar ma/ bcu dgu pa
mgo Da ti shul lag/ nyi shu gcig la nab so/ tishu gnyis la rgyal/ tishu gsum la skag/ nyi shu bzhi la mchu/ ti shu lnga la kre/ nyi shu drugal dbo/ tishu bdun
lame bzhi/ nyi shu brgyad lanag pa/ nyi shu dgu la sa ni/ sum cu la sa ga dbang/ ston zla tha chung yor gyi de la/ tsho pa gcig la lca mtshams/ gnyis la snon/ gsum la snabs//
bzhi la chu stod/ lnga la chu smad/ drug la byi bzhin/ bdun la gro bzhin/ brgyad la mon gru dgu lamon gre/ bcu la khrums stod/ bcu gcig la khrums smade/ bcu gnyis la nom gru/
bcusum la tha skar/ bcu bzhalabra ta/ bco lnga la smanadrug dbang/ 'jig rtan ston pa'i le'u las/ sa g.yo ba la sogs pa'i ltos kyi le'u nyi tshe legs shig tu byung ba/ dgun zla thu chud
tshes bcu drug gam/ bcu dgu ja nyi ma 'char kar du ba lta bu 'am/ char pa 'bab par snang ma/ sran gyi nang nas glog 'byung ba snangan/ mdzangs shing mkhas pa rnams 'gyur bar shas
par gyis shig/ gza' nyi ma dang/ skar ma tha skar la du ba lta bu byung ste/ nam mkha' khebs nas/ lo bcu gnyis tshod bar than pa 'byung bar shes par bya'o// dgun zla tha chung
skar ma bra nye'i tsho/ nyi ma ser por snang na/ kho ra khor yug tu gsod par 'gyur zhing/ dbus su rtogs par 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dpyid zla ra ba la/ gza'i nyi ma dang skar ma smin/
drug gis g.yos pa la/ gal te char yang ma bab na/ de'i 'khor gyi mi bung bar 'gyur/ dpyid zla 'bring po skar ma rgyal gyi tsho/ nub kanyi ma'i 'od madog nag por snying na de rgyal po la
gsod/ dbudi zla tha chung skag tsho/ ti mo te romi snang na/ der g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur ro// rgyal bo gnyis kal gsod bar gyurano// dbyar zlar ba la/ skar ma'i tshe nyi zla gnyis ka sbyang
kas zinan/ blon po dag gis rgyal po rnams gsod de/ dbyar zla 'bring po la skar ma khrums stod kyi tshe/ phyed phyi ma'i drung dang/ rta 'khor du 'od dmar po byung na/ zla ba drug tshun chad dupho
rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'khor de gsod par 'gyur ro// rgyal po de blon po dang/ bu dang/ chung ma dang bcas par ngas gsodapar 'gyur ro// gal te dbyar zla 'bring po la tan zla bslab
sa zinen/ yul 'khor der mu ge dad/ 'thab mo dang/ nad 'byung ngo// dbyar zla tha chung la skar ma snubs kyi tsho/ nyim dang zla khami gsal zhing der ma stag lta bu dag snang na/ yula 'khor

dar ma bde ba 'byung/ ston zla 'bring po zla ba phud kyi bar du/ nyi ma dang zla bal gnod pa byung ba na/ la bu stong gi khrag 'thung bar 'gyur ro// ston zla tha chung nya la/ nyi ma dang zla ba mtshan dang ma ldan
zhing mi gsal ti/ bon te me'i mdog 'dra zhing/ nam mkha' yang madog de 'dra na/ rgyal po gnyis ka la rgan pa'i yul 'khor phyir zhing phung bar 'gyurati/ bsadanas myur du 'gyel zhing/ sa'i
sha/ khrag 'thung bar 'gyur ro// dgun zla tha chung la skar ma bra te'i tshe/ rlung nag po langs shing/ nyi ma dang zla ba spyang kis zinan yul 'khor der dmag gi tshogs kyis phung par byed
par 'gyur ro// dpad zla ra ba la rlung gis sa'i char 'bebs shing klog byung na/ der rgyal po rnams gsod cing/ gzhan dag rgyal po la 'jig par 'gyur ro// dbyar zla 'bring po la nyim gza' 'ga'
zhig dang phrad la rlung chen po drag po langs na/ rgyal po mdas gsod par 'gyur ro// dbyar zla tha chung la skar ma skag gatshe/ nyim legs su skar mda'i ltung na/ zla ba drug tshun chad du yul 'khor
la 'byung bar ston to// dbyar zla ra ba la nyi ma las/ gza' thal byung na/ nyi ma las thal ba'i gza' des/ de thams cad du gza'i gnod pa 'byung ngo// dbyar zla 'bring po las char 'bab
pa dang/ tama'i khyams na/ rgyal po steng gcig la gcig gsod do// dbyar zlor ba la skar ma bra nye'i tshe/ rlung langs shing 'brug zer na/ rdzing rnams ma rung bar 'gyur te/ la rtog thams
cad m rung bar 'gyur ro// dbyar zla tha chung la rlung ser bo ldang zhing nam mkha' nag por 'dug na/ de kho ra khor yug tu gnas pa la 'byungabar shes par bya'o// dbyar zla tha chung la skar ma
khrums stod kyi rkyen pa'i 'brugam zer bar baban/ nad dang mu ge 'byung bar ston to// ston zla ra ba la 'brugam zer na/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'khor de'anor bsags pa 'phrog
par 'gyur ro// ston zla rab la rje char langs ta/ byang phyogs su sdeng chen 'gyel na/ der yang yul 'khor mtha' dag tu phung bar 'gyur ro// ston zla tha chungatshes bcu gsum la 'jur zug ni/
yul 'khor de kho ra khor yug phung bar 'gyur ro// dbus ni ltogs te 'chi'o// dgun zla ra ba la skar ma tha skar gyi tsho/ skar mda' lhung ngam/ ser ba bab na/ yul 'khor der skye dgu kun
dbugs mi bde bas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dpyid zla ra ba la skar ma lag gi tshe/ nam mkha' la me tog lta bu snang ngan/ nam mkha' la sgra gragan/ yul 'khor d myur duphung bar 'gyur ro// dpyid/
zla 'bring po skar ma sa ri'atsho/ srung ma langs par char 'bab cing 'ja' zug na/ grong khyer mtha' dag tshig bar 'gyur ro// dbyar zla ra ba la skar ma bra nye'atsho/ byang phyogs su sgra byung na/
nam mkha' la kha dog ser por snangan/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dag dang 'phrad do// dbyar zla 'bring po la skar ma rgyal gyi tshe/ nam mkha' la glog byung ngam/ sgra dang bcas pa'i char chu 'baban
'gro ba gsum cha zhes bya'o// dbyar zla thachung skar ma snabs kyi tsho/ char lan mang du bab bam/ 'ja' zug na rgyal rigs rnams la 'jigs pa 'byung ngo// ston zla ra ba skar mnub
so'i tshe/ gnam grum mam/ rlung shin tu nag po langason/ der nad chen po 'byung bar ston to// skar ma rgyal gyi tsho phyogs mtshams su byung na/ rgyal rigs rgyur du 'khrug cing skye dgu
phyogs su 'chad par 'gyur ro// ston zla tha chung skar ma bra nye'i tshi 1 stong sgra byung dam/ rtswa dang bcas pa'i char baban/ dka' thub can rnams la 'jigs pa chen po
'byung ngo// ston zla tha chung la skar ma lag gi tsho/ nam mkha' la rnga sgra lta bu byung na/ der rkang bzhi po rnams 'chi'o// dgun zla tha chung skar mamon gru'i tsha/ nam mkha' la rol me sel
snyan gyi sgra lta bu drag na/ lo tog la 'byung pa gnod pa byed cing/ nad drag po 'byung ngo// dgun zla 'bring po skar ma sa ri la/ skar mda' drag po 'byung zhing/ nam mkha' la glogargyun du
byungan/ mkhas pa rnams la 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ngo// dgun zla ra ba yar gyi ngo la sargyun du g.yos na/ lo gsum len pa dang yul 'khor mtha' dag phung bar 'gyur ro// dpyid
blor ba la skar ma smon gyi tsha/ rtsa dang bcas pa'i rlung 'khrugs sam/ rgyun du sa g.yos na/ tshadas par sbyod pa rnams la 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ngo// dpyid zla 'bring po la skar ma
khrums stod kyi tshe sa g.yos na 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ngo// dpyid zla 'bring po la skur mchu stod kyi mtshan mo sa g.yos na/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal po gsod cid/ ma mang po gsod
doTo dpyid zla tha chung mar gyi ngo la/ sa rgyun du g.yo 'am/ zla ba drug gi bar du char ma 'bab na/ dar mu ge 'byung bar ston to// dbyar zla ra ba la skar ma bra nye'i nyin par sa g.yos na/ ]
mi dpa' bo stong 'chi zhing sa na khrag 'thung ngo// dbur zla ra ba la skar ma snabs kyi mtshan ma sa gshes na/ mtha' 'khob kyi yul 'khor du gsod par 'byung ngo// yul du 'thab me 'byung
ngo Da dbyar zla 'bring po la skar ma rgyal gyi tshes g.yos na/ yul der la rtog ma rung bar 'gyur ro// stongs kyis bya ba las kyang g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ skar ma lag gi tshe/ gang du rlung
langs te mchod rten g.yos sam/ 'bar ram/ 'gyel na yul 'khor de myur du phung bar 'gyur ro// gang du mchod rten grum mam/ 'gyel na rgyal po de yul 'khor dang bag
tu gzhan gyis khyer bar 'gyur ro// dbyar zla tha chung skuram khrums stod kyi tshe sa g.yos na rgyal po rtag tu sa 'pho zhing chomarkun dag gis yul 'khor de bcom par 'gyur re/ ston zla
tha chung la sa g.yosan/ grong khyer gyi skor g.yo zhing zhig gam/ mchod rten rnying pa zhig pa dor ma lus par phung bar 'gyur ni// zla ba'i dum g.yas sam g.yon du gza' phur bu
zhugs na/ rgyal po'i sa'i dbang phyug gi longs spyod chen po ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ nyi ma'i rtse mor gza' mag dmar zhugs na/ mtha' 'khob na gnas pa'i rgyal phran rnams kyis
[']khor khor yug tuganod pa 'byung ngo// zla ba'i rtsa mer spen pa zhugs na/ 'jigs pa chen po dang ma ge 'bang/ las do/ 'bu sang kis zin dam sar mda' lhung na//
thubya/// zla ba drug tshun chad du rgyal po la gnod pa 'byung bar ston to// bla skar la bab pa'i tshe/ zla ba spyang kis zin na/ rgyal bo dang yul 'khor du gnod pa mi bzad pa 'byung
ka do rgyal po bla skar la bab pa'i tshe/ zla ba la gza' mjug rongs zhugs na/ mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal pa dag dang 'thab cing mtshon gyis rgyal bar 'gyur ro// dpyid zla ra ba skar ma
pany+tsa mchu'i tshe/ zla ba la gza' mjug rades zhugs na/ 'bab chu thams cad du skams par 'gyur/ skye dgund kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro// phur bu 'am/ pa wa sangs sam/ mig dmar
ram spen pa zla ba'i rtse mor zhugs na yang/ der 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar shes bar bya'o// skar ma rgyal la gza' mjug rings nas 'jug na/ ring po ma thogs pa der phyogs bzhi
nas dmag tshogs 'ong ngo// skar ma mchu la mig dmar zhugs sam/ gro bzhin phur bu zhugs na/ lo gsum khyud skor du 'jigs pa rtag tu 'byung ngo// dbyar zla ra ba skar ma snar/
tshe ma la pa wa sangs zhugs te phyir 'khog na/ 'byung po thams cad dang/ rgyal rigs rnams la 'jige sapa chen po 'byung ngo// skar ma sa ga la phur bu 'an/ sngon pa 'am/ zla ba 'am/
t+tim zhub cha na skye dgu'i 'khor los bsnon pa bzhin du phung bar 'gyur ro/ yang ngal dang/ gong skor dang/ yang la la sogs pa'i skar ma las mdor bsdus pa'i lha
dang Da g.yang mtshod pa dang/ gnyen sbyar ba dang/ lam du 'jug pa dang/ shid gtad pa rnams kyi skar ma bzang ngan sar ba la lha mchod cing dpal dang g.yang bgyi ba'i skar ma bzang
du 'dom pa la/ mgo dang/ grwa dang/ me bzhi dang/ mon gru rnams te/ 'brong smad du bgyi ba la/ byi bzhin/ gro bzhin/ smin drug/ snaram/ lag/ rgyal/ chu skyed/ chu smad rnams
rgyu skar ma de la ma gtogs pa gzhan ni bgyir mi rung ste nganano// gnyan sbyar ba'i skar ma bzang po 'dam pa la/ dbo/ lha mtshams/ me bzhi/ snubs/ chu stod/ chu smad/
nam gru rnams te/ skar ma 'di dag la bag ma tshur blangs kyang rung/ bu sring phar btang yang rung ste/ la dang gnad 'phrod pa dang/ bkra shis so/ danaM rab ste ma rung ba la/ snaram
dang nag pa la sogs pa gzhan na ngen te bya bar 'gyur ro// zhing sa bon gdab pa la skar ma bzang du 'dam pa la/ nab so dang/ lha mtshams dang/ chu stod dang/ chu smad dung 1 byi bzhin
rnams so// mchog tu ngan pa la smin drug dang/ rgyal dang/ bra rnams so// lam du 'jug cing donagater ba'i skar ma bzang ngan blta ba/ skur ma shar phyogs dang/ byung dbang ba'i
[']skar ma la mgo/ lag/ nab so/ rgyal/ mon glu/ mon gre/ khrums stod/ khrums smad/ nam gru/ tha skar rnams yin te/ shar phyogs dang byang phyogs sumachin/ skar/
! @#// ma 'di dag gi nyi ma la lam du 'jug ste song zhig/ don grub cing ma phyogs gnyis ka la nye zho mi 'byung ngo// skar ma de dag la bab pa'i skyon par lho dang nub tumachis
kyi1na ma 'a brod kyis/ ma 'gro zhage/ skar ma lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dbad ba'i skar ma la gri/ dbo/ me bzhi/ lha mtshams/ snon/ snubs/ chu stod/ chu smad/ bya bzhin/
gro bzhin rnams yin te/ lho dang nub phyogs su mchin/ skar ma de dag gi ma la lam du zhugs te song zhig/ 'gron drag cing nye zho med par slar 'khod do// skar ma de dag la bab
pa'i rten par shar dad byang thugs sumachin/ don ma drag cing zha'abyung ste/ slar yang ma 'khor bas na 'grozhag/ phyogs gang mchi yang rung ste/ skar ma 'di rnams la bab na/
'gro ma rung ba gnag pa/ sa ri/ sa ga/ bra/ mchu/ smin drug/ skag 'di bdun la bab na/ phyogs mtshams dang/ mde gtsang gang yang 'gror ma rung ste/ ma 'phrod pas
zhag 'ga' shol nalegs so// skar ma 'di rnams kyi nang na mchog tshul dam pa la/ shar dang byang phyogs su rgyal/ khrums stod/ tha skar la bzang/ lho dang nub phyogs su 'gro na/
lha mtshams dang mi bzhi la 'gron bzang/ yang na don gnyer ba'i lam skar rnam gcig la/ skar ma rgyal dang tha skar gnyis na nyi ma shar ba'i shul dang/ mdo smad dang/ byad phyogs su
xxx
su gdam na/ lha mtshams/ me bzhi gnyis la lam du zhugs na/ don drag la ma phyugs gnyis ka la'ang nor zho dang 'tho nga khrumami mchi'i// yang shing dang phyogs mtshams ga ra nang
yad rung/ 'gror ma rung ba'i skar ma ngan pa rnams la nag pa dang/ sa ra dang/ sa ga dang/ bra nye dang/ chu smad dang/ smin drug dang/ snar ma dag ste/ 'di rna na ngan cing 'gro'am
rung ba'i skar ma'o// yang phyogs bzhire 'gro ba'i skar ma rnam gcig bstan pa 'phrod cing bzang ba'i skar ma la khre dang/ dpe dang/ ma bzhi ded/ lha mtshams dang/ snon dang//
snapas dang/ chu stod dang/ chu smad dad/ bya bzhin dang/ gro bzhin te/ skar ma 'di btsun/ lho dang/ nub phyogs kyi skar ma ste lho phyogs dang mdo gtsang phyogs su nger
gnyer zhing 'gron por mchin/ 'di rnams gang la bab kyang rung/ 'phrod de bzang ngo// don drag la slar myur du 'khor zhing na tsha dang/ rlag ber dang/ 'theng grum la sogs pa nong zhi
sa mcha'i// shar dang byang phyogs su mchin ni/ skar ma 'di rnams la bab na ngan te/ don ma drag cing/ sur yang ma 'khor te zhe mchi'o// skar ma mgo lag/ snar ma
nab so/ rgyal/ mon gre/ mon gru/ khrums stod/ khrums smad/ nam gru/ bla skar/ skar ma bcu gcig po 'din/ shar dang byang phyogs kyi skar ma ste/ shar
dang byang phyogs su mtshan/ skar ma 'di rnams gang la babakyang rung ste/ don grub cang na tsha dang drug bor la sogs pa mi 'byung ngo// nub dang lho phyogs su ma na ni skar ma 'di ngeg la baban/
donami 'grub cing ngan te slar m 'khor ro// na tshe dang/ rlag bor dang/ god tshabs cher mcha ste/ skar ma 'di rnams la ma 'gozhig/ yang lam du 'jug pa'i tshes grangs dang cho ga bstanang//
yang lam du 'jug pa tshes grangs dang/ gza' dang/ rgyu skar du ltan na legs te/ de ltar ma ldan na/ tshes grangs bzang bo 'dam ste/ lam du zhugs nashis par gyur te/ tshes gsum
dad bdun dang/ bcugacig dang/ bcu bdun dang/ bcu dgu dang/ nyishu gsum dang/ nyi shu bdun te/ 'di rnams kyi na par zhugs na/ nyarang gar 'gro yang bzang ngo// de ltar
[j]ma ldan te/ rings pa zhig yod na/ shar phyogs su 'gro na/ lcags che chu tshon do pa gcig la ban gzung bar bya'o// lho phyogs su mchin/ shi tshon gang ba gzung bar bya'o// nub phyogs
su 'gron/ sol ba tshon gsum pa zhig gzung bar bya/ byang phyogs su 'gren sa phul gang gzung ste sge nas rgyang grags gsum tsam bor na nyes pa mi 'byung ngo// sgo nas chas pa'i
[a ]khyi 'thabapa mthong na/ 'gro ba mi rigs kyis/ re zhig ma 'gro zhog lam du zhugs pa'i tsho mtshon cha'i bag kha nas brjod cing 'byed de/ bor rlag ces rjod du ma rung ngo// skye'i
