thad ka nas phyi rol du gtam ma bya/ chas te song ba'i 'og tu sur sgo legs su blta bar ma bya/ de ltar byas na nye zho 'byung ngo// shad byed pa'i skar ma la bzang por brtsi ba mgo dad/ me/
ban dang/ mon 'gro dang/ khrums smad dang/ nam gru dang/ tha skar rnams so// 'bring du bgyin/ byi bzhin dang/ gro bzhin dang/ snar ma/ lag/ rgyal/ mchu/ chu stod/
rnams so// shin tu ngan pa'i skar ma bdun yod de/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ res gsum du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de dag gang zhe na/ bra nye/ smin drug/ nab so/ dngo/ sa ge
chu smad/ khrums stod rnams/ de rnams kyi nyi me 'ashad byed cing ro bskyed du ma rung ngo// de'anyin par sang dga' ba zhig gam/ nor bzang po zhig thob na'ang res gsum du
bstud mar 'thob ste dga' 'o/ zhig bcu gcig gis btab bam/ dgra zhig zus te sAdam dga' bar gyur na'ang/ ces gsum du bstud mar 'byung ngo// gza'i brtsi ba dpyid
zla ra ba dang/ dbyar zla 'bring po dang/ ston zla tha chung 'dra bar sbyin pas tshe/ dbyar zla ra ba dang/ ston zla 'bring po dang/ dgun zla tha chung 'dra bar phur bus tshe// ston zla ra ba dang
ubya// dgun zla 'bring bo dang/ dpyid zla tha chung 'dra bar mag dmar la tshes/ dgun zla ra ba dang/ dpyang zla 'bring po dad/ dbyar zla tha chung 'dra bar zla ba la tshes/
zlab shol der ba ni/ lo ngo mthong gsum zhig la/ sho po lan cig dor te/ yang lo tshul du ni/ skar ma khyim bcu gnyis/ lho byang/ shar nub phyogs bzhin mchis pa la//
phyogs kyi ra sha'i dkyil drang po la shel der te la skor bcu gnyis la shel bra nye ba'i 'dor bar brtsi/ rgya'i ltar na'ang 'du dog 'thun te/ phyogs bzhi'o le skar/ shar drang po na
yos bu/ lho drang po na rta/ nub drang pon bya/ byang drang po na byi ba rnams te/ byi ba'i 'khol dpyad zla 'bring bo gnyis te/ shol dor/ yos bu le la dbyar zla 'bring po la bar/
rta' la ston zla 'bring po la bor/ bya'i le la dgun zla 'bring po la bor/ ga ru ra'i rgyud kar ka sang ka hazhes bya ba las/ gza' chen po bdun res kyis zhag re re la
dab byed pa' tshe/ gza' gcig dbang ba'i zhag gcig la'ang nyin me thun brgyad/ mtshan ma thun brgyad la/ klu'i rgyal bo la brgyad dbang byed pa'i go rims dang/
bzang ngan brtag pa'i mdor bsdus pa/ gza' chen po bdun ni nyi ma dang/ zla ba dang/ mig dmar dang/ lag dang/ phur bu dang/ pa wa sangs dang/ sngon
pa'o/ klu'i rgyal po brgyad la dang po bdunan mtha' yas dad/ nor rgyas dang/ 'jog po dang/ pad+ma chen po dang/ stobs kyi rgyu dang/ pad+madang/ dung skyong ngo// klu'i
rgyal bo brgyad pa ni rigs ldan zhes bya'o// de la gza' chen po bdun po de dgan/ res kyis go rims bzhin nyin zhag re re la dbang de// de dag gtan zhag gcig la nyin mo la'ang
thun brgyad/ mtshan mo la'ang thun brgyad du bcas pa la/ klu'i rgyal po snga ma bdun gyi steng du klu'i rgyal pa rigs ldan gyis bsnan te/ brgyad pa go rims bzhin du dbang byed
pa 'ang yod de/ gza' nyi ma'i zhag gcig gis thun bcu drug la ni/ klu'i rgyal po rigs ldan rang gis skal ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po dang/ stobs kyi rgyu'i skal
ba la'ang dbad byed do/ gza' zla ba'i nyin zhag gcig gi thun bcu drug la no/ klu'i rgyal po 'gas ldan rang gi skal ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po dang/ pad+ma dang//
dung skyong gi skal ba la'ang dbang byed do// gza' mig dmar gyi nyin zhag gi thun bcu drug la na/ klu'i rgyal po rigs ldan rang gi skal ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po pad+madang/ dung
skyongago skal ba la bang dbang byed de// gza' lag gi nyin zhag ga thun bcu drug la ni/ rigs ldan rang gi skal ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po dung skyong gi sgol ba la dbang bad do/ nga bar
phur bu'i nyin zhag ni/ rigs ldan rang gi skal bdad 'jog pa dang/ pad+ma dang/ dung skyong gsal ba la'ang dbang byed de/ gaN+Da'i pa lnga sangs kyi nyin zhag
lan/ rigs ldan rang gi skal ba dang/ dung skyong la'ang dbang bud// gza' spen pa'i nyin zhag gi thun bcu drug la ni/ rigs ldan rang gi skal ba dang/ stobs kyi rgyu dang/ dung
skyong gi skal ba la'ang dbang byed do// de la gza' bdun po'i nyin mtshan gyi thun gang 'a rigs ldan rang dang/ gzhen gyi skal ba la dbang byed pa'i thun de dag la mi la sogs pa gdug pas
zin pa la sogs pa ni/ gshin rjes zin pa dang 'dra ste ma 'tsho'o// tshor ma dang rtsa la sogs pa rma mched cing nad chen por 'gyur te mi 'chi'o// nad kyis btab pa dang/ byed
lha khrin la thogs pa dang/ ma 'tshomi ther no// don du 'gro ba dang/ don bsgrub pa yang nya zho 'byung zhing den mo grub bo// klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyi dus lani ru bya bar yang bzang rab bo//
gnor bu rin po che bzang ngan brtag pa'i gzhung dang thabs yong yang nor bu rin po chu btsal no/ thog ma'i 'byung khung ni/ 'dzam bu gser gyi glang ga ba rolan/ rinapo che sna tshogs kyi

ni yodapa las g.yu rdo dang/ dngul rdo brko ba bzhin du rin po che'i rdo dbul ba'i mese brkos nas sang gal ti ba'i rgyal po la gser gyi gzhong pa'i nang du blugs te phul na// rgyal po chags shing gis de'i
nad nas bton te/ blon po rnams kyang lnga bcu man chad/ bca' bcu yan chad so sor bya dgar gsol zhing 'thor/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po mun de tA se nas kyang 'di bzhin du mthong/ rgya yul nas dar red pas/

blon po de dag las nyos te/ ye zho bar m la'ang bdun zhig phul/ rin po che btsal na red pa'i khungs nitshong pa phyug bo yul gru mang po rgya rgyu 'ga' tsam la bzang por mdog/ mngon pa la karinapo che gang dag bdag

kyang ma bdeg/ kha cig la ni rin po che zhes mchi yang ban bo chem lags/ rin po che bzang ngan brtsi ba'i rtags ni ga brtag pa// zlum pa dang/ mdog nyi ma'i kha dog ltar dkar zhing 'tshar pa steng lteng mchis na

bzang/ pad+ma rA ga dang/ a rAl la sogs pa brtagan/ spyir rtsa ba dang gsal la de'i nang nas nig po bgrang pa'i lhang lcang po mchi/ bu kha mchis ba dbang/ mu tig dbug pa na reg [']cing des pa'i rnams bu ga

dbug pan cheb tu stsal dang/ gar dbug pa mngon te/ de nas phyir chab nas phyung ste dbug/ de nas yang rinapo che brtag pa'i thabs gcig la/ shog shog dril ba mdzub mo tsam la/ yung ba brtag pa'i lde gus shog
shog dril ba la bskus// de'i steng du bsres pa kha ma gcig gis glan te/ de la nor bu rin po che btsug la/ rin po che'i mjug ma gnyis ka logs su bstan te/ de'i kha dog gi shog shog bung bas bsus pa la

sngon po 'am/ dmar por gyur na bzad rab/ dong tse a ban zhes bya ba 'phreng gcig la grangs stong brgya'i zhabcul srang gcig tu brtsis pa/ dong tsha gcig la zhe gcige// dod tse bcu la srang gcige'abyud
tu/ ta zig yul nargya pa po 'o de kor dang/ bya dga' stsal pa bod kyi mong bu mo deng 'du bar dong tse gcig la zho brgya/ no brgya la gser srang phyed dang bcu gsum la bgyid/ stong gi rim
dang/ yi ge ni rgyal bo rabs re re zhing 'gyur/ dong tse chung du na kun kyang 'dra ste/ no gcig gi tshod brgya lan srang gcig/ dngul nanem gnyis la bgyid/ ta zig ni gser dang/ dadul/ zangs gsum
la bgyid/ gser deng tse zho gcig pa gcig la dadul gyi ya gam/ nam gnyis pa tishus 'jal/ dngul kyi ya gam gcig la zangs kyi dong tso drug cu yis 'jal te/ zangs kyi dong tse din tshod ma dang/
ga gon dang/ sbyin gtong hran tshogs kyi gtor zan du bgyid/ rgya gar gyi dong tse gsar dang/ dngul dang/ ra gan dang/ skar gzhir bsus te/ ming ni de 'anyes bgyi ste// gser
dang dngul na chung/ ra gan dar/ 'khar ba ni cha sta/ gcig la zho gnyis mchis te/ bltar lhan cig tu gzhu yang ma 'dra ste/ so sen tshig cig par gda'/ bal po pa na
ses bgyi ste/ zangs ma gcig pu la'ang bgyid/ zangs dang/ zha nyudang/ 'khar ba bsres pa la'ang bgyid/ de gachi khe la zho gnyis kyi tshad/ yul gang na'ang 'dra ste/ dong tsi
rgyal po'i bla dkor du brdung ste/ 'od ma gzhan bgyid du ma gnang/ rgya yul na glang bsad pa dang/ dong tse lcags pa ni 'dra ste bcad par na 'gum/ ta zig da/ par yul nan
dong rtse lhags pa'i mgar ba rnams lag pa gra rgyas 'debs/ 'gom dag gis byugs na lag pa gtsod/ 'phra men yin nam ma yin pa brtag pa mag las mngon te/ 'bras bu'i nang du mi'i
gzugs bar n 'byung ste/ gzugs de rkang pa mar lta la/ mgo yar lta na ni/ 'phra men ma yin/ mgo mar lta la rkang pa gyen du song ba 'dra bar 'dug na 'phra men ma yin/ yang 'phra men mas
ma las phyogs su bsgyur bano 'phramenama'i tshogs byi ba gnyis la gnya' shing dang gshol btsugs te zhade rmos/ sa la sa bon til btab pa dang/ de ma thag tuljang bu/ de ma thag tus ma
ma thag tu 'bras bu sminanas brtas te/ brdungs te btsal ba mar gyis thig le ra bskus so cig byol song du 'gyur/ gnar 'phra men ma'i gcig nas brjes pa'i phung po'i drung na/ mi rgan
rgan gsum zhig 'dug pa las/ 'phra men ma gcig mtshan mo nas kyi phung po'i snying du 'ongs nas ma gsum de la 'dug na na ma tshon/ mos lcag gis nas kyi phung po la gzhu ba ltar byas pa dang/
nas kyi shung po dang mi gsum dang bcas te zhag bco brgyad kyis lam du phyin nas/ lan tshu'i re zhig la thug pa dang/ 'phramen ma da ni de nas kyang 'phur te/ gar song gi gtol med/ phyi
nas rgan pos rgan mo la gtam du zer ba/ 'u bu cag kyang baphra men mas mtshan gyi byas stem cig byas te lan tshu'i ro la thug na/lan tshwa mang zhig nas kyi phung po'i nang du sbya'o mnas/
tshwakhal sum cu tsamanas kyi phung po'i chung du sbas pa dang/ yang 'phramen ma 'ongs nas/ lcag gis gzhus pa dang/ nam mkha' la 'ang 'a phur nas// kun lnga'i sar phyin
pa dang/ de nas bya zer ba dang/ byas nen nas 'phramon mas 'phrul byed ma nus nas 'bab kyang ma nus/ 'gul yang ma nus par 'dug pa dang/ rgan rgonan re khyada'aphra
mnan nas/ rgyal bol gsol te gsod do zhes bya ba dang/ 'phra mnams kyang yin par khas blangs/ nor gsud mang po zhig sbyin par byas nas/ rgan rgon gyis//
kyang btang/ yang 'phra menaman mtshan mo rdzam dang/ phyags ma dang/ sgo nga la zhon tanam mkha' la 'gro/ 'phra mnam ni sbe da'adu byed cing tshod dus su 'tshong
sku de lams sgo nga yang dag pa lon nam/ 'phra men mas byas pa'i sgo nga yin nam gang yin brtag na/ sgo nga btsos te shun pags bshus nas gros rkad da ra bcad pa dang/
gri'i kha la sdu cage byung na ni/ 'phra men ma yin te ma to/ gros bcad nas spu ma byung na ni/ mi tha mal pas btsongs pa'i sgo nga yin te/ nyo zhing btsalazhes
mchi'o/ phu rdzogs so//
